<820Privacy_Title>Preamble</>
1. To continuously ensure an optimized user experience, balance game difficulty, develop new features, and improve service quality, Game Science Interactive Technology (Hangzhou) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Game Science) will collect and analyze your game-related data (hereinafter referred to as User Game Data) with your consent. Game Science has specially formulated this Data Storage and Processing Agreement (hereinafter referred to as this Agreement) to clarify the purpose, method, and scope of collecting, storing, and processing User Game Data, ensuring the protection of your legitimate rights and interests.
2. The decision to agree or disagree with this Agreement is entirely up to you, and even if you choose not to agree, it won't affect your use of this game
<820Privacy_Title>Article 1: Data Collection</>
1.1 Types of Data Collected:
1)	Platform-related user data, including username and login platform;
2)	Game experience data, including in-game user behavior data (for routine user behavior analysis);
3)	Time information, including the time of events and data uploads;
4)	Device hardware information, including device ID, BIOS, graphics card, memory, CPU, device platform, and display device; 
5)	System software information, including system software version, country, timezone, system language, and GPU driver;
6)	Game software information, including game version, game installation path, and MS Install ID;
7)	Network information, including internal IP address, public IP address, and MAC address;
8)	Program crash information, including in-game function logs triggered during game exceptions.
The above data will help Game Science optimize the game's balance, improve the gaming experience, and fix bugs.
1.2 Collection Method: With your consent of this Agreement, the game program will automatically record the above data during your gameplay and transmit it to Game Science's servers or cloud operator servers contracted with Game Science for storage and processing through encrypted transmission.
<820Privacy_Title>Article 2: Data Storage</>
2.1 Data Security: Game Science will adopt strict data encryption measures to ensure that User Game Data is not accessed or altered by unauthorized third parties during storage.
<820Privacy_Title>Article 3: Data Processing</>
3.1 Processing Purpose: Collected game data will only be used for legitimate and compliant purposes such as game difficulty adjustment, user experience optimization, internal statistical analysis, and promotional activities (including the public release of aggregated statistical data). Game Science will not disclose your individual data publicly or use it for any purposes not agreed upon in this Agreement.
3.2 Data Sharing: Game Science commits to not share your personal game data with any third parties unless prior explicit consent is obtained from you or otherwise stipulated by laws and regulations.
3.3 Anonymization: The collected data that may identify the "unique ID" of the  user will be MD5 anonymized by Game Science during statistical analysis, ensuring that it cannot be directly linked to your personal identity.
<820Privacy_Title>Article 4: User Rights</>
4.1 Withdrawal of Consent: You may withdraw your consent to this Agreement at any time from the "Game" tab in the "Settings" interface of the game menu. However, this will not affect the lawful collection and processing of data by Game Science prior to your withdrawal.
<820Privacy_Title>Article 5: Other</>
5.1 This Agreement shall take effect from the date you choose the "Accept" or "Agree" button or sign this Agreement in any other way and remain effective until you withdraw your consent to this Agreement or cancel your game account.
5.2 The collection, storage, and processing of User Game Data will also comply with the personal information collection laws and regulations of the country where the user resides..
5.3 For the processing of user personal information not covered by this Agreement, Game Science's Personal Information Protection Policy shall prevail. Please review and agree to the Personal Information Protection Policy before consenting to this Agreement.
5.4 Within the bounds of legal and regulatory compliance and in accordance with the terms of this Agreement, Game Science reserves the right to modify this Agreement. You will receive notification of any modified agreements through in-game announcements or other appropriate methods.

Finally, thank you for your support and cooperation—we look forward to providing you with the best possible gaming experience!
A564416E4CFD9C8FAA3E06AFA3C811D7:
<820Privacy_Title>Preamble</>
	We warmly welcome you to enjoy the games (hereinafter referred to as "Game" or "Games") and related services (hereinafter referred to as "Service" or "Services") provided by Game Science Interactive Technology (Hangzhou) Co., Ltd.. (hereinafter referred to as "Game Science" or "we/us")! When you use our Games or Services, we may collect and use your personal information. Through the Personal Information Protection Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy"), we aim to explain how we collect, use, store, and share your personal information, as well as your related rights. This Policy is part of the End-User License Agreement (<820Privacy_Email>www.heishenhua.com/eula</>) you have entered into with Game Science.
	Before using the Games or Services provided by Game Science, Game Science hereby reminds you to carefully read and fully understand all the terms of this Policy, specifically the clauses that exempt or mitigate Game Science's liability and limit user’s rights, which may be highlighted in bold. Please only start using the Games or Services provided by Game Science after you have fully understood and agreed to this Policy. If you disagree with the content of this Policy, it may result in the Games or Services not being provided normally or not achieving their intended effect. In such case, you should immediately stop accessing/using the Games or Services provided by Game Science.

	This Policy will help you understand the following:
	1 How we collect and use your personal information	
	2 How we share, transfer, or disclose your personal information
	3 How we store and protect your personal information
	4 How you can exercise your rights related to personal information
	5 Updates and notifications
	6 How to contact us


<820Privacy_Title>Section 1: How We Collect and Use Your Personal Information</>
	Personal information refers to various information related to identified or identifiable natural persons recorded electronically or by other means, excluding anonymized information. We collect and use your personal information for the following purposes described in this Policy. If we need to use your information beyond these purposes, we will seek your consent separately or obtain legal basis. The ways we collect your personal information include:
1.1 Information you provide voluntarily:
1.1.1 Information you provide when responding to surveys about our Games or Services.
1.1.2 We may collect your contact information (the phone number or other contact details you use or provide) to notify you of the results of events you participate in, to report Game functionality issues, to provide feedback and communication on your inquiries, or to send you information or promotional messages you are interested in with your consent.
1.1.3 When you contact our customer service, we may require you to provide necessary personal information for identity verification purposes to ensure the security of your personal information. To provide Services based on your requests, with your authorization, customer service personnel need to query or verify your relevant information within the scope of your authorization. We may also retain your contact information, records of your communication with us and corresponding communication content, and other necessary information to provide and record your customer service experience.
1.1.4 To provide you with value-added Services outside of the Game, such as gifts and prizes, you agree to provide us with relevant personal information, such as your shipping address. Refusing to provide such information will result in you not being able to receive related value-added Services, but it will not affect your use of the Game.
1.2 User Game Data:
To optimize the user experience and Game difficulty, develop new features, and improve Service quality, we will collect relevant data during your gameplay (referred to as "User Game Data") with your consent, as detailed in the "Data Storage and Processing Agreement." The decision to agree or disagree with the "Data Storage and Processing Agreement." is entirely up to you, and even if you choose not to agree, it won't affect your use of this game
1.3 Your personal information legally shared by third parties.

<820Privacy_Title>Section 2: How We Share, Transfer, or Disclose Your Personal Information</>
	Apart from in the situations stipulated by this Policy, we will not actively share, transfer, or disclose your personal information to third parties. If there are other situations where your personal information is shared, transferred, or disclosed, or if you require us to share, transfer, or disclose your personal information to third parties, we will directly seek your consent for the above actions, or confirm that the third party has obtained your consent.
2.1 Delegated processing:
Some specific modules or functions of our Games or Services may be provided by external suppliers. If we entrust other organizations or individuals to process your personal information, we will sign strict confidentiality agreements with them, requiring them to process your personal information according to our explicit instructions, the content of this Policy, and other related confidentiality and security measures.
2.2 Sharing your personal information:
2.2.1 We highly value the protection of your personal information and will not share it with other organizations or individuals, except in the following cases:
1) Sharing with explicit consent: After obtaining your explicit consent, we will share your personal information with others;
2) Sharing in legal situations: We may share your personal information according to legal regulations, the need for dispute resolution, or as required by administrative or judicial authorities;
3) Necessary sharing with affiliates: To facilitate providing you with consistent Services, unified management, personalized recommendations, and system security, your personal information may be shared as necessary between us and our affiliates. We will only share necessary personal information, and if we share your sensitive personal information or affiliates change the purpose of using and processing personal information, we will seek your consent again.
2.2.2 Sharing with third-party partners:
We may share your personal information with third-party partners (including third-party service providers, agents, advertising partners, application developers, etc., such as partners who send emails or push notifications on our behalf) solely for the purpose of external processing. We will require third-party partners to process your personal information for us according to our explicit instructions, this Policy, and other related confidentiality and security measures, and for the following purposes:
1) To provide you with our Services;
2) To achieve the purposes described in the "How We Collect and Use Your Personal Information" section;
3) To fulfill our obligations and exercise our rights under the "End-User License Agreement" or this Policy.
If we share your information with third-party partners, we will use encryption, anonymization, and other means to ensure the security of your personal information. 
2.3 Transfer of personal information during mergers, asset sales, or other asset transfers:
2.3.1 In the case of a merger, acquisition, asset transfer, separation, dissolution, bankruptcy declaration, or other similar situation, in which your personal information needs to be transferred, we will inform you of the relevant circumstances and provide you with the name and contact information of the recipient. We will also require the recipient to continue protecting your personal information in accordance with legal regulations and at a standard that meets or exceeds the requirements of this Policy.
2.3.2 If there is no recipient, we will delete or anonymize your personal information. In cases when specific laws and regulations dictate otherwise, such provisions shall prevail.
2.4 Situations of public disclosure:
We will only disclose your personal information under the following circumstances and after taking security protection measures that meet industry standards:
2.4.1 According to your needs, we will disclose the information you specify in the manner you explicitly agree to;
2.4.2 In situations where we must provide your information in accordance with legal regulations, mandatory administrative enforcement, or judicial requirements, we may disclose your personal information according to the required type of information and disclosure method. Under the premise of complying with laws and regulations, when we receive such requests for information disclosure, we will require the recipient to provide corresponding legal documents, such as subpoenas or investigation orders. We will carefully review all requests to ensure they have a legal basis and are limited to data that administrative law enforcement and judicial departments have the legal right to obtain for specific investigation purposes.

<820Privacy_Title>Section 3: How We Store and Protect Your Personal Information</>
3.1 Storage of personal information:
Typically, we only store your personal information for the time necessary to achieve Service purposes or as dictated by laws and regulations. After the above period expires, we will delete or anonymize your personal information. 
3.1.1 If we terminate our Services or operations, we will promptly stop collecting your personal information and notify you in advance according to relevant legal regulations. After the termination of the Service or operation, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except as otherwise dictated by laws, regulations, or regulatory authorities.
3.1.2 If you delete personal information or if the storage period exceeds the necessary duration, we will delete or anonymize your personal information, except as otherwise dictated by laws and regulations.
3.1.3 We will store your personal information according to the legal regulations of the country where you reside.
3.2 Protection of personal information:
We will adopt security protection measures that meet industry standards, including establishing reasonable regulations and using various security technologies and procedures, to prevent unauthorized access, use, or modification of your personal information, and to avoid data corruption or loss.
3.2.1 Technical data security measures:
1) Our Services use various encryption technologies (such as SSL) to encrypt and save your personal information and isolate it through isolation technology to protect your personal information;
2) In the process of using personal information, such as for information display and associated computations, we will use various data desensitization technologies to enhance the security of the personal information in use;
3) We will use strict data access control and multiple identity authentication technologies to protect personal information and prevent unauthorized use.
3.2.2 Other measures taken to protect personal information:
1) We have established relevant departments and internal regulations, and we use the principle of minimum necessary authorization for employees who may come into contact with your personal information. We only allow employees and employees of affiliates who need to know this information to access it after taking reasonable measures to verify their identity;
2) We will strictly require the aforementioned personnel to fulfill their confidentiality obligations, and they will be held legally accountable if they fail to fulfill these obligations;
3) We will implement security controls on personal information and data through confidentiality agreements, monitoring and auditing mechanisms;
4) We will conduct personal information protection training courses to enhance employees' understanding of personal information protection policies and requirements.
3.2.3 Correction of personal information:
If your personal information is incorrect, we will correct or delete the relevant information after verifying and confirming your identity, unless it is required to be retained by laws and regulations.
3.3 Security Tips:
3.3.1 Please understand that due to the limitations of existing technology, even though we have taken various security measures, we cannot always guarantee the absolute security of your information. You need to understand that the systems and networks you use to access our Games and Services may encounter problems beyond our control.
3.3.2 Please be aware that the information you share or disclose when using our Games or Services may involve personal information pertaining to you or other parties, or even sensitive personal information, such as images containing personal information uploaded when posting reviews. Please consider carefully whether to share such information when using our Services.
3.4 Measures for handling security incidents:
In the event of a security incident, such as personal information leak, we will initiate an emergency plan and contain the impact. After the occurrence of a security incident, we will inform you of the situation of the incident, actions taken and planned, and our suggestions for your response, through announcements, notifications, emails, and other such means. If individual notifications are not feasible, we will publish such communications through public announcements and other appropriate channels.

<820Privacy_Title>Section 4: How You Can Exercise Your Rights Related to Personal Information</>
4.1 Accessing, copying, transferring, updating, and deleting 
Regarding the personal information we collect from you, you can request access to, a copy of, or the transfer of your personal information, or you can request that we update or delete it. Please contact us according to the "How to Contact Us" section below to submit specific requests related to accessing, copying, transferring, updating, or deleting your personal information. Please be noted that to meet your request, we may need you to provide additional personal information to verify your identity.
4.2 Email marketing preferences 
If you have subscribed to our marketing emails, you can change your marketing preferences at any time. You can also use the opt-out mechanism provided in our marketing emails or contact us directly with your requests.

<820Privacy_Title>Section 5: Updates and Notifications</>
5.1 In order to provide you with better services, we may modify certain terms of this Policy in a timely manner in accordance with updates to Games and Services and the relevant requirements of laws and regulations, and such modifications shall constitute part of this Policy. We will announce changes to this Policy when updating Game and Service versions.
5.2 For significant changes of this Policy, we will also provide more prominent notifications (including website announcements, push notifications, pop-up prompts, or other methods). The significant changes referred to in this Policy include, but are not limited to:
1) Significant changes in our service model, such as the purpose of processing personal information, the types of personal information processed, and the way personal information is used;
2) Significant changes in our ownership structure, such as business adjustments, bankruptcy mergers and acquisitions, and other changes in ownership;
3) Significant changes in the main entities that share, transfer, or publicly disclose personal information;
4) Significant changes in your rights and the way you exercise them in the processing of personal information;
5) Significant changes in the department responsible for personal information security, contact methods, and complaint channels;
6) Other important situations that may seriously affect your rights and interests.
5.3 If you do not agree with such changes, you may choose to stop using our Games and Services. If you continue to use our Games and Services, such behavior indicates that you have fully read, understood, and agreed to be bound by the revised Policy.

<820Privacy_Title>Section 6: How to Contact Us</>
6.1 We will protect your personal information in accordance with this Policy. If you have any complaints regarding personal information security, or if you have any questions, comments, or suggestions about this Policy, please contact us at: <820Privacy_Email> privacy@gamesci.com.cn</>.
6.2 Under normal circumstances, we may need to verify your identity after receiving your questions, comments, or suggestions, and we will respond within 15 working days or the period dictated by laws and regulations. 
Game Science Interactive Technology (Hangzhou) Co., Ltd.

B93083F143DF2D154337E8958A2A7600: This tool is used for preliminary hardware performance and system compatibility testing. The test results may not fully represent actual gameplay experience and final performance.

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1002.Name: Will
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100006.Title: Will
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5001.Name: Red Tides
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5001.BriefDesc:
As the feral flurry intensifies, with each fierce thrust, the flames do rise. 

Transform into a wolf guai and inflict Scorch Bane on the enemy with each attack.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5001.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Moon Dance</><IA>LightAttack</>
Continuously slash at the enemy with spiralling blades ablaze, flames dancing across the sky like a full moon, building up Focus.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Moon Chase</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Unleash a series of dash attacks. When at full Focus, Dodging in any direction and following it with a Heavy Attack performs a powerful new move.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5004.Name: Azure Dust
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5004.BriefDesc:
From azure dust, a rock guai stands robust.

Transform into a rock guai, immune to all Four Banes. It builds up Might when hit.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5004.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Earth Shatter</>
Strike the enemy three times with your heavy head, each blow more painful than the last.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Mountain Splitter</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Dash forward with full force. Fully charge to dash further, ramming all enemies in your path.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Rockfall</><IA>Spell_QS</>
Build up full Focus to unleash this spell. Leap high and smash into the ground, causing a large Area of Damage with a shockwave of earth and stone.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5018.Name: Violet Hail
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4017.Name: Violet Hail
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5018.BriefDesc:
Violet worm, violent form.

Transform into a worm guai, immune to Poison, inflicting Poison Bane on the enemy with each attack.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5018.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Slash</>
Slash with a sharp blade to wound an enemy. 

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Self-Torment</>
Imbue the blade with eggs by self-wounding. The blade can store up to four egg stacks. Each Light Attack consumes a stack, infesting the enemy's wound with larvae.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Hive Mind</>
Command infested larvae to explode, dealing severe Damage instantly. Absorb part of the hatched swarm to recover a considerable amount of Health.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Self-Detonation</><IA>Spell_BS</>
Detonate to inflict area Damage upon De-Transformation. This spell also activates <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Hive Mind</>, causing any remaining larvae on the enemy to explode.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5101.Name: Immobilize
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5501.Name: Immobilize
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5101.BriefDesc: A simple hand gesture can bind the enemy in place.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5101.Desc:
A control spell that, with just a gesture of the finger, can bind the enemy in place. More powerful foes may break free sooner, thus caution is advised.

To ensure this spell will not be interrupted during intense combat, cast it when the opponent is exhausted, staggered, or downed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5102.Name: Ring of Fire
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5102.BriefDesc: A fiery circle drawn by the staff can provide rapid recovery within it.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5102.EffectDesc: Draws a fiery circle to gain Focus and enhance Health recovery from using the gourd.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5102.Desc:
A lifesaving spell that, with a simple ring drawn by the staff on the ground, grants protection from the cold and prepares for impending confrontation. Standing within the ring accelerates recovery, and the effects of drinks are enhanced.

The duration of the fire ring allows stepping out to engage in battle and returning with its effects still active. Once the time is up, the ring will vanish.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5201.Name: Cloud Step
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5624.Name: Cloud Step
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5201.BriefDesc: Dispersing into mist allows for an escape and provides an opportunity to execute an Unveiling Strike.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5201.EffectDesc: Transforms into white mist for a swift escape.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5624.EffectDesc: Transforms into white mist for a swift escape.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5201.Desc:
A mobility spell that leaves behind a decoy while allowing for quick dispersion into mist and escape. Useful for evading attacks or luring enemies into a trap.

Upon returning from the mist state, an Unveiling Strike can be unleashed to catch opponents off guard.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5202.Name: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5604.Name: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5625.Name: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5620.Name: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5502.Name: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5202.BriefDesc: Solidify the body like a rock to parry incoming attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5202.EffectDesc: Instantly harden like a rock, parrying physical attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5604.EffectDesc: Instantly harden like a rock, parrying physical attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5625.EffectDesc: Instantly harden like a rock, parrying physical attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5620.EffectDesc: Instantly harden like a rock, parrying physical attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5502.EffectDesc: Instantly harden like a rock, parrying physical attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5202.Desc:
A defensive spell that transforms the caster into a rock. If the enemy strikes the rock upon the transformation, they shall be Deflected, which grants a perfect chance to counterattack.

Though the spell may seem simple, timing is crucial. Cast it too early or too late, and it won't work. Beware, enemies who possess powerful moves may shatter the rock.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5301.Name: A Pluck of Many
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5724.Name: A Pluck of Many
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5503.Name: A Pluck of Many
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5301.BriefDesc: Blowing strands into the air creates Duplicates to assist in combat.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5301.EffectDesc: Create multiple Duplicates to assist in battle.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5301.Desc:
A duplication spell: pluck a strand, chew it, and spit it into the air to create multiple Duplicates. These agile Duplicates can fight or flee and will engage the enemy if the caster is attacked.

This spell can be used to catch a breath or escape. 

However, the Duplicates are fragile and can be quickly destroyed if directly confronted by the enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5302.Name: Life-Saving Strand
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5704.Name: Life-Saving Strand
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5302.BriefDesc: Upon nearing death, automatically activates to resurrect the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5302.EffectDesc: Upon nearing death, automatically resurrects the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5704.EffectDesc: Upon nearing death, automatically resurrects the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5302.Desc:
A lifesaving spell: in moments of mortal peril, this spell automatically activates. It transforms a single strand of hair from the Destined One's head into his Duplicate, which then takes his place in facing death. Simultaneously, it creates a new body for the Destined One.

The Destined One will return with full Health, but the gourd will not be replenished. 

When danger is imminent, ready this spell to be prepared for any eventuality.

Beneath his armor, pale silk lies light.

His breastplate dazzles, a lustrous flash."

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11601.BriefDesc: "Yet that yaoguai king showed not a hint of fear."

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11801.Name: Iron Horned Helm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11811.Name: Iron Horned Helm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11801.BriefDesc: "Where now is that pious soul who melted your metal, or the smith who cast it to form you?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11802.BriefDesc: "Where now is that pious soul who melted your metal, or the smith who cast it to form you?"

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11911.Name: Monastic Insect Hat
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11921.Name: Monastic Insect Hat
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11901.BriefDesc: "What be the years of that guai? Whence cometh he?"
