StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.12002.Name: Gold Suozi Armor
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10502.Name: Gold Suozi Armor
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.12003.Name: Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10503.Name: Dian-Cui Loong-Soaring Bracers
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.12004.Name: Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10504.Name: Lotus Silk Cloudtreaders
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15002.Name: Jingubang
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15002.BriefDesc: "That piece of iron-one small stroke proves deadly, while a light tap proves fatal! The slightest touch cracks the skin, a small rap cripples the muscles!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15003.Name: Twin Serpents Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15003.BriefDesc: "A snake without a head cannot slither, as a bird without wings cannot fly."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15004.Name: Wind Bear Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15004.BriefDesc:
"Where'er it goes, or steps may lead,
Beasts quake in fear, and evils recede."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15005.Name: Willow Wood Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15005.BriefDesc: "A staff like this might be burly enough to mete out a beating, and it might even be bulky enough to fell a guai, but don't go expecting to kill anything with it in one fell swoop."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15006.Name: Chitin Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15006.BriefDesc: "A buzzing black mass, his visage thus swathed. The dead and deities startled by the chirr of rage."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15009.Name: Rat Sage Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15009.BriefDesc: "Such wind! Powerful indeed! The universe did almost split apart!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15010.Name: Loongwreathe Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15010.BriefDesc: "The loong slain dead with sword's swift lunge, into the void its head did plunge."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15011.Name: Staff of Blazing Karma
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15011.BriefDesc: "Show him no mercy; burn him until he's dry and crisp!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15012.Name: Spikeshaft Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15013.Name: Spider Celestial Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15013.BriefDesc:
"Emotion and desire from one source arise,
Both natural, beneath the skies."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15014.Name: Kang-Jin Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15014.BriefDesc:
"In life, desires bind, hindering its flight,
In death, valor rewarded, Kang-Jin Loong takes height."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15015.Name: Golden Loong Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15015.BriefDesc: "A golden loong emerged, baring its eight fearsome claws, then lunged at the guai with two of them to snatch it up."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15016.Name: Dark Iron Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15016.BriefDesc:
"Divine weapons clash, each strike doth shake the sky,
Locking horns with equal might, no victor to descry."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15017.Name: Stormflash Loong Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15017.BriefDesc:
"Gather the materials in the furnace, and refine till red as the scorching sun.
With its brilliance and beauty, on loong thou shall ride, immortal and unstoppable."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16001.Name: Fine China Tea Bowl
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16001.BriefDesc:
"Walnuts, Ginkgos, tea for friends to savor,
Grapes, coconut, wine for joyful flavor."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16002.Name: Cat's Eye Beads
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16002.BriefDesc: "Cast not rare and precious things before avaricious eyes."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16003.Name: Agate Jar
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16003.BriefDesc: "On the marbled rocks, the guardian stands majestic. Before the agate shore, there stands the mighty Moksa."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16004.Name: Tiger Tally
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16004.BriefDesc: "My King, I'll lead fifty guai soldiers to bring back that so-called pilgrim and serve him up as a garnish for your supper tonight."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16005.Name: Tridacna Pendant
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16005.BriefDesc: "I have long heard that my esteemed neighbor enjoys the splendor of the Jade Palace and the Pearl Pavilion, surely you must have some treasures to spare for me."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16006.Name: Goldflora Hairpin
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16006.BriefDesc: "What a steal! We'd be fools not to make this trade!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16007.Name: Glazed Reliquary
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16007.BriefDesc: "Embracing destiny, one stands firm against fortune or misfortune; mastering the heart, one remains balance amid joy and anger."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16008.Name: Wind Chime
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16008.BriefDesc: "Hark, the wind rises! That yaoguai must be coming this way!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16009.Name: Thunderstone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16009.BriefDesc: "The gods of the Thunder Council were ordered to strike him with all the bolts they could muster, but not a single one of his hairs was harmed."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16010.Name: Frostsprout Twig
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16010.BriefDesc: "Failure to cultivate one's body is the blight of cultivating one's mind."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16012.Name: Maitreya's Orb
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16012.BriefDesc: "Those things to come, and those things past, he beholds as in a mirror. Which house will rise and which will fall, he foresees with divine perception."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16013.Name: Golden Carp
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16013.BriefDesc: "Every day, I give him a golden carp. He divines a location with the coins in his sleeve, and I fish wherever he tells me to. He hasn't been wrong yet."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16014.Name: Jade Moon Rabbit
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16014.BriefDesc: "The pristine mind shines like pure moonlight, bathing you in tranquility."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16016.Name: Preservation Orb
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16017.Name: Gold Sun Crow
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16017.BriefDesc: "The crow sings in the sun; The rabbit hops on the moon. Yin and Yang shall merge; Fire and Water shall meet."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16018.Name: Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16018.BriefDesc:
"When thoughts arise, love takes its place;
Where fondness lies, misfortune's trace."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16019.Name: Gold Button
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16019.BriefDesc: "Excess in drink leads to disorder, excess in joy leads to sorrow."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16020.Name: Flame Orb
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16020.BriefDesc:
"Growth and change, by fire's blaze,
All things doth flourish in its gaze."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16021.Name: Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water
StringKVMapDesc.EquipDesc.16021.EquipName: Daoist's Basket of Fire and Water
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16021.BriefDesc: "Everything in this universe is susceptible to defeat, save for fire and water."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16022.Name: Waterward Orb
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16022.BriefDesc: "Water can't drown me, fire can't burn me! Not a place exists to which I cannot venture!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16023.Name: Amber Prayer Beads
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16023.BriefDesc: "Sweep often the grounds of the heart; wipe away the dust of emotion, lest your Dharma body be ensnared in the pit."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16024.Name: Celestial Registry Tablet
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16024.BriefDesc:
"With name thus claimed, all things enchained,
He trod anew the righteous way,
In glory's grip, he would await, 
A celestial title to attain."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16025.Name: Tiger Tendon Belt
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16025.BriefDesc: "Master, fear not this beast, for it shall gift me with garments to wear."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16026.Name: Celestial Birthstone Fragment
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16026.BriefDesc: "Since the world was formed, it absorbed the essence of the sky and earth, the sun and moon-eon upon eon, age upon age, nurturing a bright consciousness with each passing day."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17004.Name: Ginseng Cape
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17004.BriefDesc: "Drenched in wine 'neath pines I rest; no cares, no gains to be possessed. Worldly woes, success or strife, hold no sway in this realm of life."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18002.Name: Medicine Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18002.BriefDesc: "Use it right, and the cure you'll find."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18003.BriefDesc: "Use it right, and the cure you'll find."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18004.BriefDesc: "Use it right, and the cure you'll find."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18005.BriefDesc: "Use it right, and the cure you'll find."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18006.BriefDesc: "Use it right, and the cure you'll find."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18003.Name: Healing Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18007.Name: Xiang River Goddess Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18007.EffectDesc: Using the gourd grants a moderate amount of Burn Resistance and immunity from lava-covered terrain for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18008.Name: Jade Guanyin Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18008.BriefDesc: "Thought transforms: Yaoguai or Bodhisattva, guided by intention; Inherent nature does not exist, for it is merely an illusion."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18008.EffectDesc: Upon using the gourd, fully recovers the Health for all Duplicates nearby.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18009.Name: Trailblazer's Scarlet Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18009.BriefDesc:
"Strength rules, yield your seat,
I'm a hero, a trailblazer's feat."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18009.EffectDesc: When the gourd is full, the first sip replenishes to full Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18012.Name: Plaguebane Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18012.EffectDesc: Health recovery is halved, but Attack is increased for a short duration after using the gourd.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18014.EffectDesc: Health recovery is halved, but Attack is increased for a short duration after using the gourd.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18013.Name: Stained Jade Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18013.BriefDesc: "The monkey, then, drank with all the deities who came to greet him."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18014.Name: Immortal Blessing Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18014.BriefDesc: "Immortals exist, so they say, but who has seen them anyway?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18015.Name: Multi-Glazed Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18015.BriefDesc:
"If good and evil gain no due,
The cosmos harbors bias true."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18015.EffectDesc: The last sip from the gourd significantly increases Attack for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18016.Name: Jade Lotus Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18016.BriefDesc: "Immaculate integrity and reputation should not be hoarded alone. Distribute these virtues to avert envy, avoid trouble, and safeguard oneself."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18016.EffectDesc: Recovers a considerable amount of Health for nearby Duplicates upon using the gourd.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18017.Name: Fiery Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18017.BriefDesc: "One craves food when hungry, warmth when cold, rest when exhausted, and benefits over harm. Such is the nature of humanity."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18017.EffectDesc: Using the gourd grants Chill immunity and increases Maximum Stamina for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19001.Name: Fireproof Mantle
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19001.BriefDesc: "Let everything else burn. I care for nothing but my master. Give it to me, quickly!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19001.EffectDesc: For a short duration after activation, grants <{0}_KW>Burn Immunity</> and gradually increasing <{0}_KW>Focus</>. Highly effective in specific environments and against specific enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19002.Name: Wind Tamer
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19002.BriefDesc: "I abide by the Buddha's decree, here to subdue the Yellow Wind Guai."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19002.EffectDesc: Upon activation, massively increases <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</> for a short duration and grants immunity to strong winds. Highly effective against specific enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19004.Name: Weaver's Needle
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19004.BriefDesc: "This vessel of mine is forged not of iron or steel, nor of gold, but solely from the eyes of my son."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19004.EffectDesc: Upon activation, <{0}_KW>relentlessly homes in on and attacks the enemy</>. Highly effective against specific enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19005.Name: Plantain Fan
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19005.BriefDesc: "This fan of ours, graced with boundless versatility, quenches even the fiercest flames that stretch across eighty thousand miles with but a single sweep."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.19005.EffectDesc: Upon activation, creates a <{0}_KW>Hurricane</> that <{0}_KW>lifts the enemy airborne</>. Highly effective against specific enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2302.Name: Flower Primes
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2302.BriefDesc: "In the bloom of spring, they dine on petals fair; As summer's warmth arrives, they feast on fruits rare."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2302.EffectDesc: Using the gourd removes all <{0}_KW>Four Banes States</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2303.Name: Turtle Tear
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2303.BriefDesc: "Beholding his pitiable figure weeping thus, Bajie could naught but laugh."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2303.EffectDesc: When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of <{0}_KW>Mana</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2303.HudEffectDesc: Restores a moderate amount of <{0}_KW>Mana</> when at full Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2304.Name: Stranded Loong's Whisker
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2304.BriefDesc: "Alas, the unanchored soul, which falters in thought, and errs in the moment of deed."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2304.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next <{0}_KW>Immobilize Spell</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2304.HudEffectDesc: Moderately extends the duration of the next <{0}_KW>Immobilize Spell</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2305.Name: Mount Lingtai Seedlings
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2305.BriefDesc: "What is peace if not the soul's deliverance from the entanglements and illusions that burden it so?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2305.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of <{0}_KW>Duplicates</> for the next <{0}_KW>A Pluck of Many</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2305.HudEffectDesc: Moderately extends the duration of <{0}_KW>Duplicates for the next Pluck of Many</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2306.Name: Breath of Fire
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2306.BriefDesc: "Breath dispersed forth can be reclaimed; amassed within, it awaits a fresh traverse."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2306.EffectDesc: Using the gourd significantly increases Attack for the next <{0}_KW>Unveiling Strike in Cloud Step</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2306.HudEffectDesc: Significantly increases Attack for the next Unveiling Strike in <{0}_KW>Cloud Step</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2307.Name: Celestial Lotus Seeds
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2307.BriefDesc:
"Twelve palaces rise, nine floors high.
Jade Pool adjoined, Emerald Stream nigh.
Kunlun's Celestial Abode shines bright."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2307.EffectDesc: For a brief moment after using the gourd, slowly recovers a small amount of <{0}_KW>Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2307.HudEffectDesc: Slowly recovers a small amount of <{0}_KW>Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2324.HudEffectDesc: Slowly recovers a small amount of <{0}_KW>Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2308.Name: Undying Vine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2308.BriefDesc: "We may not number among the celestial Immortals, but when it comes to seniority? Ha! We're the ones excelling!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2308.EffectDesc: After using the gourd, instantly recovers a great amount of <{0}_KW>Stamina</> and increases <{0}_KW>Stamina recovery rate</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2308.HudEffectDesc: Recovers a great amount of <{0}_KW>Stamina</> and increases <{0}_KW>Stamina recovery rate</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2309.Name: Tiger Relic
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2309.BriefDesc: "Your nature as a yaoguai will forever bar you from ascending among the Immortals."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2309.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Critical Hit Chance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2310.Name: Laurel Buds
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2310.BriefDesc:
"From laurel in Moon Palace's shadowless glade,
Divine and robust, my weapon's made."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2310.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2311.Name: Sweet Ice
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2311.BriefDesc: "Sip upon the essence of sumptuous jade, indulge in the flavor of sweet, unmelting ice."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2311.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Chill Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2312.Name: Thunderbolt Horn
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2312.BriefDesc: "Virtue concealed within dishonor, propriety arising from irreverence, faithfulness hidden beneath betrayal, and mercy cloaked in malevolence. All demand wise discernment."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2312.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Shock Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2313.Name: Deathstinger
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2313.EffectDesc: For a short duration after using the gourd, inflicts a <{0}_KW>Poisoned State</> to the Destined One himself.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2313.HudEffectDesc: Inflicts a <{0}_KW>Poisoned State</> to the Destined One himself.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2314.Name: Purple-Veined Peach Pit
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2314.BriefDesc: "Alas, alas! I have wrought upon myself a woe most dire!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2314.EffectDesc: Massively increases the Health recovery from using the gourd when at Critical Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2314.HudEffectDesc: Massively increases Health recovery from using the gourd when at critical Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2315.Name: Bee Mountain Stone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2315.BriefDesc: "The king, ascending Mount Kunlun, imbibed the pure essence of Bee Mountain's stone, and feasted on the fruits of its jade trees."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2315.EffectDesc: When using the gourd, grants a considerable chance to take a sip without consuming gourd uses.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2315.HudEffectDesc: Grants a considerable chance to take a sip without consuming <{0}_KW>gourd uses</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2316.Name: Iron Pellet
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2316.BriefDesc: "For his hunger, feed him with iron pellets; For his thirst, quench him with molten copper."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2316.EffectDesc: Using the gourd can <{0}_KW>no longer be interrupted by incoming attacks</> and now provides considerable <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2316.HudEffectDesc: When using the gourd, grants <{0}_KW>Tenacity</> and a considerable amount of <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2317.Name: Slumbering Beetle Husk
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2317.BriefDesc: "Deceits and guiles are beneath me. All my means are true and honest!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2317.EffectDesc: After using the gourd, moderately reduces Cooldown for all Spells, but impairs movement for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2317.HudEffectDesc: Moderately reduces Cooldown of all Spells, but impairs movement for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2318.Name: Copper Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2318.BriefDesc: "Famished, he dined on iron pellets; parched, he supped on molten copper. For five centuries, not a morsel of tea nor rice."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2318.EffectDesc: After using the gourd, the next <{0}_KW>Rock Solid</> costs no Mana for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2318.HudEffectDesc: The next <{0}_KW>Rock Solid</> costs no Mana.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2319.Name: Goji Shoots
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2319.BriefDesc: "A single spoon can bestow the gift of years."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2319.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next <{0}_KW>Ring of Fire</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2319.HudEffectDesc: Moderately extends the duration of the next <{0}_KW>Ring of Fire</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2320.Name: Fruit of Dao
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2320.BriefDesc: "Only in the tranquil absence of life's encumbrance does a heart yearning for Dao truly awaken."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2320.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of Invincibility upon executing a Dodge for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2320.HudEffectDesc: Moderately extends the duration of Dodge Invincibility.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2321.Name: Flame Mediator
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2321.BriefDesc: "Ah! Hot, hot, hot, hot, hot! How am I supposed to eat this?!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2321.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Burn Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2322.Name: Double-Combed Rooster Blood
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2322.BriefDesc: "Upon yon slope, the Dawnstar did stand, his guise unfurled, revealed as a rooster with crowns twain."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2322.EffectDesc: Using the gourd while in Poisoned State removes the Poisoned State and moderately increase <{0}_KW>Movement Speed</> and <{0}_KW>Critical Hit Chance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2322.HudEffectDesc: Removes Poison State and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Movement Speed and Critical Hit Chance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2204.Name: Body-Warming Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2204.BriefDesc: "Monks should be undisturbed by cold, why the goosebumps?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2204.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly removes <{0}_KW>Chilled State</> and significantly increases <{0}_KW>Chill Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2204.HudEffectDesc: Increases Chill Resistance. Frost shall bother no more.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2205.Name: Antimiasma Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2205.BriefDesc:
"In mountains high, where waters flow,
Yaoguais lurk, where miasmas grow."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2205.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly removes <{0}_KW>Poisoned State</> and significantly increases <{0}_KW>Poison Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2205.HudEffectDesc: Increase Poison Resistance. Poison shall bother no more.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2206.Name: Shock-Quelling Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2206.BriefDesc: "Revere him as you would ghosts and gods, fear him as you would thunder and lightning."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2206.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly removes <{0}_KW>Shocked State</> and significantly increases <{0}_KW>Shock Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2206.HudEffectDesc: Increases Shock Resistance. Thunder shall bother no more.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2207.Name: Body-Fleeting Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1107.Name: Body-Fleeting Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2207.BriefDesc: "Clear in mind, a gaze bright as a hale immortal, and a vigorous, fleet body to match."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2207.EffectDesc: Upon use, all actions cost no <{0}_KW>Stamina</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2208.Name: Body-Cooling Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2208.BriefDesc: "Coolness envelops their bodies, refreshing their souls."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2208.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly removes <{0}_KW>Burnt State</> and significantly increases <{0}_KW>Burn Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2208.HudEffectDesc: Increases Burn Resistance. Scorch shall bother no more.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2210.Name: Septenary Heartfire Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1110.Name: Septenary Heartfire Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2210.BriefDesc: "A spirit refined, to nothingness it returns, and from nothingness, one finds alignment with the Dao."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2210.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly resets Cooldown for all Spells.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2211.Name: Life-Saving Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1111.Name: Life-Saving Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2211.BriefDesc: "A tranquil heart is the fortress that repels a hundred infirmities."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2211.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly recovers full <{0}_KW>Health</> and removes all <{0}_KW>Four Banes States</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2211.HudEffectDesc: Instantly recovers full Health and removes all Four Banes States.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2213.Name: Ascension Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1113.Name: Ascension Powder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2213.BriefDesc: "An immortal breeze brisk, gliding with steps as light as whispers."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2213.EffectDesc: For a short duration after use, all actions cost no <{0}_KW>Stamina</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2215.Name: Soul Remigration Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1115.Name: Soul Remigration Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2215.BriefDesc: "My pills aren't just made from any old lump of clay. Do you think they're that easy to come by?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2215.EffectDesc: Upon use, grants <{0}_KW>resurrection</> upon death before triggering Life Saving Strand for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2218.Name: Essence Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1118.Name: Essence Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2218.BriefDesc: "Essence ascends, returning to the origin; energies align, birthing clarity and unity."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2218.EffectDesc: Upon use, considerably increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Mana</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2221.Name: Tonifying Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1121.Name: Tonifying Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2221.BriefDesc: "Strike me as many times as you might, but know that endurance bests strength."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2221.EffectDesc: Upon use, considerably increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Stamina</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2224.Name: Amplification Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2224.BriefDesc:
"When power is slight, bear not a heavy burden; 
when words carry little weight, urge not another's path."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2224.EffectDesc: Upon use, moderately increases <{0}_KW>Critical Hit Chance</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2227.Name: Tiger Subduing Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2227.BriefDesc: "From his heart, anger surges; from his gall, bile seeps."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2227.EffectDesc: Upon use, moderately increases <{0}_KW>Attack</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2230.Name: Longevity Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1130.Name: Longevity Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2230.BriefDesc: "Follow the path that extends life's thread, steer clear of those that would sever it short."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2230.EffectDesc: Upon use, considerably increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2234.Name: Fortifying Medicament
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1134.Name: Fortifying Medicament
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2234.BriefDesc: "Crude to the eye, yet unyielding to the bone, each imperfection harboring its own hidden perfection."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2234.EffectDesc: Upon use, enhances the <{0}_KW>Tenacity</> effect of certain staff abilities, making them less susceptible to interruptions for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2234.HudEffectDesc: Enhances the Tenacity effect of certain staff abilities.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2236.Name: Mirage Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1136.Name: Mirage Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2236.BriefDesc: "A noble man shall not reflect upon mirror, but upon men."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2236.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly gains a considerable amount of <{0}_KW>Might</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2236.HudEffectDesc: Gain a considerable amount of Might.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2245.Name: Loong Aura Amplification Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1142.Name: Loong Aura Amplification Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2245.BriefDesc: "Conquering others demonstrates power, but conquering oneself reveals true strength."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2245.EffectDesc: Upon use, massively increases <{0}_KW>Attack, Critical Hit Chance</>, and <{0}_KW>Critical Damage</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2245.HudEffectDesc: Increases Attack, Critical Hit Chance, and Critical Hit Damage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2247.Name: Evil Repelling Medicament
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1144.Name: Evil Repelling Medicament
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2247.BriefDesc: "Be sure to safeguard yourself in this ominous place."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2247.EffectDesc: Upon use, considerably increases <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2247.HudEffectDesc: Grants a considerable amount of Damage Reduction.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2251.Name: Enhanced Ginseng Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1166.Name: Enhanced Ginseng Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2251.BriefDesc: "On might he leaned, shaking the ten thrones."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2251.EffectDesc: Upon use, instantly grants a large amount of <{0}_KW>Focus</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2251.HudEffectDesc: Grants a large amount of Focus.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2252.Name: Ginseng Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2252.BriefDesc: "In the fluidity of water lies the art of war, ever-changing, ever-adapting."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2252.EffectDesc: Upon use, slowly grants <{0}_KW>Focus</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2253.Name: Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1168.Name: Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2253.BriefDesc: "Subduing tigers, vanquishing loongs, purging fiends and guais... I possess a force known across the land; one which knows no bounds."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2253.EffectDesc: Upon use, considerably increases <{0}_KW>Attack</> for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4007.Name: Buddha's Eyeball
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4007.BriefDesc: "They found the monk's worth wanting, and so they tore down his temple and destroyed its Buddha."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4008.Name: Stone Essence
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4008.BriefDesc: "The intertwined essence of Yin and Yang remains unbroken, forever woven."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4011.Name: Loong Scales
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4011.BriefDesc: "The luster of talents dim in a troubled world."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4017.BriefDesc: Good and evil are the shadows of one's deeds; bane and bliss, the echoes of one's own making.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4091.Name: Craving Eyes
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4092.Name: Fuming Ears
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4093.Name: Hubris Nose
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4094.Name: Envious Tongue
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4095.Name: Grieved Body
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4096.Name: Freed Mind
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5901.Name: Stamina
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5901.Desc:
Master the arts of Sprinting and Dodging while conserving Stamina to maintain agility in combat. 

Only with sufficient Stamina can one truly excel and revel in battle.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5904.Name: Martial Arts
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5904.Desc:
Master the art of Staff Spin to fortify defense, and Light Attack to lay a solid foundation for advanced skills. 

Armed with abilities to fend off foes and strike with force, one can easily subdue yaoguais encountered.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5908.Name: Smash Stance
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400007.Title: Smash Stance
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5908.Desc: The Heavy Attack of the Smash Stance, capable of being charged while moving around in battle, is highly versatile and the best choice for engaging in tactical combats.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5909.Name: Pillar Stance
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400009.Title: Pillar Stance
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5909.Desc:
The Heavy Attack of the Pillar Stance allows perching on the top of his staff, with adjustable height.

One can launch a sweeping counterattack while evading ground attacks with this technique combining offense and defense.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5910.Name: Thrust Stance
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400011.Title: Thrust Stance
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5910.Desc:
The Heavy Attack of Thrust Stance requires the Destined One to stand in place while charging.

It can strike enemies from a distance and is particularly effective against incoming attacks.

It is the best technique for achieving victory while remaining defensive.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5913.Name: Survival
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5913.Desc:
Master the arts of physical strengthening to enhance survival performance and attribute limits. 

Strong limbs and a robust body are essential for a safe journey!
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2323.Name: Gall Gem
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2323.BriefDesc: "He told me that the most potent pills are those cultivated within oneself; seeking them externally will be futile."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2323.EffectDesc: Using the gourd moderately increases <{0}_KW>Poison Resistance</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1998.Name: Awaken Wine Worm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1999.Name: Luojia Fragrant Vine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15001.Name: Bronze Cloud Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15001.BriefDesc: "Although each staff has its own characteristics, the outcome of a battle depends on the individuals involved."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17006.Name: Grey Wolf Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17006.BriefDesc: "When kindness fails to teach, malice will prevail."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17010.Name: Guanyin's Prayer Beads
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17010.BriefDesc: "Daily acts of kindness surpass daily prayers."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18001.Name: Old Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18001.BriefDesc: "Human delicacies, though rare, can't compare to the mountain monkey's carefree air."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2402.Name: Incense Trail Talisman
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100013.Title: Incense Trail Talisman
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2402.BriefDesc: "When advancement proves impossible, retreat stands as a steadfast ally."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2402.EffectDesc: Using this talisman shall immediately free the soul from the body and guide it back to the last Keeper's Shrine visited for resurrection.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3003.Name: Mind Core
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3202.Name: Aged Ginseng
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3204.Name: Purple Lingzhi
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3206.Name: Gentian
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3216.Name: Jade Lotus
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3217.Name: Snake-Head Mushroom
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3301.Name: Tadpole
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3306.Name: Tiny Piece of Gold
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3306.EffectDesc: A tiny piece of gold, its origin indiscernible. Perhaps some trade could be done at the Keeper's Shrine.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3307.Name: Small Piece of Gold
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3307.EffectDesc: A small piece of gold, speckled with bits of stone. Where do they come from? Perhaps they could be traded at the Keeper's Shrine.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3308.Name: Large Piece of Gold
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3308.EffectDesc: Oh dear! This gold piece was peeled from the face of a gold Buddha. Keeping it will only invite trouble; it's better to sell them at the Keeper's Shrine.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3901.Name: Jade Fang
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3902.Name: Flame Ebongold
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3919.Name: Thunder Tail
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3958.Name: Stone Spirit
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3959.Name: Yaoguai Core
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3960.Name: Refined Iron Sand
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3961.Name: Gold Tree Core
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3963.Name: Skandha of Form
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1998.EffectDesc: Obtaining the wine worm, and churning it into the wine, will transform the drink into a fine brew. This can be used for drink upgrades.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1999.EffectDesc: This vine resides in Guanyin's Purple Bamboo Grove, drinking sweet dew by day and listening to the sound of tides by night. It can be used for gourd upgrades.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3003.EffectDesc: The mighty employ their corporeal forms as furnaces, and their essence, vigor, and spirit as ingredients, to forge a potent core, which may be harnessed to craft Celestial Medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3202.EffectDesc: It is believed that which bears the semblance of human shape doth possess a kindred spirit. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3204.EffectDesc: An auspicious fungus that features a luxurious purple hue. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3206.EffectDesc: The taste is as bitter as gut, and it supplements a deficiency in guts. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3216.EffectDesc: Originating from the Celestial Realms, this divine plant is the gods' possession. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3217.EffectDesc: Red in color, crisp in texture, this fungus can be found throughout woodlands in clusters. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3301.EffectDesc: Offspring of the frog. Treasure it, as it may prove wondrously useful some day.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3901.EffectDesc: A tooth for a tooth, the Whiteclad Noble has paid his blood debt. His fang can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3902.EffectDesc: "When fortune forsakes you, your gold dulls to iron; yet when embraced by luck, even your iron sharpens to gold." This material can be used for crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3919.EffectDesc: Veiled in clouds and mist at rest, this loong tail conjures thunder and lightning with its every move. Its purpose lingers in mystery, likely to unfold in times ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3958.EffectDesc: This is the fortitude of the mountains and the spirit of the rocks. This material can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3959.EffectDesc: With their heart stained by cruelty and impudence, the lesser yaoguais can only forge immature cores within them. These can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3960.EffectDesc: The sands have been smelt nine times. They can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3961.EffectDesc: Upon the golden hill there grow the trees with hearts of gold, which can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3950.Name: Yarn
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3950.EffectDesc: By day, they patrol the hills; by night, they spin their yarns. Such is the life of lesser guais. Their hard-earned yarn can be used to craft armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3951.Name: Silk
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3951.EffectDesc: The thread produced by an old silkworm. This can be used to craft armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4011.EffectDesc: These ancient loong scales occasionally flicker with lightning. They seem to be calling out to their former owner...
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1003.Name: Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1003.BriefDesc: A miraculous pill concocted by the God of Longevity in the southernmost reaches of the land that massively increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1003.EffectDesc: A miraculous pill concocted by the God of Longevity in the southernmost reaches of the land that massively increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1004.Name: Celestial Taiyi Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1004.BriefDesc: A miraculous pill crafted by King Father of the East on the Mountain of Fang-Zhang that increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Mana</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1004.EffectDesc: A miraculous pill crafted by King Father of the East on the Mountain of Fang-Zhang that increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Mana</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1005.Name: Celestial Nonary Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1005.BriefDesc: A miraculous pill refined by Lord Lao from the Tushita Palace that massively increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Stamina</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1005.EffectDesc: A miraculous pill refined by Lord Lao from the Tushita Palace that massively increases Maximum <{0}_KW>Stamina</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3963.EffectDesc: "Man shrinks at odor, but smiles at beauty, which is only natural." Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4007.EffectDesc: An eyeball extracted from the chanting Buddha heads of Fright Cliff. It may be inlaid elsewhere.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4008.EffectDesc: An consolidated cluster of azure gravel obtained from the shattered remains of the Mother of Stones.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4017.EffectDesc: The remains of the deceased Daoists of Petal Fall Hamlet may be just what Daoist Mi outside the temple is seeking.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1156.Name: Nonary Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1156.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase Maximum <{0}_KW>Stamina</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1156.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Stamina</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1157.Name: Taiyi Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1157.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase Maximum <{0}_KW>Mana</>
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1157.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Mana</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1158.Name: Jade Lotus Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1158.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase Maximum <{0}_KW>Health</>
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1158.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1159.Name: No-Mind Medicament
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1159.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Defense</>
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1159.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Defense</>
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1160.Name: Iron Bull Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1160.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Stamina recovery rate</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1160.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and moderately increases <{0}_KW>Stamina recovery rate</>
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1161.Name: Yang Supplementing Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1161.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Chill Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1161.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and slightly increases <{0}_KW>Chill Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1162.Name: Bloom Seed Decoction
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1162.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Poison Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1162.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and slightly increases <{0}_KW>Poison Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1163.Name: Water Jade Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1163.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Burn Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1163.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and slightly increases <{0}_KW>Burn Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1164.Name: Wujin Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1164.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase <{0}_KW>Shock Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1164.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine that permanently and slightly increases <{0}_KW>Shock Resistance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1169.Name: Five Skandhas Pill
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1169.BriefDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase multiple attributes.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1169.EffectDesc: A lesser celestial medicine made to increase multiple attributes.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5006.Name: Ashen Slumber
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5006.BriefDesc:
Blow forth flames where ash is laid, for days of glory soon shall fade.

Transform into a rat guai, slashing at the enemy while blowing fierce flames at them, inflicting Scorch Bane.
Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5006.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Chop Wood</><IA>LightAttack</>
Swing the iron blade three times, building up Focus with each hit.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Blow Fire</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
With full Focus, hold Heavy Attack to unleash this skill, exhaling a scorching wave that continuously burns enemies ahead. The longer you hold, the fiercer the flames become. Dodging will not waste Focus built.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Fiery Burst</><IA>Spell_BS</>
Release this Spell to self-explode, causing area Damage and De-Transforming simultaneously.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5008.Name: Dark Thunder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5008.BriefDesc:
In darkness, cunning change doth brew, slow of step yet resolute.

Transform into a horse guai, immune to Thunder Damage, inflicting Thunder Bane on the enemy.
Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5008.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Lightning Lashes</><IA>LightAttack</>
Successively lash the enemy ahead, building up Focus with each strike.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Thunderbolt Sweep</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Successively lash the enemies around, building up Focus with each strike.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Lightning Infusion</><IA>Spell_QS</>
In transformation, this Spell can be released with full Focus.
Raise the whip towards the sky, allowing thunder to infuse you through it, charging you into a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Thrilled State</>.

<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Thunder Flurry</><IA>LightAttack</>
In <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Thrilled State</>, each lash of the whip calls forth a lightning strike to assail the enemy.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Thunder Dominion</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
In <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Thrilled State</>, raise your whip to conjure a Thunder Formation, intermittently striking enemies within its reach.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5014.Name: Ebon Flow
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5014.BriefDesc:
A black wind rises, fate's swift dance, with each retreat, a new advance.

Transform into the Yin Tiger to ward off incoming blows by holding the sword horizontally, or dash forward like a gale to close in on foes.
Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5014.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Onslaught Blade</><IA>LightAttack</>
Raise the great iron blade to strike the target, building up Focus with each hit. As Focus increases, enemies are more easily staggered

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Rift Cleaver</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Hold Heavy Attack to unleash a powerful cleave, dealing massive damage. The more Focus built up, the more devastating the damage becomes.

<{0}_Title>Deflection: Blacksmith</><IA>Spin</>
Raise the blade to deflect assaults, building up Focus with each deflection, or Dodge to switch to other moves.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Windwalker</><IA>Spell_QS</>
Upon full Focus during transformation, convert all Focus into Swiftness, which gradually decays over time. With Swiftness active, dodging transforms you into a gust of wind, allowing you to pass through enemies unimpeded.

<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Stormsurge</><IA>LightAttack</>
Upon entering <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Windwalker state</>, press Light Attack to transform into a gust of wind. Swiftly close in on your target and deliver a devastating blow, inflicting massive Damage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5016.Name: Hoarfrost
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5016.BriefDesc:
Idling on in light of day, by night, remorse comes out to play.

Transforms into Monk from the Sea, weaving strikes with a blizzard's grace and launching attacks that inflict Frost Bane.
Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5016.EffectDesc: Transform into Monk from the Sea.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5016.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Tentacle Flick</><IA>LightAttack</>
Alternate strikes with both tentacles, building Focus with each hit.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Tentacle Sweep</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Swing back the tentacles to sweep attack, amassing more Focus.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Ice Sheet</><IA>Spell_QS</>
With at least 1 Focus Point in transformation, support yourself with the tentacles and create an <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Ice Sheet</> when smashing down. Enemies on the Ice Sheet will suffer from Frost Bane. Up to 3 Focus Points can be built. With more Focus built up, the Ice Sheet will last longer and be broader in range.

<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Snowball Fight</><IA>LightAttack</>
Initiating Light Attacks on the <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Ice Sheet</> hurls snowballs at the enemy, dealing Frost Damage.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Avalanche</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Initiating Heavy Attack on the <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Ice Sheet</> smashes a giant snowball on the enemy, terminating their Chilled State.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5017.Name: Umbral Abyss
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5017.BriefDesc:
Blood-soaked fur, heart of the dark, beware the macaque as his mind is stark.

Transform into the Macaque Chief, immune to Frost, wielding a longsword that unleashes Frost Bane.
Focus built up before transformation can be converted for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5017.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Sprouting Spring</><IA>LightAttack</>
The long blade whirls, delivering consecutive slashes to build up Focus. The last powerful slash deals additional Damage.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Withering Winter</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Slower but heavier, this move deals higher Damage, and builds up Focus faster. The last powerful slash deals additional Damage.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Cold Heart</><IA>Spell_QS</>
With full Focus during transformation, chant the Spell and raise the blade to summon a snowstorm and enter a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Cold-Hearted State</>. In this state, all blade slashes are empowered, and Dodging transforms you into clouds and mist, enabling agile retreats.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Cold Resolution</><IA>Spell_QS</>
In <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Cold-Hearted State</>, this spell enables instant closing in on the enemy, consuming Focus and Might to deal significant Damage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5019.Name: Golden Lining
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5019.BriefDesc:
Golden thunder, lightning's gift, a deadly dance both cruel and swift.

Transforms into Yellow Loong, gaining immunity to Shock and the ability to see through the enemy. Each attack inflicts Thunder Bane.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5019.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Lightning Dance</><IA>LightAttack</>
Dance with a blade of lightning, slashing repeatedly with deft finesse.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Fatal Shadow</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Quietly charges in the shadows and executes a fatal attack upon release.

<{0}_Title>Varied Combo: Unscathed</>
Initiating a Heavy Attack during a Light Attack Combo triggers a Varied Combo. If the enemy strikes during this Varied Combo, you will be able to see through their move and counterattack, earning 1 Focus Point.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Death Trilogy</><IA>HeavyAttack</>
With at least 1 Focus Point, Death Trilogy replaces Fatal Shadow: Yellow Loong leaps into the air, infusing the tip of his blade with thunder, and slams onto the enemy's forehead, dealing massive damage. If followed by another Heavy Attack upon landing, another leap and slam can be performed. This sequence can be repeated up to 3 times. Once this move is executed, all Focus will be emptied.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5024.Name: Azure Dome
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5024.BriefDesc:
Between the boundless dome and mortal plains, this lone monkey stands, unyielding and unstained.

Transform into a stone monkey, gaining immunity to Shock and Poison. Absorb and convert Frost and Scorch to empower yourself. Retain access to the Destined One's Spells, and convert any pre-transformation Focus for use afterward.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5024.Desc:
<{0}_Title>Light Attack: Primal Punch</><IA>LightAttack</>
Unleash a rapid flurry of punches, building up Focus.

<{0}_Title>Heavy Attack: Earthshatter Slam </><IA>HeavyAttack</>
Crouch and gather strength, then leap into the air, bringing both fists down with an earth-shattering strike. If empowered by Scorch or Frost, additional effects can be inflicted on the enemy. Charging can be cancelled by Dodging without losing the Focus built up.

<{0}_Title>Spell: Monkey Mind</><IA>Spell_QS</><IA>Spell_SF</><IA>Spell_HM</> 
Build up Focus and cast a variety of Spells. Each Spell consumes a different amount of Focus based on your Spells set.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10101.Name: Old Headgear
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10101.BriefDesc: The Destined One embarked from Mount Huaguo clad only in these garments that offered mere warmth and coverage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10102.BriefDesc: The Destined One embarked from Mount Huaguo clad only in these garments that offered mere warmth and coverage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10103.BriefDesc: The Destined One embarked from Mount Huaguo clad only in these garments that offered mere warmth and coverage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10102.Name: Old Monk Robe
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10103.Name: Old Bracers
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10104.Name: Old Legwraps
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10104.BriefDesc: The Destined One embarked from Mount Huaguo clad only in these garments that offered mere warmth and coverage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11001.Name: Golden Mask of Fury
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11011.Name: Golden Mask of Fury
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11001.BriefDesc: "Our acquaintance beneath the Buddha proves our bond."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11002.BriefDesc: "Our acquaintance beneath the Buddha proves our bond."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11003.BriefDesc: "Our acquaintance beneath the Buddha proves our bond."

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11004.Name: Golden Greaves
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11014.Name: Golden Greaves
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11701.Name: Bronze Monkey Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11711.Name: Bronze Monkey Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11721.Name: Bronze Monkey Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11731.Name: Bronze Monkey Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11701.BriefDesc: "Once his penalty has been served, someone will come to his aid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11702.BriefDesc: "Once his penalty has been served, someone will come to his aid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11703.BriefDesc: "Once his penalty has been served, someone will come to his aid."

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11712.Name: Bronze Brocade Battlerobe
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11722.Name: Bronze Brocade Battlerobe

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11713.Name: Bronze Armguard

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11714.Name: Bronze Buskins
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11724.Name: Bronze Buskins
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.11734.Name: Bronze Buskins
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15007.Name: Visionary Centipede Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15007.BriefDesc: "Reinforcement in peace whispers impending invasion; willingness to sacrifice small gains signals grander ambition."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15008.Name: Cloud-Patterned Stone Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15008.BriefDesc:
"Threaten not with violence when mercy has been declared.
Act not with mercy, when violence has been introduced."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15018.Name: Adept Spine-Shooting Fuban Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15018.BriefDesc: "What the adept find easy, the inept feel busy."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15019.Name: Bishui Beast Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15019.BriefDesc: "Now his cover is abandoned, his intention revealed: his haste made waste."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15101.Name: Tri-Point Double-Edged Spear
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15101.BriefDesc:
"Long unchallenged, I stood alone. 
Now a rival emerges, my equal shown."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15102.Name: Chu-Bai Spear
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15102.BriefDesc: "I must slice open my belly to rinse clean my innards before I deem myself decent to meet the Buddha."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15999.Name: Ruyi Full Hoop Staff
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.15999.BriefDesc: That piece of iron, a slight hit means death, a light knock means doom, a graze breaks skin, a scrape injures tendons! But it's not this piece!
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16011.Name: Snow Fox Brush
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2403.Name: Snow Fox Brush
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16011.BriefDesc: "Love springs from memory; without memory, love cannot exist."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16015.Name: Tablet of the Three Supremes
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16015.BriefDesc:
"Round pieces, move. Square board, still; 
Echoes of earth and sky, variations, within, fulfil."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16027.Name: Mani Bead
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16027.BriefDesc: "Buddha's bead eludes the common hand; with shallow root, no lotus stand."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17001.Name: Earth Spirit Cap
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17001.BriefDesc: "You said that so-called spirit root is the only one on earth? Well, it has now been uprooted by me."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17002.Name: Snout Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17002.BriefDesc:
"Willows, thick or thin, find use in every weave.
Men, not by face but skill, their worth one should perceive."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17003.Name: Skull of Turtle Treasure
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17003.BriefDesc: "Where Buddhas grace with their presence, there, scriptures and treasures of wisdom naturally rest."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17005.Name: Locust Antennae Mask
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17005.BriefDesc: "In locust form, my words lack weight; I need a better presence to lend me authority."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17007.Name: See No Evil
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17007.BriefDesc: "To his eyes, fair faces hold no charm, mere dust and earth they seem."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17008.Name: Yin-Yang Daoist Robe
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17008.BriefDesc:
"From sky and earth's embrace, all creatures come to be;
Where yin and yang unite, the world's great changes we see."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17009.Name: Venomous Armguard
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17009.BriefDesc: "He who strikes first loses in morality."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.17011.Name: Vajra Armguard
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18004.Name: Medicine Sage Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18005.Name: Medicine Master Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18006.Name: Medicine Buddha Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18010.Name: Supreme Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18010.BriefDesc: "He dumped out the pills in the gourds and chowed down on them like they were fried beans."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18011.Name: Qing-Tian Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.18011.BriefDesc:
"No frowning at destiny, no blaming shall I do.
Integrity I nurture, steadfast and true."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2001.Name: Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2001.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2002.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2003.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2004.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2005.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2006.BriefDesc: "Quickly fetch the coconut wine to toast my triumphant return."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2001.EffectDesc: Each sip restores 33% of Maximum Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2002.Name: 3-Year-Old Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2002.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 36% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2003.Name: 5-Year-Old Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2003.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 40% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2004.Name: 10-Year-Old Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2004.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 43% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2005.Name: 18-Year-Old Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2005.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 46% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2006.Name: 30-Year-Old Coconut Wine
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2006.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 49% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2007.Name: Monkey Brew
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2007.BriefDesc: "In a hometown's embrace, my heart delights. With closest friends, life feels just right."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2007.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 50% of Maximum Health; the older the wine, the greater the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2008.Name: Dry Spirit
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2008.BriefDesc:
"Where lies the tavern to drench my loss? 
The shepherd boy points to Apricot Blossom Village."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2008.EffectDesc: Each sip instantly recovers 18% of Maximum Health, and for a brief moment, slowly recovers 48% of Maximum Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2008.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 18% of Maximum <{0}_KW>Health</>, then recover a moderate amount of Health per second.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2009.Name: Bluebridge Romance
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2009.BriefDesc:
"In timeless wilderness I roam, proudly free,
Such is my life, a romantic spree."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2009.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 36% of Maximum Health; moderately increase <{0}_KW>Movement Speed</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2009.HudEffectDesc:
Recovers 36% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>.
Moderately increases Movement Speed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2010.Name: Lambbrew
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2010.BriefDesc: "Lamb, wine, and fruit on a platter, offered with sincere devotion."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2010.EffectDesc: Each sip instantly recovers 20% of Maximum Health; for a brief moment after, slowly recovers 25% of Maximum Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2010.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 20% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>, then recover a small amount of Health per second.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2011.Name: Worryfree Brew
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2011.BriefDesc: "Hearts unbound, all strife forgotten. This wine brings joy to both men and women."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2011.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 24% of Maximum Health; when at Critical Health, massively increases the recovery.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2011.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 24% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>, massively increases the recovery when at Critical Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2012.Name: Loong Balm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2012.BriefDesc: "Wine burns like fierce flames, anger its smokeless powder."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2012.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 30% of Maximum Health; considerably increases <{0}_KW>Damage</> executed by the next attack.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2012.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 30% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>. Considerably increases Damage for the next attack.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2019.Name: Jade Essence
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2019.BriefDesc: "Wait while I steal a few more gourds-share half a cup each, and we'll live forever."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2019.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 36% of Maximum Health and a moderate amount of <{0}_KW>Mana </>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2019.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 36% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</> and a moderate amount of Mana.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2020.Name: A Thousand Days Inebriation
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2020.BriefDesc:
"Inebriated for a thousand days, at the grand Peach Banquet's affair,
I awoke to find the timeless moon still hung in the air."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2020.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 60% of Maximum Health, but for a brief moment, inebriation impairs movement.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2020.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 60% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>. Inebriation impairs movement.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2021.Name: Jade Dew
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2021.BriefDesc: "Dew moistens the skin, and a kindly breeze flows through."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2021.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 55% of Maximum Health.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2022.Name: Pinebrew
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2022.BriefDesc:
"On the board, pieces move; a sight to please.
With the axe, wood falls, a melody releases.
Beneath clouds, through pines, I stroll with quiet ease."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2022.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 35% of Maximum Health; when Health is below half, using the gourd grants a considerable amount of <{0}_KW>Focus</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2022.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 35% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>. Grants a considerable amount of Focus when Health is below half.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2023.Name: Sunset of the Nine Skies
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2023.BriefDesc: "Who has been invited to the Queen Mother's Peach Banquet?"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2023.EffectDesc: Each sip recovers 35% of Maximum Health; grants a considerable amount of <{0}_KW>Qi</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2023.HudEffectDesc: Recovers 35% of <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>. Grants a considerable amount of Qi.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2301.Name: Guanyin's Willow Leaf
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2301.BriefDesc: "When helplessness abounds, these may save you from your plight."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2301.EffectDesc: Upon resurrection in battle, recovers gourd uses.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2301.HudEffectDesc: After using <{0}_KW>Life-Saving Strand</>, recovers gourd uses.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3201.Name: Licorice
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3201.EffectDesc: "In myriad formulas, licorice reigns, the chancellor of medicines." This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3203.Name: Fragrant Jade Flower
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3203.EffectDesc: Possessing a cool fragrance, it bestows relief and solace upon inhalation. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3205.Name: Fire Bellflower
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3205.EffectDesc: On the barren cliff, only it blooms, like flames, dazzling in their brilliance. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3207.Name: Tree Pearl
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3207.EffectDesc: Grows on pearl trees, casting a luxurious glow. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3208.Name: Celestial Pear
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3208.EffectDesc: Descended to the mortal realm with the Bare-Foot Immortal. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3209.Name: Withered Silkworm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3209.EffectDesc: These are the remnants of silkworm larvae, stricken by the white blight and left to wither. Unfulfilled in their transformation, they bear their natural pallor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3211.Name: Millennium Ginseng
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3211.EffectDesc: Also hailed as "the wrinkled savior", this invaluable herb demands prudence in buyers. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3212.Name: Monkey-Head Fungus
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3212.EffectDesc: This grows from the decayed roots of plants, resembling coral, found only in the mortal realm, absent in the celestial. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3214.Name: Nine-Capped Lingzhi
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3214.EffectDesc: With night caps forming a splendid canopy, this fungus originated in the Celestial Realm, adorning the palace of the Immortals. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3215.Name: Flame Ore
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3215.EffectDesc: The embers, fallen into the mortal realm with the brick from Lord Lao's Eight Trigram Furnace.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3218.Name: Fire Date
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3218.EffectDesc: Originated from the southernmost reaches of the land, the Flaming Mountains species was plant by Rakshasi herself. This can be used to make medicine.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3219.Name: Golden Lotus
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3219.EffectDesc: The plant of the Buddhas. Seeing this auspicious plant signifies the Buddhas' sacred presence. This can be used to make medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3302.Name: Gold Ridge Beast
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3302.EffectDesc: The gold ridge beast once perched on the roof of a Buddha Hall. Maybe it can be exchanged for something valuable.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3304.Name: Bodhisattva's Left Hand
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3304.EffectDesc: The very hand that once plucked lotus from pristine waters, now severed, and lying about. Not knowing what use it may serve, it is advised to stow it for now.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3305.EffectDesc: The very hand that once plucked lotus from pristine waters, now severed, and lying about. Not knowing what use it may serve, it is advised to stow it for now.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3305.Name: Bodhisattva's Right Hand
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3144.Name: Chubai Spearhead
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3144.EffectDesc: The Celestial generals and soldiers craft their weapons from refined steel, just as the previous owner of this spearhead did. This spearhead can be used as a material for weapon crafting.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3903.Name: Heart of Stone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3903.EffectDesc: This heart of stone belonged to one who renounced their faith and slaughtered the divine, and can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3904.Name: Samadhi Wind Agate
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3904.EffectDesc: An agate imbued with the power of the Samadhi Wind. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3905.Name: Samadhi Fire Crystal
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3905.EffectDesc: An opaque and bright crystal, left from molten stone and imbued with the power of the Samadhi Fire. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3906.Name: Spider Leg
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3906.EffectDesc: How pitiful! Though endowed with a tough outer shell, she harbored a soft heart deluded by the illusion of love. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3907.Name: Golden Glowing Eye
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3907.EffectDesc: An eye of the hundred-eyed one, concealed by a golden glow. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3916.Name: Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3916.EffectDesc: Shining like stars, this loong antler commands the mists and clouds. Its purpose lingers in mystery, likely to unfold in times ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3917.Name: Mountain-Shaking Claw
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3917.EffectDesc: With muscles and joints resembling gnarled wooden knots, this loong claw harbors the power to shake mountains. Its purpose lingers in mystery, likely to unfold in times ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3918.Name: Sea-Supporting Tendon
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3918.EffectDesc: Capable of supporting the sky and the sea, this loong tendon is the last relic of the four loong brothers. It may be combined with the rest of the collection. Treat it with care.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3920.Name: Thunderbone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3920.EffectDesc: Emitting lightning, this loong bone strikes with the force of thunder. Its purpose lingers in mystery, likely to unfold in times ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3921.Name: Loong Pearl
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3921.EffectDesc: Shining brightly and dazzling in color, this loong pearl once adorned a loong's chin. Its purpose lingers in mystery, likely to unfold in times ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3923.Name: Cosmo Radiance
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3923.EffectDesc: Round in shape and radiant in appearance, this is the fruit of a peculiar insight into Zen. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3924.Name: Bishui Beast Bit
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3924.EffectDesc: The Bull King fashioned this for his cherished mount. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3925.Name: Sky-Piercing Horn
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3925.EffectDesc: Into the earth it burrows, through the sky it pierces, this singular horn of the beetle bestows its kind the ability to thrive anywhere! This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3926.Name: Deathstinger
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3926.EffectDesc: The infamous Deathsting was bestowed by it. Now that its owner is dead, let it not fall into the hands of others, as it is well-suited for crafting armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3927.Name: The Bull King's Iron Horn
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3927.EffectDesc: A horn taken from a bull's head severed. This can be used in crafting armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3928.Name: The Duskveil's Horn
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3928.EffectDesc: Resentment and curses have condensed upon this filthy horn. This can be used to craft armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3929.Name: Venomous Hair
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3929.EffectDesc: As the lover's hair brushes your palm, venom weaves through your heart. A lingering sting pulses ever onward. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3952.Name: Cold Iron Leaves
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3952.EffectDesc: Slabs of leaf-shaped iron, wrested from the armor of a Yaoguai King, gleam with a cold radiance and resonate with harsh sounds. They can be used in crafting armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3953.Name: Fine Gold Thread
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3953.EffectDesc: Twisted and spun from delicate gold foil, this gold thread is a fortune in itself. This can be used to craft armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3954.Name: Celestial Ribbon
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3954.EffectDesc: The ribbon, from the celestial shuttle's delicate touch, is as light as a cloud and as vibrant as a rainbow. This can be used to craft armor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3962.Name: Kun Steel
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3962.EffectDesc: A piece of steel, forged from the unyielding essence of a spine, that never bends to the relentless tides of time. This can be used in crafting weapons.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3964.Name: Skandha of Feeling
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3964.EffectDesc: "Emotion is the child of uncertainty, born from the touch of experience." Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3965.Name: Skandha of Thought
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3965.EffectDesc: "Justice lies in the lack of heart; wisdom emerges from the absence of ego." Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3966.Name: Skandha of Choice
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3966.EffectDesc: "Seek virtue in the mundane, and tread with care. In everyday parlance, let caution guide your flair." Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3967.Name: Skandha of Consciousness
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3967.EffectDesc: "Adaptability alone uncovers significance in subtlety." Once hidden inside the Buddha's head, this treasure has a secret yet to be revealed.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4001.Name: Sterness of Stone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4001.BriefDesc: "If all I needed were a key, I wouldn't have asked you here."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4002.BriefDesc: "If all I needed were a key, I wouldn't have asked you here."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4001.EffectDesc: The mysterious gadget found on Stone Vanguard's body has a strange shape and might be used to unlock a certain mechanism.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4002.Name: Keeness of Tiger
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4002.EffectDesc: The mysterious gadget found on Tiger Vanguard's body has a strange shape and might be used to unlock a certain mechanism.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4003.Name: Sobering Stone
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4003.BriefDesc: "Even in drowsiness, his heart's clarity remains."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4003.EffectDesc: "A foul-scented stone, perfect for sobering up that drunken pig."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4006.Name: Arhat Gold Piece
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4006.BriefDesc: "With a single blow, I shall reveal the humble clay beneath your gilded facades!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4006.EffectDesc: "Peeling gold from an Arhat statue's face? How outrageous! There surely must be a reason behind such an act."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4009.Name: Old Rattle-Drum
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4009.BriefDesc: "The love for their parents is natural to children from birth."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4009.EffectDesc: "Though this rattle-drum is somewhat worn and tattered, when shaken, it still makes a lively clatter."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4014.Name: Pungent Flesh Chunk
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4014.EffectDesc: Flesh, torn from the foe, emits a pungent reek. It may lure some yaoguais to draw near.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4015.Name: Special-made Bone-Strengthening Pellet
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4015.BriefDesc: "Cast to wilds, joy I've found—thanks abound!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4015.EffectDesc: A bone-strengthening pellet specially made by Xu Dog—hurry, deliver it to the old loong by Bitter Lake, lest he continues his clamor.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4021.Name: The Spirit of Captain Wise-Voice
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4021.BriefDesc: "As the thoughts linger, the spirit slowly wanes."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4022.BriefDesc: "As the thoughts linger, the spirit slowly wanes."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4023.BriefDesc: "As the thoughts linger, the spirit slowly wanes."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4024.BriefDesc: "As the thoughts linger, the spirit slowly wanes."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4021.EffectDesc: A unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated. Why not gather it and explore its potential elsewhere?
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4022.EffectDesc: A unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated. Why not gather it and explore its potential elsewhere?
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4023.EffectDesc: A unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated. Why not gather it and explore its potential elsewhere?
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4024.EffectDesc: A unique cluster of will that cannot be cultivated. Why not gather it and explore its potential elsewhere?
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4022.Name: The Spirit of Captain Kalpa-Wave
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4023.Name: The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4024.Name: The Spirit of Captain Lotus-Vision
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4025.Name: Will Gourd
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4025.BriefDesc: A bottle capable of absorbing Spirits.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4043.Name: Past-Echo
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4043.BriefDesc: "What are you looking at...? Th-This is a gift from Mount Wushan!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4043.EffectDesc: When the Yellow Emperor visited the Queen Mother of the West, he crafted twelve mirrors as offerings. Among these, one had the unique ability to reflect the body's internal organs. Known as the Bone-Reflecting Mirror, this mirror was once prized in the Qin court before it disappeared.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4044.Name: Blood Stained Needle
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4044.BriefDesc: "With our hearts entwined, even after a century together, we still yearn for more time."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4044.EffectDesc: The needle that pierced Bajie's forehead and induced his delusions must possess some uniqueness. It would be wise to retain it.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4054.Name: Rice Cocoons
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4054.EffectDesc: The offerings to the Silkworm Deity. With their use indiscernible for now, it is wise to accept them all as given.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4055.Name: Proto-Amourworm
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4055.BriefDesc: "Every boon has its bane, every loss leads to gain."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.4055.EffectDesc: The metamorphosis of Amourworms is contingent upon their host; however, once morphed, these worms lose the ability to reproduce.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.6001.Name: Jade Lotus Seed
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.6001.EffectDesc: When entrusted to a gardening enthusiast, it may yield <{0}_KW>Jade Lotus</>.
