StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.6002.EffectDesc: When entrusted to a gardening enthusiast, it may yield <{0}_KW>Nine-Capped Lingzhi</> and <{0}_KW>Purple Lingzhi</>.

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.8512.EffectDesc: The thunder one belches lightning, the ice one exhales mist, the poison one spews filth, the fire one breathes flame, and the stone one howls and roars. Upon activating this skill, assume the form of a random frog.

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.8597.Name: Poison Frog
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.8598.Name: Thunder Frog

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5103.Name: Spell Binder
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5103.BriefDesc: Bind Spells, Vessels, Transformations, and Souls Skills to enhance Attack, focusing solely on martial arts to subdue enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5103.EffectDesc: Bind Spells, Vessels, Transformations, and Souls Skills to enhance Attack.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5103.Desc:
An offensive spell activated by slapping the character written on the palm against the chest. It considerably enhances Attack. 

While active, the character emits a continuous golden glow, binding the use of any other Spells, Vessels, Transformations, and Spirit Skills.

When confronted with formidable foes capable of restricting spell-casting, this spell may offer an unexpected advantage.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2401.Name: Ruyi Scroll
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100031.Title: Ruyi Scroll
StringKVMapDesc.LevelDesc.31.Name: Ruyi Scroll
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2401.BriefDesc:
"Worldly praises, like the ocean, ebb and flow,
As clouds above unfurl, then furl and go."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2401.EffectDesc: A scroll gifted by Chen Loong that leads to a secluded and tranquil retreat.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.8595.Name: Ice Frog
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1107.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Body-Fleeting Powder. Upon use, all actions cost no <{0}_KW>Stamina</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1110.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Septenary Heartfire Pill. Upon use, instantly resets the cooldown for all Spells.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1111.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Life-Saving Pill. Upon use, instantly <{0}_KW>recovers full Health</> and removes all Four Bane States.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1113.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Ascension Powder. Upon use, all actions cost no <{0}_KW>Stamina</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1115.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Soul Remigration Pill. Upon use, grants <{0}_KW>resurrection</> upon death before triggering Life Saving Strand for a long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1134.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Fortifying Medicament. Upon use, the <{0}_KW>Tenacity</> effect of certain staff moves is enhanced for a short duration, making them harder to be interrupted by the enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1136.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Mirage Pill. Upon use, instantly gains a considerable amount of <{0}_KW>Might</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1142.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Loong Aura Amplification Pellets. Upon use, significantly increases <{0}_KW>Attack, Critical Hit Chance</>, and <{0}_KW>Critical Hit Damage</> for a relatively long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1144.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Evil Repelling Medicament. Upon use, it grants moderate <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</> for a relatively long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1166.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Enhanced Ginseng Pellets. Upon use, instantly grants massive Focus.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.1168.EffectDesc: An ancient, tattered page records the formula for the Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets. Upon use, considerably increases Attack for a relatively long duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5009.Name: Somersault Cloud
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.5009.BriefDesc: One somersault covers a hundred thousand miles.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10501.BriefDesc:
"In a moment of enlightment, a choice he made,
Great Sage, freed from cycles, his path now laid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10502.BriefDesc:
"In a moment of enlightment, a choice he made,
Great Sage, freed from cycles, his path now laid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10503.BriefDesc:
"In a moment of enlightment, a choice he made,
Great Sage, freed from cycles, his path now laid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.10504.BriefDesc:
"In a moment of enlightment, a choice he made,
Great Sage, freed from cycles, his path now laid."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16028.Name: Boshan Censer
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16028.BriefDesc:
"Incense's sweet aroma, prayers ascend,
Longevity's blessing, suffering's end."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16029.Name: Back Scratcher
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16029.BriefDesc:
"In serene emptiness, troubles fade,
With a scratcher, itches gently evade."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16030.Name: Auspicious Lantern
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16031.Name: Gold Spikeplate
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16031.BriefDesc: "Even if those spikes can't take you down, you'll still be stuck with a lifelong case of tetanus!"
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16032.Name: Beast Buddha
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16032.BriefDesc:
"Beasts or Buddhas, both do bear,
A wrathful side, a fierce glare."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16033.Name: Bronze Buddha Pendant
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16033.BriefDesc: "He had no way of knowing if it was the genuine Guanyin Bodhisattva or an impostor since his judgment relied solely on sight and appearance."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16034.Name: Thunderflame Seal
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16034.BriefDesc: Thunders and flames shall obey, as rightful ascension claims its sway.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16035.Name: Virtuous Bamboo Engraving
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16035.BriefDesc: "Debunked virtues hold less worth than lies."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16036.Name: Spine in the Sack
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16037.Name: White Seashell Waist Chain
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.16037.BriefDesc: "When sworn foes meet, only victory or defeat will suffice."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2324.Name: Graceful Orchid
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2324.BriefDesc: "Rejoice not in longevity, lament not in short life; unboastful in success, unashamed in adversity."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2324.EffectDesc: Using the gourd slowly recovers a small amount of <{0}_KW>Health</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2325.Name: Tender Jade Lotus
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2325.BriefDesc: "Beneath the water, lotus roots intertwine; above the surface, twin blossoms shine."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2325.EffectDesc: Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of <{0}_KW>Defense</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2326.Name: Steel Ginseng
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2326.BriefDesc: "When energy overflows, let it flow; when energy wanes, let it grow."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2326.EffectDesc: Upon using the gourd, instantly gains a moderate amount of <{0}_KW>Focus</>.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2326.HudEffectDesc: Instantly gains a moderate amount of <{0}_KW>Focus</>.

StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2403.BriefDesc: "United, they exacted revenge and erased all grudges."
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.2403.EffectDesc: The lingering resentment of the deceased white fox transformed through her fur into this brush. With it, you can take on her form and fulfill her final wishes.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3309.Name: Blood of the Iron Bull
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3309.EffectDesc: "To achieve greatness, one's efforts must surpass the feat of a mosquito drawing blood from an iron bull." To cultivate a stronger spirit, this is what you need.
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3310.Name: Knot of Voidness
StringKVMapDesc.ItemDesc.3310.EffectDesc: From voidness, it grabs completeness. This is the legendary tool you need for Spirit Cultivation.

<820Privacy_Title>1. Information We Collect</>
The information we collect depends on the services you use and how you use them.

A. Information You Provide Directly to Us
We collect the information you provide to us, such as:
• Your account information, including your email address, phone number, real name, or other identity information;
• Information you provide in response to surveys about our services; and
• Information you provide when seeking help from us, such as your name, phone number, and records of the issues you encounter (including call records).

B. Information You Provide While Playing Online Games
When you play our online games, we collect your in-game profile information, gameplay data, and game data, some of which may be visible in the game.

C. Other Information We Collect When You Use Our Services
When you use our services, we may automatically collect other information, such as:
• IP address;
• Information related to your device, hardware, and software, such as hardware identifiers, mobile device identifiers;
• Approximate geolocation data (derived from IP address or device settings);
• Browser information, including your browser type and language preference;
• Referring and exit pages, including pages viewed and interactions with web content;
• Device event information, including crash reports, requests and referral URLs, and system activity details (e.g., whether you encountered errors or disconnections while playing our games); and
• Other information you may provide when participating in live events (such as your portrait).
We may also use cookies, browser web storage (including HTML 5), and application data caches to collect and store information locally on your device.
Please note that if certain features of our services are provided by third parties, these third parties may also use automatic data collection methods and may record information about your use of the services or other websites over time. These features are subject to third-party privacy notices and policies.

<820Privacy_Title>2. How We Collect Your Information</>
We and third parties use the following technologies to collect information to provide our services.

A. Cookies and Similar Technologies
A cookie is a text file stored on your device or browser when you load a specific website. Cookies have many different functions, such as providing efficient page navigation, remembering your preferences, and improving the overall user experience. For example, cookies may tell us if you have used the services before or if you are a new user.
Cookies are widely used to make websites work better or more efficiently and to report information to website owners. Cookies set by the website owner are called "first-party cookies." Cookies set by parties other than the website owner are called "third-party cookies" (e.g., website analytics).
We use necessary cookies, log files, and similar files or technologies to ensure the services operate normally. With your consent, we may also use non-essential cookies to improve the user experience and analyze website traffic.
The table below explains how we use performance, analytics, and tracking cookies on this website:

StringKVMapDesc.FUStUIWordDesc.1876.Content: This game is intended for users aged 18 and above only.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStUIWordDesc.1888.Content:
1. This game is an action role-playing game intended for uses aged 18 and above.

2. The game is designed with the background of "Journey to the West," featuring both main and side quests, with reasonable adaptations. Gameplay includes level exploration, combat challenges, character development, and requires uses to have a certain level of strategic thinking and physical operation skills. There is no stranger social system with text input functionality within the game.

3. The game includes a user real-name authentication system. Users identified as minors will be subject to the following management:

(1) Users under the age of 18 are not allowed to play the game;
(2) There are no paid content within the game, and users under the age of 18 cannot make payments.

4. The game's creation integrates elements of traditional Chinese culture in aspects such as scene art, character design, and background music, which helps to stimulate players' interest in excellent traditional culture. The game features moderately challenging combat scenarios, encouraging players to achieve goals through thinking and practice, thereby helping to improve players' brain response speed and hand-eye coordination. The overall gameplay is highly strategic, helping players enhance their observational and thinking abilities.

StringKVMapDesc.EquipDesc.16028.EquipEffectDesc: Grants considerable <{0}_KW>Damage Reduction</> when Gourd Use is depleted.
StringKVMapDesc.EquipDesc.16030.EquipEffectDesc: Inflicts chants-beguiled effect to the bearer in <{0}_KW>Cloud Step</>; Moderately increases <{0}_KW>Attack</>, but massively reduces <{0}_KW>Maximum Health</>.
StringKVMapDesc.EquipDesc.16031.EquipEffectDesc: Considerably increases <{0}_KW>Defense</>; deals Damage to surrounding enemies upon taking hits.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.14.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Massively reduces the continuous damage received from <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_State>Poisoned State</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.14.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Significantly increases Attack while suffering from <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_State>Poisoned State</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.15.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Moderately increases the <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Will</> gained from defeating the enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.4.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDes: When Sprinting, each second moderately increases Attack. This effect can stack up to 10 times and will cease upon stopping.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.9.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: In <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Cloud Step</>, shrouding black wind will attack enemies nearby the Destined One and the <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Decoy</> continuously.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.17.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Deals additional Damage to the enemy upon crashing their immobilization.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.17.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Upon crashing the immobilization on the enemy, massively reduces the Cooldown for <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Immobilize Spell</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.3.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: Massively reduces Stamina cost when in water.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.6.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Decoy</> and <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Duplicates</> are cloaked in Yellow Wind, granting them considerable Damage Reduction.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.7.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: Pillar Stance Varied Combos, <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Sweeping Gale</> and <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Churning Gale</>, deal additional Damage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.7.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDes: Unleash the rage within, significantly increasing Damage both dealt and taken.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.8.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: Massively reduces the duration of <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_State>Shocked State</>; moderately increases Thunder Damage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.10.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: For a short duration after performing a <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Spirit Skill</> or using a <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Vessel</> considerably increases Attack.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.10.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Upon Critical Hits and defeats, grants a small amount of <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Qi</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.12.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Upon <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Perfect Dodges</>, grants considerable additional Focus.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.12.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Perfect Dodges</> slightly reduces Cooldown for all Spells.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.13.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Mud that stains upon De-Transformation and exiting Spirit Skills grants considerable <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Damage Reduction</> for a short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.13.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: When stained with mud, increases <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Might</> recovery rate; Dodges and Perfect Dodges also recover a small amount of additional <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Might</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.16.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Upon taking damage, temporarily grants moderate <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Defense</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.16.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Disables Perfect Dodges but grants <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Tenacity</> when Health is below half.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.18.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Upon successful Rock Solid Deflections, massively increases Focus gained by <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Nick of Time</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.18.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Upon successful <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Rock Solid</> Deflections, considerably reduces its Cooldown.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.19.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: Upon taking medicine, grants considerable Focus.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.19.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Considerably increases the duration of all medicinal effects.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.20.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDe: For a short duration after casting a Spell, moderately increases <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Critical Hit Chance</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.20.SuitInfo__1.SuitEffectDe: Upon Critical Hit, slightly reduces Cooldown for all Spells.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.3.RedQualityInfo.RedQuality: When in water, significantly increases the Damage dealt by Light Attack Combo Finishers.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.4.RedQualityInfo.RedQuality: When Sprinting, gains a small amount of Focus per second.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.5.SuitInfo__0.SuitEffectDes: Each new Great Sage's Talent awakened increases the <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Defense</> of this armor set.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.6.RedQualityInfo.RedQuality: Upon performing a successful hit with charged Heavy Attack that cost 4 Focus Points, grants a <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Duplicate</> that lasts for a relatively short duration.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.9.RedQualityInfo.RedQuality: Moderately increases the initial Mana cost of Cloud Step, but the <EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Decoy</> no longer dissipates over time and only disappears when vanquished.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStSuitDesc.12.RedQualityInfo.RedQualit:
Significantly reduces the duration of Invincibility of Dodges. Upon a 
<EquipDetail_SuitDesc_KW>Perfect Dodge</> further reduces Cooldown for all Spells.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100110.DisplayCfg_: <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Perfect Dodges</> leave an illusion in your wake, which explodes instantly, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100205.DisplayCfg_: Grants significant Damage Reduction during <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Light Attack Finisher</>.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100505.DisplayCfg_:
Increases Maximum Focus Points from three to four.

The fourth Focus Point does not sustain for long and its gauge depletes over time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100506.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level slightly increases Damage dealt by all Varied Combos.
Each talent level slightly increases Damage dealt by all Varied Combos.
Each talent level slightly increases Damage dealt by all Varied Combos.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100602.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level considerably increases <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Damage Reduction</> upon a charged Heavy Attack.
Each talent level considerably increases <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Damage Reduction</> upon a charged Heavy Attack.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100603.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level slightly increases the Damage dealt by charged Smash Heavy Attacks.
Each talent level slightly increases the Damage dealt by charged Smash Heavy Attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100604.DisplayCfg_: When charging, <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Perfect Dodges</> retain any Focus that has been built up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100607.DisplayCfg_:
Performing Heavy Attack during Light Attack Combo with a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Focus Point consumed</>, allows the Destined One to execute a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Resolute Strike</>.

During <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Resolute Strike</>, the Destined One can <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>see through</> incoming enemy attacks and nullify their damage.

Enemies that have been seen through are easier to stagger.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100608.DisplayCfg_: Performing Light Attack <IA>B1LightAttack</> upon seeing through the enemy initiates a Light Attack Combo from <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>the third move</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100609.DisplayCfg_:
After a successful hit with Resolute Strike, performing another <IA>B1HeavyAttack</>Heavy Attack that <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>consumes a Focus Point</> executes <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Skyfall Strike</>.

The Destined One leverages his forward momentum, launching himself into the air with his staff to somersault forward, then unleashes a firm downward strike upon his enemy's head.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100610.DisplayCfg_: Grants massive Focus upon seeing through and hitting the enemy with <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Resolute Strike</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100611.DisplayCfg_: After seeing through the enemy, <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Skyfall Strike</> deals more Damage based on the number of Focus Points built.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100701.DisplayCfg_:
Switching to Pillar Stance <IA>B1SwitchWeaponPoseProp</>allows the Destined One to support himself with his staff and ascend to its top by <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>holding Heavy Attack</> <IA>B1HeavyAttack</>, avoiding ground attacks in the process.

The more Focus Point he builds, the higher he perches.

If the staff is hit by the enemy while perching, more Stamina will be consumed to maintain balance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100702.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level moderately reduces the extra Stamina cost for maintaining balance.
Each talent level moderately reduces the extra Stamina cost for maintaining balance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100703.DisplayCfg_: With over 3 Focus Points, the Destined One can use the gourd when perching on the staff.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100704.DisplayCfg_: The Destined One <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>no longer falls to the ground</> when perching but instead executes a Heavy Attack upon Stamina Depletion.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100705.DisplayCfg_:
Performing Heavy Attack during Light Attack Combo will <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>consume a Focus Point</> and execute <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Sweeping Gale</>.

Using it as a pivot, the Destined One grasps his staff with one hand and executes a full aerial spin, delivering sweeping kicks to all nearby enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100706.DisplayCfg_: Grants a considerable amount of Damage Reduction when performing <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Sweeping Gale</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100707.DisplayCfg_:
After a successful hit with Sweeping Gale, performing another Heavy Attack<IA>B1HeavyAttack</> that <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>consumes a Focus Point</> executes <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Churning Gale</>.

The Destined One leverages his forward momentum to execute rapid whirls, churning nearby enemies with his staff.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100708.DisplayCfg_: <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Churning Gale</> depletes all Focus Points and deals additional Damage based on the Points consumed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100801.DisplayCfg_:
Switching to Thrust Stance <IA>B1SwitchWeaponPosePoke</> allows the Destined One to charge by <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>holding Heavy Attack</> <IA>B1HeavyAttack</> while remaining stationary.

Upon <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>releasing Heavy Attack</>, the Destined One can execute a swift thrust attack at a distant enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100802.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level increases Stamina recovery when hitting enemies while in Thrust Stance.
Each talent level increases Stamina recovery when hitting enemies while in Thrust Stance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100803.DisplayCfg_:
After performing Tactical Retreat, Forceful Thrust, or a charged Heavy Attack, <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>hold Light Attack</> to unleash <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Whirling Thrusts</>. 

The Destined One leaps forward to engage the enemy head-on, besetting them with a barrage of staff strikes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100804.DisplayCfg_: Each successful hit with <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Whirling Thrusts</> slightly increases Critical Chance for a short duration. This effect can stack up to 15 times.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100806.DisplayCfg_: When with 4 Focus Points, automatically perform a Thrust Heavy Attack immediately after a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Roll (Dodge) or a Perfect Dodge</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100807.DisplayCfg_:
Following Light Attack with Heavy Attack<IA>B1HeavyAttack</> performs a <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Tactical Retreat</>.

The Destined One hops backward and hones his defenses while preparing for another fierce attack. Following <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Tactical Retreat</> with another Heavy Attack that consumes a Focus Point unleashes <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Forceful Thrust</>.

With both hands clutching his staff, the Destined One executes a fierce thrust attack with an extended attack range, directly at the enemy's face.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100901.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level moderately increases Damage dealt to immobilized enemies.
Each talent level moderately increases Damage dealt to immobilized enemies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100902.DisplayCfg_: When the enemy is immobilized the moment they attack, extends the immobilization duration and massively increases the Damage the enemy takes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100903.DisplayCfg_: Recovers a moderate amount of Mana upon crashing the immobilization on the enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100904.DisplayCfg_: Consumes a moderate amount of additional Mana to massively extend immobilization duration.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100905.DisplayCfg_:
Hitting an immobilized enemy with Light Attack slightly extends the duration of the next immobilization inflicted on them.

This effect can stack up to 5 times.
This effect can stack up to 10 times.

Hitting an immobilized enemy with Light Attack slightly extends the duration of the next immobilization inflicted on them.

This effect can stack up to 5 times.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100906.DisplayCfg_: When an enemy is immobilized, massively increases the engage distance of <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Light Attack Starter</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.100907.DisplayCfg_: Casting Immobilize no longer interrupts <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Light Attack Combo</> <IA>B1LightAttack</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101001.DisplayCfg_: Moderately increases movement speed in Cloud Step.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101002.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level slightly extends the duration of Cloud Step.
Each talent level slightly extends the duration of Cloud Step.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101003.DisplayCfg_: When in Cloud Step, Unveiling Strike can be performed with a charged Heavy Attack <IA>B1HeavyAttack</>.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101004.DisplayCfg_:
Considerably increases the Damage of Unveiling Strike.

The Mana cost of this Spell slightly increases upon awakening this Talent.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101005.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level slightly increases the Critical Hit Chance of Unveiling Strike, which stacks per second while in Cloud Step. This effect can stack up to 10 times.
Each talent level slightly increases the Critical Hit Chance of Unveiling Strike, which stacks per second while in Cloud Step. This effect can stack up to 10 times.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101006.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level considerably increases the Maximum Health of the Decoy.
Each talent level considerably increases the Maximum Health of the Decoy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101007.DisplayCfg_:
When hit, the Decoy will generate a shockwave that attacks surrounding enemies.

This shockwave can trigger only once per second.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101101.DisplayCfg_: Rock Solid can be cancelled at will.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101102.DisplayCfg_: Grants a considerable amount of Focus upon a successful Deflection.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101103.DisplayCfg_:
Recovers a considerable amount of Mana upon a successful Deflection.

The Deflection Window narrows upon awakening this talent.

Recovers a significant amount of Mana upon a successful Deflection.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101104.DisplayCfg_: Increases the Damage of the <SpellDetail_Desc_KW>Light Attack Starter</> succeeding a successful Deflection.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101106.DisplayCfg_: Grants Damage Reduction for a short duration after a Deflection with Rock Solid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101201.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level moderately increases the duration of Duplicates.
Each talent level moderately increases the duration of Duplicates.

After using A Pluck of Many, hitting enemies moderately extends the duration of Duplicates.

This effect can stack up to 10 times.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101203.DisplayCfg_: Each talent level grants an additional Duplicate at the cost of a considerable amount of Mana.
Each talent level grants an additional Duplicate at the cost of a considerable amount of Mana.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101204.DisplayCfg_: At appropriate times, Duplicates can use Immobilize, Ring of Fire, and Rock Solid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101205.DisplayCfg_: Moderately increases the Maximum Health of Duplicates.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101206.DisplayCfg_: Moderately increases the Damage dealt by Duplicates nearby.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101207.DisplayCfg_: Grants a moderate amount of Focus for each successful Light Attack dealt by Duplicates.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101208.DisplayCfg_: Slightly increases the Damage dealt by Duplicates when using another spell after A Pluck of Many.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101303.DisplayCfg_: Standing within the Ring of Fire slowly recovers Health.
While within Ring of Fire, slowly recover more Health.

After staying in Ring of Fire for a short duration, its effect continues even after exiting it.

The Mana cost of this spell moderately increases upon awakening this talent.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101305.DisplayCfg_: Increases Maximum Stamina while within Ring of Fire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101306.DisplayCfg_: Moderately increases Damage Reduction received while within Ring of Fire.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101403.DisplayCfg_: After using Life-Saving Strand, instantly recover a moderate amount of Mana.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101404.DisplayCfg_: When Life-Saving Strand is used, there is a moderate chance that its usage will not be expended.
When Life-Saving Strand is used, there is a moderate chance that its usage will not be expended.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101501.DisplayCfg_: Successfully casting Spell Binder removes all Four Banes States.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101404.DisplayCfg_: Grants a higher chance to not expend Life-Saving Strand usage upon resurrection.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200101.DisplayCfg_: Considerably increases Focus gained upon consecutive successful Light Attack hits.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200102.DisplayCfg_: Upon a successful hit with Unveiling Strike, the Cooldown of this spell is massively reduced.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200104.DisplayCfg_: A glimpse reveals the foes' might. A talent tilts to an unfair fight. Identifies the yaoguais that bear Spirits.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200201.DisplayCfg_: Slightly extends invincibility duration of the first move of all Varied Combos.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200202.DisplayCfg_: Narrows the window of Rock Solid Deflection, but returns half of the Mana cost of the Spell upon a Deflection.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200203.DisplayCfg_: Temporarily increases Attack after a Perfect Dodge.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200204.DisplayCfg_: From the faintest noise, capture the deepest significance. Bold ventures bring both pride and resistance. Echoes of the past can be found where karma lingers.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200301.DisplayCfg_: Gains a moderate Damage Bonus for a short time after casting a spell.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200302.DisplayCfg_: Focus Points can be charged up to 4 within the Ring of Fire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200304.DisplayCfg_: The nose chases fragrance just as the mind craves ecstasy. Enhances the ability to find hidden ingredients in the wild.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200401.DisplayCfg_: After consuming medicine, increases the Critical Hit Chance of the next attack.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200402.DisplayCfg_: Immobilize affects all enemies around the target.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200403.DisplayCfg_: Each equipped Soak slightly increases the Health recovery of the Drink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200404.DisplayCfg_: To embrace its potency, be prepared for its bitterness. Extends the duration of effects for all medicines.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200501.DisplayCfg_: Massively reduces the Stamina cost of all charged Heavy Attacks.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200504.DisplayCfg_: A strong body, an uncertain destiny. Massively reduces fall damage.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101005.DisplayCfg_: Increases Critical Hit Chance stacked per second.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101103.DisplayCfg_: Further narrows the Deflection Window but recovers more Mana.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.101208.DisplayCfg_: Further increases Damage dealt by Duplicates.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStTalentDisplayDesc.200604.DisplayCfg_: Be he Sage or Buddha, the dawn has yet to be brought, just like the mantra. Through memory and obsession, a new journey to the west can be embarked upon.

StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010001.Content: On the go, bent the toe,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010003.Content: Life of human, all for gold.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010005.Content: We cheat death and ever grow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010008.Content: Well well! Luck's around the corner.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010009.Content: Seems like it just fell from a fruit tree here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010011.Content: This peach knew I needed a snack!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101010014.Content: I'll make sure you regret it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020001.Content: No matter how many times you come around.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020002.Content: You are still as mischievous as ever, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020001.Content: I, the Keeper of Black Wind Mountain, have long been waiting for your arrival.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020004.Content: Around here you'll only find trouble, I'm afraid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020009.Content: That's a tough one. Good luck to you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020011.Content: but the Immobilize Spell still works like a charm!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020012.Content: Since you hail from Mount Huaguo,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020013.Content: it won't hurt to teach you a handy trick.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020014.Content: Now, here we go, give me your hand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020016.Content: Should you come across any miscreants,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020017.Content: just point your finger at them,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020019.Content: you'll be able to hold them in place,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020021.Content: Sadly, mine is but a humble trick.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020022.Content: Its power will wear off within a few short moments.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020023.Content: Though it's good enough against boneheads like this one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020024.Content: Anyway, just consider it an ace up your sleeve.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101020027.Content: Fear not! Teach him a lesson with your new spell!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030002.Content: Pluck your hair and make an offer!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030003.Content: Divine birth breeds divine sharpness. Very impressive!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030004.Content: There! The bond has been forged!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030005.Content: Your hair will now revive you in tough times.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030006.Content: It might be humble, but my shrine is very versatile.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030009.Content: Hey! Wait! You don't think you can just parade in, do you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030011.Content: Let me transform you into a golden cicada.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030012.Content: So you may follow the fires ahead,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030015.Content: If you wish to transform again,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101030016.Content: you can find me right here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020020.Content: In the depths of Black Wind Mountain, there are secrets galore.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020021.Content: The cicada form may help you explore,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020022.Content: but be wary this form does not last forever.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020026.Content: Some yaoguais are mightier than others.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020028.Content: they'll see through this disguise, plunging you into an intense fight.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020030.Content: The good thing is the forest has many paths.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020031.Content: As a cicada, you can always change your course.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010002.Content: How dare you to interrupt my meditation...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010004.Content: Why don't you lay down your weapon,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010005.Content: and join me in Buddha's mercy?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020040.Content: You just had to make some noise, did you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020042.Content: When a chime so grand echoes in the forest, yaoguais will surely be alarmed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020043.Content: Stay alert as you continue your path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020045.Content: It's a small forest. You sure took your time frolicking around!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020046.Content: You are a witty one, I must say, getting past all those yaoguais.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101040002.Content: Once, it was bustling with worshippers,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101040003.Content: before it was ruined by that fire...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101040005.Content: But what good is it to rebuild a temple...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101040006.Content: if the goodwill of men has been burnt to ashes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101040008.Content: I will meet you again on the other side of the plank road!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101050002.Content: You don't want to set off that beast.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101050003.Content: In the backyard is Black Wind Guai's ally.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101050005.Content: Considering your strength... I'd suggest you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101050007.Content: Get away while you can, little monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101050008.Content: Once you pass that gate, there's no turning back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020050.Content: I knew you'd prove me wrong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020051.Content: The beast has been roaming this temple for quite a while.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020052.Content: He and his pups came from the west to find shelter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020054.Content: Its nose was sharp, and gaze fierce.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020055.Content: Except for the day of his monthly audience with Black Wind Guai,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020056.Content: I dared not approach the temple.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020058.Content: that black bear won't go easy on you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020060.Content: Why not seize the chance to strip this place bare?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020061.Content: Leastways the trip won't be for nothing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020070.Content: The bamboo grove ahead is covered in a vile mist.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020073.Content: so watch out for anything soft
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010010.Content: This humble one's name is Guangmou.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010011.Content: Should my demise come by your hands,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010012.Content: please pass this message to my master:
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010013.Content: Searching for deity, mortals do aspire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010014.Content: Craving immortality, yaoguais surely will conspire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020083.Content: The evil monks abetted Elder Jinchi to burn the Great Sage and Tang Monk alive...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020085.Content: I thought they were already turned into ashes by that fire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020086.Content: Who would have thought they had turned into yaoguais?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020087.Content: One wolf, one snake, but died in different ways.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020088.Content: Body turned into leaves, how curious!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020089.Content: And there was a white snake slithered away, did you see it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020101.Content: After the bell rang, it seems as though the resentment in the depths of the mountain has grown.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020103.Content: Your presence has already made a mess in the mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020104.Content: Why not go ahead and take them out once and for all?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020005.Content: Late is the hour, young one…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020006.Content: … in which you choose to stain my tranquil abode.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020007.Content: Pray tell, to what end do you seek?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020009.Content: Now you shall face what I truly am!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020111.Content: Three bells were set in the mountain since the Black Wind Guai's return, yet no one is allowed to go near them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020112.Content: Maybe the bells have something to do with the temple's burning.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020113.Content: His words sound like truth to me, little monkey. Stay sharp and keep a lookout!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010021.Content: Oh finally then, the three bells sang!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010022.Content: Disciples come! I hear travelers approaching my temple!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010028.Content: It must be you who took that kasaya!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010033.Content: No, no, no! Stop, stop, stop!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201010035.Content: That kasaya... Leave it... Just leave it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020126.Content: The Great Sage borrowed it from Virupaksa. How did it end up here?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020130.Content: You must have freed that miserable soul.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020132.Content: A tragedy prologued by a single glance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020133.Content: It's getting late. Let's hurry up the mountain!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110004.Content: All those monks consumed by the fire,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110009.Content: I have even restored the charred scriptures...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110011.Content: But oh yes I always knew...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110021.Content: Meet me at the summit if you dare!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110024.Content: but it's not hard to learn.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110025.Content: That black bear's expertise is lacking.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110026.Content: Serving Guanyin didn't help him much.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110031.Content: You still have a lot to learn.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110032.Content: Give yourself the time you need.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110041.Content: "Out of sight, out of mind is a fool's task;"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110042.Content: "seeing but seeing through is what wise men do".
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110051.Content: I'll spare your sorry life for today!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110052.Content: Fortune is no longer on your side.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110053.Content: No one will come to your aid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110054.Content: All I need is to take it elsewhere…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110059.Content: I was just a pawn of the Celestial Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110061.Content: who'd dare to challenge the mighty Wrecker of the Celestial Palace?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110063.Content: No matter how daring he was,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110064.Content: he had not the nerve to harm the Great Sage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110065.Content: There must be someone else pulling all the strings
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110066.Content: Exactly! And this thing is eerie.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110067.Content: I had no idea how to make use of its power,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110068.Content: except to enshrine it up there,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110071.Content: I'll go back to Guanyin to atone for my actions,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110072.Content: and be put back on the Encaging Band.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110073.Content: You will never see me out there anymore!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.101110075.Content: Go now little monkey, go and retrieve the great sage's relic
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020141.Content: That is the summit of Black Wind Mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020142.Content: Atop it is the Great Sage's relic!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020143.Content: The road has led you there, and I know I can't stop you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020144.Content: just as I couldn't stop him back then.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020145.Content: Black Wind Guai has set the place on fire to fight you. You must have pushed him to a dead end.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020146.Content: It reminds me of the fire that day... only fiercer!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020147.Content: I hope you truly are the one destined...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020148.Content: Keep in mind, don't forget to use the Fireproof Mantle when you're in need!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020149.Content: Up you go. I know you're meant to carry on his legacy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010001.Content: Yellow Wind Ridge, a mighty ole' range, once buzzin' with joy and glee.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010002.Content: But the pesky rats took hold, a sudden unfold, turned it all barren and bleak.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010003.Content: The King got denied, rules thrown aside, evil connived, runnin' wild and free.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010004.Content: Wukong went to the Bodhisattva to plead, granting this land a moment o'peace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010005.Content: Yet before long, another disaster struck,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010006.Content: The cursed beast returned on a killin' spree
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010007.Content: The hero, he lies there dead, with the truth hidden from ye and me...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010008.Content: Reckon I got an idea why ye have come here, me friend.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010009.Content: Haste makes waste. I'll lend ye a hand.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010010.Content: Watch your step, eh? Get more shots and you'll be high and dry.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010011.Content: In a land o' bloodshed and chaos' sting, mice and rat mingle without a king.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102010012.Content: No logic in success or strife, the right path may be a different thing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030001.Content: Son, I hear you loud and clear.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030002.Content: How can I not know your sufferings?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030003.Content: But before our Master returns from the valley,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030004.Content: we've got to tough it out.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030006.Content: The lads went out to see the altar the other day.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030007.Content: Said it's stinkin' worse than ever, and covered in bones,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030008.Content: not from men, or livestock, but littered in the remains of our kin!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030009.Content: Curse that furry jackass! Oh, just wait... Wait until master hears about this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030011.Content: Our restoration... we can't say it out loud now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030015.Content: delivering itself all the way to this dump for our lunch!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030021.Content: Fathers and sons, kings and folks,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030022.Content: the former bonds the latter, that's how it goes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030023.Content: These rats have obeyed the rule,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030024.Content: But how come fate snatched the son, and the father flew?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030025.Content:
People crave greatness, but the gate's held. 
The path to glory, a secret withheld.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030026.Content:
His great Samadhi Wind sweeps the land,
Veils the sky with its mighty command.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030027.Content:
To beat the yellow rat, tokens ye'll need,
Get both from his henchmen who ye'll meet.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030029.Content: Yer valor and might, forever be told.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030030.Content: Oh! Heartless monkey, vicious and vile!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030031.Content: Woe! Me heart pains for their death wail!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030032.Content: Father and son, fate's bitter game,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102030033.Content: Headless, I grieve all the same.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102040001.Content: A life for a life, he must pay!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102040003.Content: Help me and atone for your past now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102040005.Content: Go... go and hunt the monkey! I'm your fa…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102050001.Content: Hand-bitten, me disciple turned me foe,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102050002.Content: Heartbroken, me tears drop in woe.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102050005.Content: Me grace taught, his plot sought.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020032.Content: Master's grace taught, deciple's plot sought.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102050007.Content: till me head lost, and me pill cost.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060001.Content: Bloody hell! What's the holdup this time?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060002.Content: Chuck yer offerings and go breed more rats!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060003.Content: If ye dare to muck up the king's practice again,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060004.Content: I'll serve yer dimwit son up for supper meself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060006.Content: Where'd ye come from, ye fur-faced mug?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060007.Content: Who cares anyway! I'll gobble ye up first!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060010.Content:
The tiger deceived them, led them to attack a rock,
But the rock stood firm, leaving hands sore and the tiger's mock.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060011.Content:
Did this one's deceit recall yer true norm?
A stone monkey defies harm in all forms.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100001.Content: Hold yer steps, hold'em true, lest yer head get severed too!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100003.Content: Aye, luckily I've kept it close for its rightful owner.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100004.Content:
A Pluck of Many, deemed as mighty,
Quite a few find it uncanny.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100005.Content:
But if ye'd ask me, I deem it a wee trick,
Shortcuttin makes nothing great.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100010.Content: Besides every sage, a villain resides.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100011.Content: Beneath every mountain, an abyss lies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100012.Content: Where disparities persist, bloodbaths may arise.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100021.Content: Ye stole Erlang's spell and snatched the Great Sage's relic.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100022.Content: Ye even took yer master's head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100023.Content: Just for a short reign over this barren valley?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100025.Content: I am Bodhisattva Lingji of New Mount Sumeru,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100027.Content: After the Great Sage's passing, his Six Senses were scattered across the mortal realm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100028.Content: This thieving rat chanced upon one of them, yet hindered by his meager might,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100029.Content: he could not absorb its power, thus he schemed with wicked intent...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100030.Content: A victim of his deceit, I had my head taken by him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100031.Content: The Sense requires such a grand container to release its power.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100032.Content: I should bear the blame for his reign of havoc upon this ridge again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100033.Content: Through your valor and sagacity, order has been restored.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100034.Content: You are the sole worthy one to keep it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102100035.Content: Please keep it secure in my stead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010001.Content: Guard the gate, and check every house! There's a bounty for that traitor!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010004.Content: Off with you! Now! You might expose me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010008.Content: If them two-heads lay eyes on us, we're both done for!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010009.Content: Our misfortune back home has led us to exile.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010010.Content: We'd hoped to rebuild with the Rat Sage's guidance, but…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010021.Content: but I saw that vanguard of his feasting upon…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010022.Content: Our king has lost his way. Escape was the only choice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010023.Content: The two-heads are the best fighters...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010024.Content: But now, they are hunters of their own kin.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010025.Content: We'll starve hiding here. Let's get out and get this over with!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010026.Content: Why are you still here? Don't put me in danger. Be off!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010028.Content: We dash out; I'll cut them two heads at a time, kin or not!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010029.Content: I'd never take part in slaying kin.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010030.Content: Now that you have rid me of them, it's time for me to go.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010041.Content: With a blinded king, we can never rise again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010042.Content: We must find the missing prince.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010043.Content: The Third Prince? But he's against rats! Remember?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010044.Content: And look at us now. He won't even recognize us. Not one bit!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010045.Content: The King honored rats, that's why the Third Prince left.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010046.Content: Some claim to have seen him far away, somewhere in Buddhas' realm in the West.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010047.Content: We must find it then, but where and how?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010048.Content: I foresaw today when I chose to depart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010042.Content: I foresaw today when I chose to depart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010049.Content: Another master plan of Mount Lingshan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010043.Content: Another master plan of Mount Lingshan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010050.Content: Once a man, now a guai. Death was his relief.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010044.Content: Once a man, now a guai. Death was his relief.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010062.Content: Where's the Buddha? And where's our Prince?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010063.Content: Our cause is lost. Nothing matters now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020003.Content: Some bastard has got me trapped in this rock with his spell!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020004.Content: Even the rocks on the ridge have come to life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020005.Content: In that cave, there's a rock guai lurkin', holdin' secrets, I bet!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020006.Content: Should ye uncover the reason, I shall find me way out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020007.Content: Rocks turnin' into guais... 'Tis no small matter...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020008.Content: Ye are surely a gullible one! I've finally got me hands on the treasure!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020009.Content: Why are ye still here, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020010.Content: Ye ain't expectin' this back, are ye? Shameful!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020016.Content: Ye ain't expectin' another treasure, are ye?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020018.Content: But I can't be handin' it over to ye for free!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020019.Content: Come back later to trade with Will.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020020.Content: Easy there. I'll need a bit o' time to get restocked.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020030.Content: Finest goods in town, won't let ye down!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020031.Content: Rarest stuff to seize, guaranteed to please!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020032.Content: I only sell rare fine wares!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020033.Content: I ain't be sellin' it to no one if it wasn't for ye!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020034.Content: Ye got yerself a right fine bargain!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020035.Content: Ain't none o' me goodies catch yer eye?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020036.Content: Make sure ye fetch more Will next time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020050.Content: Aye, the lad from the village!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020052.Content: His old man murdered neighbors, all to cure the sickly boy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020053.Content: Surely them villagers would come at the lad for revenge.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020056.Content: Why be ye starin' at me, eh? Why would I help him?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020057.Content: I was scared too. Aren't ye expecting too much from an old man?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020060.Content: Why ye gotta go after an old geezer like meself too?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202020061.Content: Think yer somethin', eh? Save the grandstandin' for the true big deal 'round 'ere!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030001.Content: "Raise thy cup, seek answers on high. Who defies death, 'neath every sky?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030003.Content: Ugh, I messed up my mission...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030004.Content: Go find something to sober me up...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030008.Content: Two more jars from Windrest, make it quick!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030007.Content: Enough with the chit-chat. My belly's growling.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030009.Content: The Temple of Crouching Tiger, they say there's meat there. Worth a look!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030010.Content: I must quench this rumbling in my belly first.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030011.Content: This putrid rat meat is insufferable.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030013.Content: Help me score a tasty treat, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030014.Content: I've been craving a taste of that juicy Jade Lotus. Can you find me some in this barren land?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030015.Content: I wouldn't mind some meatless meals from time to time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030016.Content: "Empty stomach, weary limbs, a juicy lotus, my desire brims." Pardon my table manners.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030017.Content: You've been suspiciously following me around, but you've proven your worth.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030018.Content: Care to accompany me to the rat village?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030020.Content: I have stumbled upon some interesting leads.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030021.Content: The Realm of Gold does hold a connection to this desolate land.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030028.Content: I hear the Realm of Gold is where the sun sets. There, they held rats above all others.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030029.Content: And somehow, before we knew it, the realm was gone. Quite odd, that is.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030023.Content: Its people are not yet extinct. I suspect the Yellow Wind Guai had a role in their downfall.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030024.Content: No time to dawdle. I must go back there to investigate further.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030025.Content: The kingdom was once abundant with gold, yet its downfall remains an enigma.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030026.Content: The feast first, then the toil. Hunger brings no spoils!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030027.Content: You should eat more, skinny. Off we go! To the Temple of Crouching Tiger.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030030.Content: Where did you acquire my brother's gold piece?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030035.Content: I just tried those rat guais. They taste like men flesh.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030036.Content: Those guais came from Sandgate. I should dig into the secrets of that village.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030037.Content: These people had a past with the Yellow Wind Guai. This is most likely his doing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030038.Content: Our senior brother gave me a piece of gold. I'll need it here when the time's right, he said.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030039.Content: It's the right time now. I'm taking it to the right place to give it a try.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030040.Content: What an excellent fight! The intensity!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030041.Content: This is good. You and I should explore that realm together!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030050.Content: Men in our time do not see the ancient moon, but this moon hath shone on men of yore.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030051.Content: Behold! Be it the realm of sunset or the realm of gold, it's but an echo of the past.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030052.Content: Legends speak of an ancient colossal beetle in these sands.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030053.Content: Whilst deep in slumber, it lay hidden beneath the earth's embrace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030054.Content: When awakened, it would devour all souls that crossed its path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030055.Content: Its shell, harder than stone, defied the strikes of common arms.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030056.Content: It struck fear into travelling merchants and wider, to neighboring realms.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030057.Content: But a yellow-furred rat sensed the immense power emanating from the insect.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030058.Content: He halted the beetle's havoc and harnessed it for his own ends.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030059.Content: Overjoyed, the king named the rat guai the Royal Sage,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030060.Content: and built a shrine in his honor.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030061.Content: The bound beetle was a perfect source of power so the rat stayed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030062.Content: He seized the Tang Monk using the new power and battled with Sun Wukong upon the Yellow Wind Ridge...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030063.Content: The guai's formidable winds veiled the vast expanse of the sky.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030064.Content: Were it not for Bodhisattva Lingji, Tang Monk's quest for the scriptures would have failed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030065.Content: Yet, stripped of the rat's protection, the kingdom was plunged into a state of ruin.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030066.Content: The once lush Yellow Wind Ridge now lies a desolate wasteland...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030067.Content: The cruelty of time. As I'll say, "raise your glass, now's the bliss; present's charm, not to miss!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030068.Content: Come, share a drink with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030032.Content: I shall refrain from imbibing once more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202030033.Content: How did I lose Brother's gold token?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040001.Content: You come at a good moment.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040002.Content: One of my formulas was swallowed by a petty frog.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040003.Content: Stay and help. A deity like myself will not short you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040004.Content: Sandgate is a perilous place. You think you can venture there without healing pills?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040005.Content: I'm a deity to my word. Slay that clamorous pest, and you won't be let down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040011.Content: Man follows Earth, Earth follows Sky, Sky follows Dao, Dao follows nature.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040013.Content: These common pills, I grant you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040020.Content: You scoundrel! How dare you disrespect an Immortal!?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040021.Content: My connections in the Celestial Court should give you a good scare!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040024.Content: For retrieving this furnace stolen by that rat, I nearly met my end!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040032.Content: I can never repay you for saving my life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040033.Content: Here, a token of my gratitude.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040040.Content: "Quell thy inner turmoil, and thou shalt attain the Dao." Ablaze!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040045.Content: "Seek from within to ascend; seek from without to craft pills."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040046.Content: "From Yin and Yang, Five Elements emerge."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040047.Content: "Each nature inherits its unique creation, each form embodies a universe."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040048.Content: "Uncover the secrets of Heaven and Earth, and thou shalt have pills."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040049.Content: A wondrous marvel of the universe!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040050.Content: All things can be my material, yet I choose the rarest few.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040051.Content: Come to me anytime if you need more pills.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040052.Content: "Mine eyes doth see the Dao from the confines of my abode." Greeting, brave one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040053.Content: May Lord Lao illuminate your path, brave one
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040054.Content: "Self-refinement is the way to make golden pills." What say you, brave one?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050002.Content: That is the rattle-drum my pa gave me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050003.Content: Where is my pa? Did you see him?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050004.Content: I was scared. They were all around me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050005.Content: They told me, Pa took people from the village and fed them to a guai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050006.Content: That's a lie! That's not my pa!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050012.Content: Pa told me, when the dust stops, my cough ends.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050013.Content: I know you're not from around here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050014.Content: Don't frown like that. Our village is fun!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050015.Content: I know an old man in the stone and a piggy who steals all the drinks.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050016.Content: And at the bottom of that well...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050029.Content: Hmm? How did you even know I was here?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050030.Content: Just Pa and I know of this place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050031.Content: Hey! Time to play, I'm back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050032.Content: Don't tell anyone, but I have a friend in this well. He helped me with my coughing fit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050033.Content: It's been so long. I hope his wounds have healed too...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050034.Content: Come down and play with us!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050040.Content: Rotten mutt. And he dares bear our father's title under that Yellow Wind guai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050041.Content: Brother or not, I will have my vengeance!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050043.Content: The kid's dad ran off, but now you've shown up to be eaten!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050050.Content: For what deed, must his head be hung for all to see?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050051.Content: For what deed, must the waters they governed roam free?
StringKVMapDesc.AchievementDesc.32.AchiDesc: "For what deed, must the four waters they governed roam free?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050052.Content: For what deed, must all matters not know how to be?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050053.Content: For what deed, must mercy's hand sow woe upon thee?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050054.Content: For what deed, must the red one into the woods flee?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050055.Content: Smoke rises high, from wood afire. Hit the back, let the beats respire, as in mist, thunders conspire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050060.Content: For what deed, must from streams into sands thou flee?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050061.Content: Resonant waves profound, pulsing through the ground. Evade their might unbound, and victory is surely found.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050062.Content: For what deed, must the cyan one onto the shores flee?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050063.Content: Evening light on snow, paths clear below. Lightning strikes in flow; all happens before you know.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050064.Content: For what deed, must the yellow one to the shrines flee?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202050065.Content: In the air they swing, to the earth they bring. With snowflakes cling, spirit may wear thin.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202060001.Content: (On the cliff it says: Bound by six seals, eternally confined. In yellow earth, the evil's fate entwined.)
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010002.Content: You, traveler. Back to where you belong, or meet your end here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010003.Content: I am the vanguard of the Yellow Wind King. I patrol this land by royal decree.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010004.Content: A yaoguai lurks in these sands, a scourge to the common folk.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010005.Content: Our king seeks to subdue it. Commoners must not intrude.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010006.Content: It will be on my head if any heedless fools trouble our king.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010007.Content: You scorn my words? I'll have you served at the king's dinner!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010008.Content: Such fierce staff work. You wield grand might!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010009.Content: Brave soul, why not use this might to aid my king's good deed?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010010.Content: Our king comes from Mount Lingshan. His kind heart seeks to end the place's suffering.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010011.Content: The yaoguai's skills run deep. Yet with your help, our chances will be doubled.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010012.Content: The king is just ahead. With my meager skills, I cannot join you. Please, go aid him quickly!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010013.Content: Truth be known, being a father of two little ones, my life is not mine to give.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010014.Content: Worry not. The Yellow Wind King is a noble disciple from Mount Lingshan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212010015.Content: Go and meet him. A good karma awaits you there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020002.Content: Then you do indeed have skills.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020003.Content: That yaoguai must have some vessel that counters me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020004.Content: Even my Samadhi Wind can't hurt it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020005.Content: There is only one way to draw out this yaoguai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020006.Content: I'll sound the drums and it'll come forward.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020007.Content: If you are willing, I ask you to seize its vessel at the right time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020008.Content: Then, the yaoguai will be mine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020009.Content: Here at the western end of the world, each day the sun sets and boils the sea.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020010.Content: The boiling hiss is sharp enough to ravage babies in their cradles.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020011.Content: The people sound drums to counter the impact, but the drums draw this yaoguai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020012.Content: The vessel this yaoguai holds protects it from me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020013.Content: Your boldness in venturing here is clear. Aid me with this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020014.Content: It's right here beneath us in the sands. Together, we shall rid the people of this wretched yaoguai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.212020017.Content: On the folk's behalf, I thank you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010001.Content: Faith and devotion, quite the notion.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010002.Content: Yet how many can claim a mind so pure, still and sure?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010004.Content: through the heavy snow you roam,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010006.Content: I read your fortune before you came.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010008.Content: "Act not and be still, thy gifts art thy ill."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010009.Content: If you seek your own end, I shall not stop you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010010.Content: I, the Keeper of the New West, welcome the Destined One!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010020.Content: See that temple on the lake?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010021.Content: Therein lies the thing you seek.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010022.Content: The lord of this land is away. Seize it now and leave!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010032.Content: When that monkey was alive, he was all about weeping and begging for help.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010033.Content: Now, even in death, he led all you younglings right to me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010034.Content: This sack of mine can barely fit you all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010035.Content: Kang-Jin Loong, now that you are ready,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010036.Content: go and weigh up this one for your master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010037.Content: See if this monkey merits a place amongst my disciples.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010042.Content: Dark-furred, devious-natured. Hunting that guai is no simple task.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010043.Content: You do have some skills, but this land bites with cold.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010044.Content: Lack of readiness could be your undoing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010045.Content: Our reunion is destined, and so is my role to teach you this little trick.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010046.Content: I am extraordinary, as is my flame.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010047.Content: It shall help you in need, be it injury, weariness, or frostbite.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010048.Content: Beasts or yaoguais, none shall dare to draw nigh.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010051.Content: Keep at it, you could melt into blood and pus.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010052.Content: Darling come on, it's perfectly cool in here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010053.Content: Join me inside for some yin-yang practice, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010055.Content: Let go of your stubbornness, and I could request Master to set you free.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010056.Content: Then I'd be open to joining you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010058.Content: That old bastard has really made good use of Wukong's relic.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010059.Content: Even you, a Celestial Courtier, bend to his will.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010060.Content: Yet, my ears tell me that the Destined One has stopped the mani wheel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010061.Content: Pity. Reckon it won't be your master who unlocks these metals eventually.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010062.Content: These Gold Cymbals are made by our Grandmaster, and you think a puny monkey can go beyond that?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010064.Content: How could you know he is here below?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010066.Content: I caught a whiff of monkey stench,
