StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010067.Content: familiar enough for me to sound my welcome!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010068.Content: Master valued your talents. He kept you alive beneath the pagoda for your own good.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010070.Content: Evidentally, you just don't deserve the ecstasy of the New West!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010080.Content: Master's right, monkeys are set in their ways.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010081.Content: Still though...you'll never crack the Gold Cymbals!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010082.Content: What took you so long? Constipation?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010083.Content: I was nearly cooked alive in there!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010087.Content: Wasn't even worth my second glance back in the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010089.Content: A furry coat and a pinched face. Luck's all you've got.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010090.Content: Great, another mute. Whatever, let's not dally.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010091.Content: Now, the turtle and I have shared a few tales.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010100.Content: That Yellowbrow is not like other foes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010101.Content: That old monkey from Mount Huaguo asked me to back you up here to save you from his ugly tricks.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010102.Content: He told me that once we gathered all six relics, we could bring Wukong back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010103.Content: Let's say I buy it for now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010104.Content: I'll go and catch up with him first, you take a look around.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010105.Content: I was only a few days ahead of you but was trapped in this stupid thing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010106.Content: Days and days with her bullshit, I'd be better off dead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010107.Content: But he hasn't the nerve to kill me, that Yellowbrow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010108.Content: You see how greedy he is?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010109.Content: Fit or unfit, he's taking them all in. Wonder when his ego will burst.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010111.Content: Come on, boy, let me hear a hearty "Uncle Bajie"!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010112.Content: My old friend, you must have had it rough all these years in this shithole.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010114.Content: once we're ashore, I'll take down that blasted temple…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010115.Content: to avenge you and Brother Snake.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010118.Content: Dead or alive, all suffer the same. Should be better off staying a stone.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010120.Content: Go check if that loong is really dead. Her lackeys might lurk somewhere.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010121.Content: Come on. Cut the weeps and whines, will you? You are too old for those.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010123.Content: Stay here and wait, I'll check on your snake pal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010130.Content: Oi, kid! You look suspicious. What kind of yaoguai are you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010131.Content: Shh... I'm looking at that Buddha over there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010132.Content: See his belly button? It's so big.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010133.Content: Me, and you, we look way smaller!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010135.Content: You see no Buddha because you think no Buddha.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010137.Content: I, the Sacred Gourmand, saw enough Buddhas before you were even born.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010138.Content: Foolish brat! You didn't see that coming, did you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010139.Content: True hearts find their path, and the Buddha is on that path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010140.Content: Why not worship around with true hearts, for Buddhas may light your path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010142.Content: Visit temples, kneel to figures, tell no black from white—that's my master!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010143.Content: I am fed up with all these skin-deep rites.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010144.Content: No true heart, the path is sealed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010150.Content: Chubby one, we've done the rites. Where's the path?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010151.Content: The path? Isn't it always there?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010152.Content: Don't you trick me, you bald, potbellied brat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010153.Content: All I'm seeing are mountains. No path at all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010157.Content: You must be that trickster himself, fooling us all along!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010159.Content: Why so rude? I didn't force you to kneel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010160.Content: Throwing a tantrum at this age? Shame on you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010162.Content: Save your stupid path. I'll burrow one myself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010163.Content: You go on first. I'll meet you at the summit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010170.Content: Ages ago, Jinchanzi and I were peers.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010171.Content: Ever questing with good will, he was.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010172.Content: His nature made him question the supremacy of us beyond mortal woe and grief.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010173.Content: He deemed all souls could be akin to us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010174.Content: "Why then do we tower, whilst others merely kneel and offer?" He asked.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010175.Content: I told him, the others are less than us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010176.Content: He disagreed, and bets were placed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010177.Content: Each time, the victory was mine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010178.Content: His misstep cast him back into the endless cycle.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010180.Content: Among them, one was known for a grand revolt of age past.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010181.Content: But what came of that? All remains unchanged.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010183.Content: One ended up a corpse, others fugitives. He too took to the shadows.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010184.Content: Pathetic. Those journeyers have misplaced their worship.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010185.Content: Why bet on the Sutra, when one oneself can be a Buddha?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010186.Content: Kneel before the Buddha of the Future!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010190.Content: Idiot! That trickster caught you too?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010191.Content: This wicked sack is much more vicious than before, nurturing such evilness!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010192.Content: So that's how he made them bend to his will...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010193.Content: By eating away at their sanity, this sack made them puppets.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010194.Content: Yellowbrow must have woven Wukong's strength into it. That bastard!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010195.Content: Join me, let's fight our way out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010201.Content: Yes, just like that, that's who you are!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010202.Content: Here, let me quench your thirst for blood!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010203.Content: Keep your wits, boy! Don't get swayed!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010210.Content: This rogue stole my Seedsack and fled here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010211.Content: With Wukong's relic, he made it a soul-snatching vessel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010212.Content: He also took my look and my name to trick his old foes into vengance...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010213.Content: You potbelly! I should've figured out it was you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010217.Content: Your doubt is fair. I shouldn't have underestimated his nerve.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010218.Content: I meant to subdue him myself, but you two were swifter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010219.Content: Fortune favors you, Bajie. But I see great potential in this young one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010220.Content: He might just be... the right monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010222.Content: I don't care if Yellowbrow drowns in the lake.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010223.Content: We can't have Wukong's relic sink with him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010224.Content: For that. Pray, lend me that rake of yours.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010001.Content: I know this whiff of monkey stench.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010003.Content: Wanderers in this place meet their demise!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010005.Content: One does not simply leave the cage that Yellowbrow toiled to build.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010006.Content: And for those who tried? Some went mad, and the rest, dead!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010008.Content: Here is where one's mind ebbs away with the tides of chants.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010010.Content: Why bother fighting it? Just abandon your senses and wait for your end, like me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010011.Content: Go back now. Don't close your ears to my words.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010012.Content: Can't be advised, you are just like him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010013.Content: Oh, it's you. You're still alive?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010014.Content: And I see you've slain one of my captains and helped yourself to break in.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010015.Content: Four loyal captains. Now, four bewildered souls.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010016.Content: Can you free them from that pain, if you truly are the Destined One?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010017.Content: He posed as Maitreya and tricked us here for a false feast.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010018.Content: And I was foolish enough to fall for his trap. My men suffer because of me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010019.Content: Four mighty captains, now mere pawns of Yellowbrow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010020.Content: I got rid of my eyes and ears to shield myself from these beguiling chants.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010021.Content: I've held on because one day, I may save my captains from their torment,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010022.Content: take them away from this frozen land, and bring them home.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010023.Content: I ask no more but this: end their plight with your hand,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010024.Content: and carry back their souls. You must do this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010026.Content: He might be the true Destined One!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010027.Content: I once led my captains against Yellowbrow, in aid of the Great Sage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010028.Content: But I was trapped by the Seedsack; a mistake you cannot repeat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010029.Content: "Yaoguais fell in his hands, a hero of the lands."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010030.Content: What kind of hero am I?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010032.Content: With that relic, Yellowbrow now harbors greater desires than ever.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010033.Content: Your chance may arise as he grows obsessed with his own ego.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010034.Content: Thank you for bringing them back. Their suffering has ended.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010035.Content: When I left home young, I too saw myself as destined.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010037.Content: and the destiny of those who followed my cause.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010039.Content: Take this. I don't need it anymore.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010040.Content: Who are you? I heard the Great Sage is dead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010041.Content: But what's the difference between life and death? For we live in such a troubled age.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030001.Content: No more yaoguai! Away! Away from me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030002.Content: I don't want to die! I don't want to die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030005.Content: Wait, you won't eat me, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030006.Content: I was... I was on a treasure hunt, but I ended up being the hunted.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030007.Content: I owe you my life, sir. I'll share the treasure with you once I find it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030008.Content: Say, why is there nothing but yaoguais in this so-called Buddhas' realm?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030009.Content: Can I look to you to save me again, sir, if they come back?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030010.Content: Green without, round and sweet. Red within, a summer treat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030011.Content: Where can I find something like that in this frozen land?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030017.Content: I would be dead if it weren't for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030019.Content: I heard that Buddha planted watermelons here hundreds of years ago.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030021.Content: Yet, when the cold bites all around, without your powerful spells,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030022.Content: there is no way I can find it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030023.Content: Someone once saw a chubby boy jump from the cliff with a watermelon in his arms.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030024.Content: He rushed to the edge of the cliff but saw no movement down there. Seemed like a certain death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030025.Content: But suddenly, he heard the boy laughing from beneath, on and on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030026.Content: Bewildered, he fled from the cliff.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030027.Content: This story may offer a clue for my treasure hunt.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030028.Content: Maybe the watermelons were planted under the cliff?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030029.Content: Don't let me keep you, sir.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030030.Content: I will leave by myself when I feel warm enough.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030031.Content: Time and again, I tested you, and saw nothing but gullible goodness.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030032.Content: Our brother does misjudge as well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030033.Content: It requires no effort to trick you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030034.Content: You will never be the Destined One. Let me help you end your sorry life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030036.Content: I've done as our brother asked. Till we meet again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010001.Content: My friend, we've struck gold with this task, haven't we?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010003.Content: My bones are cracking from lugging this load!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010004.Content: Step it up! I gotta catch that feast on time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010006.Content: They say there's a treasure in the Webbed Hollow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010007.Content: A treasure in a hole down in the mortal realm? I don't think so.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010008.Content: Our Lady won't even step into the place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010009.Content: Besides, do you really think those spiders would leave anything for us?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010010.Content: Hear me out. They say that hag has her quirky ways.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010015.Content: Each season, she'd wed a mate, then devour him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010016.Content: Once, our Lady brought her a wedding gift: a mirror...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010020.Content: The Lady often speaks of it with regrets, I wonder why...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010022.Content: The hag got the mirror and looked into it. And for no reason at all, she threw it away!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010023.Content: That soured our Lady's mood. She stopped visiting since then.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010024.Content: Hey, I say we should take our chance to sneak into that hollow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010025.Content: We find that mirror, fix it, and offer it to our Lady. Imagine the rewards we'll get!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010028.Content: Let's not rush it. We need a plan before we get in...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010030.Content: Couldn't even catch a wink of sleep this whole time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010032.Content: How dare you spoil the gifts from Mount Wushan!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010033.Content: No place to find peace these days.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010034.Content: Hey lovely, why don't you come down and join us?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010040.Content: Now, there's a feast we must catch.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010041.Content: I wonder what's waiting for us...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010042.Content: Let me take a look; what've you got there?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010043.Content: Search that chest. There must be something good in it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010045.Content: Let me fix you up a little.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010046.Content: Welcome, good sirs! The feast is all set. Please come in and be our guests!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010048.Content: Is your Lady not joining us again this time?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010049.Content: Our Lady prefers not to be seen in the lower realm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010050.Content: But she's been thinking of you all and sent this small token.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010060.Content: She hopes your Lady will recover soon and pay her a visit up there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010061.Content: It's a pity she didn't come.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010062.Content: Or she would certainly enjoy a splendid show we've prepared for her.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010064.Content: the gift's gone, and blood's been shed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010066.Content: You two should take the fall!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010067.Content: We're just servants, Madam. What's the jest?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010069.Content: I know you find your look embarrassing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010070.Content: But why hide from my mother with another pig face?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010072.Content: Don't you know I'm a pious Buddhist? Give me your mother's name, and I'll check my list.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010074.Content: After you ruined her House and her reputation,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010075.Content: you're telling me you don't remember her?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010078.Content: All she cared about was lust!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010079.Content: Now I know, you're one of her spiderlings, aren't you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010081.Content: Your rudeness is forgiven. Show some respect, maybe I'll kindly pay your mother a visit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010085.Content: Bugs are bugs. Wearing human skin can't change your gross nature.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010087.Content: We are so low compared to you, a glorious Admiral of the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010088.Content: Ain't the last monkey still fresh in his grave?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010089.Content: And here you are, another monkey's sidekick.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010091.Content: Get your mother to beg for mercy,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010092.Content: and maybe I'll spare your foolish life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010093.Content: Truth is, the thing you seek is right here in the hollow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010094.Content: Flee now if you're too scared to come in.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010096.Content: I'll destroy this rotten hole right now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010097.Content: Let's see where else you'd build your lair!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010100.Content: I've laid your path for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010101.Content: But where will my path be?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010102.Content: From now on, we're both on our own.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010114.Content: So excited about the wedding, been dreaming about yours?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010115.Content: You little brat, dare to tease me! Come here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010116.Content: Stop it! I take it back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010119.Content: Apologies for keeping you waiting, sisters.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010120.Content: Wow. Is he really the one Mother's been expecting?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010121.Content: I thought he would look better…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010122.Content: He's not much to look at...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010123.Content: But as long as Mother is happy...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010124.Content: Not much of a looker, but quite a fighter, though.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010125.Content: Had to use Mother's ancestral vessel to take him down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010129.Content: Why not let us sisters have it first?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010131.Content: This is the one Mother is set on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010133.Content: and none of us would like the results.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010135.Content: We are bound to this ill place, one generation after another.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010140.Content: the feast is yet to start.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010141.Content: Don't tell me you're drunk already.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010142.Content: Right. He's nothing but Mother's meal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010143.Content: No need to make a big fuss over him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010148.Content: Mother has grown soft with age,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010149.Content: and the girls are too young to know better.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010150.Content: But can't you see it's all wrong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010151.Content: Yes, but try to think from her position.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010152.Content: We're her children. This is what we do.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010153.Content: But I am on her side!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010154.Content: For decades she's been tortured by her wound
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010155.Content: all thanks to this dumb thing!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010156.Content: And yet she still wants to marry him?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010159.Content: Love is not about forgiving or getting even.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010160.Content: It is never a fair game.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010161.Content: It's about two souls woven together by fate.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010162.Content: Neither of us was born then.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010164.Content: That's why we can't understand her obsession today.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010168.Content: it's still joy before it's returned.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010171.Content: Now, listen carefully for your own good.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010173.Content: Only, she prefers to dine alone.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010174.Content: You wouldn't want to disturb her.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010176.Content: don't look at her in the face,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010178.Content: Hurry, we are running out of time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010179.Content: My words, keep them in mind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010180.Content: Go. There's no time to waste.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010182.Content: I have been waiting for so, so long.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010183.Content: Years up there haven't been kind to you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010200.Content: I'll never leave you again, my love, I promise! It'll be just us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010201.Content: Look at this place. Perfect for our yin-yang practice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010202.Content: I say we'd make the best couple. What do you think?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010204.Content: I am done with your lip service.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010205.Content: Even though I know none of your words are true...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010206.Content: I still want to believe them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010208.Content: We're wedded now. For the rest of my whole life, I will always stay faithful...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010210.Content: Yes, we are a vowed couple now, but how much is it worth?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010211.Content: You made no vow to that monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010212.Content: Yet you're always faithful to him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010213.Content: How faithful you were when you helped him slew my sisters in cold blood?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010220.Content: Why dredge up the past? Aren't we here now?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010221.Content: Don't you remember how I spared your life when he asked me to clean up the rest of your sisters?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010224.Content: I even remember how I survived on my sisters' flesh after you left!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010225.Content: That's not all on us. The culprit is that centipede!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010226.Content: All would have lived if he didn't weigh my master's flesh over your lives.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010227.Content: Yes... he was blinded by greed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010228.Content: But he has repented and made his compensation.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010229.Content: He even offered that thing to sustain my life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010230.Content: Otherwise, I'd never live to see you today.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010232.Content: That thing is in your hands?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010239.Content: For me, beauty always comes first!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010240.Content: Good, carry on with these nice words.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010242.Content: I might lift my finger, and tell you where to find it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010243.Content: You wicked hag! Can't you see your old face?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010244.Content: Still obsessed with all this lovey-dovey crap at this age.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010249.Content: to eat you right after we mate!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010252.Content: Could've saved me from your stupid ceremony and vows.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010259.Content: Hideous! Hideous spider! Who fathered such a thing?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010260.Content: Your fate today has nothing to do with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010261.Content: I had my mercy misplaced, that's all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010262.Content: What took you so long? I almost died!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010263.Content: Now go beat this hag and get me down!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010267.Content: Why do you always have to ruin my plans?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010269.Content: am I any less than monkeys?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010281.Content: Go after her. She has the relic.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010282.Content: Go! I can take care of myself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990176.Content: Go! I can take care of myself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010292.Content: So... Both my trap and my vessel failed. But how?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010295.Content: The Destined One then arrived and bested me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010296.Content: Now the monkey has ransacked our hollow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010297.Content: A mere monkey showing such disrespect.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010300.Content: Fear not. I'll deal with him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010306.Content: Despite all your failures, you led the Destined One here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010307.Content: I should reward you for that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010308.Content: But the thing I gave you,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010309.Content: now I must have it back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010310.Content: This, along with those relics inside him,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010311.Content: shall free me of Kunlun's reign.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010312.Content: Rest assured, darling. I'll avenge you…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010313.Content: Now, let go of your misery and rest in peace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020001.Content: My eyes are opened! The sack could be my long-awaited chance to ascend!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020002.Content: Invigorating! I never thought of such power from a sack.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020003.Content: Know thyself, know thy foe. In this way, I may meet my brother's wish.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020005.Content: The Destined One should be here any moment now, my brother told me of it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020006.Content: Surely, he didn't send anyone to any better place than where I am.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020010.Content: Days of practice, eight arms of mightiness!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020013.Content: By my brother's words, I will first test your worth.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020014.Content: Hold your smirk, you audacious monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020015.Content: We'll settle our scores when I reach my full mastery!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020016.Content: I stepped into the sack for nothing but your sake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020017.Content: I'd appreciate a "thank you", but you gave me torn arms!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020018.Content: Now, in compensation, I'll claim yours!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020019.Content: I see now...There's never ascension from those sacks.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020021.Content: That old Daoist fooled me. My challenge was a delusion! Forget it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204020022.Content: Face me in a fair fight. You shall learn to best that corruption.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010001.Content: Blast this talisman! Those old rascals...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010002.Content: On your feet already, are you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010003.Content: Best keep clear of this mess. It's for your own good.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010004.Content: Go find the pig before it's too late.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010006.Content: Something unusual lies inside. This is all I know.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010007.Content: Beyond this, you need to figure it out by yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010008.Content: The feeble, they butcher and eat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010009.Content: Yet those of use, they spare for a time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010011.Content: Smart you look, but aren't you a dimwit!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010012.Content: Silent as stone with nothing but stares.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010013.Content: Will you go save your pig friend or linger here for nothing?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010016.Content: Stare again and I'll pluck those eyes from your skull!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010017.Content: I heard there's a great treasure hidden within.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010018.Content: You seem smart. Why don't you take a chance inside?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010031.Content: Foul monkey. No matter how many times you reincarnate, you're still blind to the ways of this world.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010032.Content: Now, in your folly, you've hindered the dealings of the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010033.Content: But above that, you've given a girl who knows no limits a false hope.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010034.Content: I shall transform her into a mighty golden pill and keep it safe for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204010035.Content: Think about her, won't you? Should you feel like stirring trouble in your next life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010001.Content: Husband, oh dear husband, my powerlessness grieves me so.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010002.Content: All I can do is weep here, hoping that a kind passer-by might find your remains.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010003.Content: Young master, please forgive my impropriety.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010004.Content: I am but a widow, here to mourn my late husband. Show some kindness and excuse my manners.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010005.Content: We lived in peace in our mountaintop home.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010006.Content: But out of nowhere, wicked insects swarmed the place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010007.Content: They occupied our village. I was the lone survivor...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010008.Content: I intended to retrieve my late husband's keepsakes,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010009.Content: but the guais' leader, the Scorpionlord,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010010.Content: has discouraged all my attempts with his Deathsting...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010011.Content: Young master, are you heading up the mountain?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010012.Content: Venomous yaoguais have infested the forest ahead. Take caution, or you may never make it back alive.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010013.Content: Remember to carry enough herbs with you, in case you find yourself poisoned.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010014.Content: Yet you depart before I even finish. What in my garment earned me your disrespect?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010020.Content: You've freed me from the threat of him. Now I can set foot on the mountain without worrying. Thank you, young master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010021.Content: I've kept an eye on him; he's quite peculiar.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010022.Content: He roamed the woods, yet never scaled the mountaintop, as if evading a presence.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010023.Content: I heard whispers of his blood feud with whatever dwells there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010024.Content: Death is a blessing when it ends the agony of separation. A good end for him at last.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010030.Content: These impudent mortals have overreached themselves.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010031.Content: Their demise was of their own creation.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010032.Content: But you - you are special. What poisoned them only strengthens you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010033.Content: Keep it close and wield it wisely. You'll see its potential.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010034.Content: Go, release him. Being trapped there is a torment worse than death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010035.Content: I've watched him grow up; I cannot bring myself to do it...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010040.Content: All these years apart, and they've marred you like this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010041.Content: The valley will unveil its blooms anew,. but neither of you shall see its beauty.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010042.Content: A few strings dangling from the sky.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010043.Content: No one knows whether they lead to weal or woe.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010044.Content: Why does everyone vie to scale them?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020001.Content: Hail, young master. Your face is gaunt, complexion sallow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020002.Content: Both remind me of the venom's touch. Has the worm also beset you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020004.Content: Consuming its eggs grants great power.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020005.Content: Yet once the larvae hatch, they devour your insides, leaving an undying husk.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020006.Content: My fellow disciples, hungry for power, consumed those eggs.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020007.Content: And now... most are beyond remedy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020008.Content: Young master, if you will, end their suffering in my stead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020009.Content: They were my fellows. I can't...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020010.Content: Their lifeless bodies might still bear eggs unhatched.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020011.Content: Bring those eggs to me, and perhaps I can find a cure.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020012.Content: Young master, have you found my fellows?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020013.Content: Just a reminder. They oft wander amidst the village. May you find some luck there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020014.Content: Such haste; yet another fool 'bout to be devoured by eagerness.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020021.Content: Vile and evil it is, hence I must bring it back for thorough study.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020022.Content: Young master, in our brief acquaintance you were kind enough to do me a favor.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020023.Content: Why not extend your kindness by leaving your head with me? That would please my master greatly!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020030.Content: A strong foe... Just what I need.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020031.Content: You shall be my initial feast to power my metamorphosis ascension.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280020032.Content: It's been long since any soul has trodden these hidden bounds.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030001.Content: In today's wine, I steep; let outside quarrels keep...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030003.Content: The chance to kill that bane of our kind is there! Yet here I am, forced to protect it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030004.Content: Wait until I get drunk, I shall give that bastard what he deserves!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030005.Content: Get lost! Don't disturb my drink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030006.Content: How about a quick death with my stinger, you taut-faced monkey? Now leave while you can!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030007.Content: Quit your dawdling, will you? One scratch on my jars, just one, and you'll be a dead monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030008.Content: You fur face! I meant to let you pass, but you chose to ruin my day! Now, face your doom!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010001.Content: Time was, I guarded the Celestial River, with my boys eighty thousand strong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010002.Content: And the puny revenants dare to impede me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010003.Content: That grand transformation of mine was the only reason you're still standing here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010004.Content: A proper kneel to show gratitude would be appropriate, no?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010005.Content: Hmph. Fooled me once, never again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010006.Content: Deceptive tactics like this pose no threat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105010007.Content: I'll go size them up first. Keep pace, boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040010.Content: Things went south in the mountain, and I barely escaped.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040011.Content: But on my way down, guais captured me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040012.Content: I've been kept here for three days...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040013.Content: But now my luck has returned. My savior appeared here right in front of me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040014.Content: Should you extend your mercy to save my family,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040015.Content: I'll repay your kindness at any cost.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040017.Content: The lass surely knows how to ask for help.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040024.Content: Heh-heh, burn them all to cinders! Burn them burn them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040030.Content: Quite the charmer, aren't you boy?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040031.Content: But these eyes have seen prettier disguises.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040033.Content: Your true face, out with it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040036.Content: That was so close! Thank you for saving me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040037.Content: I am the Bull King's daughter, Pingping...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040041.Content: I... I know who you are!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040042.Content: My mother is Princess Fair Fox.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040044.Content: After my mother died, I've been living with my father.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040045.Content: His wife, Princess Rakshasi, took me in as her own.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040047.Content: Brother came back from Bodhisattva Guanyin, and we reunited.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040050.Content: to me and to our parents.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040051.Content: But somehow, not long ago, he suddenly changed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040052.Content: He secretly summoned his old troops for a coup,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040053.Content: imprisoned Father, kept Mother under strict watch.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040054.Content: I... I had nowhere else to turn.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040055.Content: I had to go for help.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040056.Content: But barely after leaving the place, his minions fell upon me...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040057.Content: The Bull King's might is known.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040058.Content: Even together, Wukong and I couldn't rival him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040059.Content: Rakshasi's Plantain Fan is also formidable.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040060.Content: And you want me to believe that they were subdued by a kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040062.Content: Who else could make them put their guard down? Really, with soft hearts, they could never harm him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040063.Content: You idiot! This fox is fooling you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040065.Content: Only my brother's Samadhi Fire could wreak such havoc!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040067.Content: My father is dying. Please, kind monkey, help me and my family...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040069.Content: Keep this cicada safe with you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040071.Content: That's a voice I know well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105040072.Content: I'll go ahead and take a look.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240002.Content: You sure know how to fight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240003.Content: Leave me behind, you cannot defeat them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240005.Content: Marvelous! But be wary of the long-haired one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240006.Content: Careful! The head is rolling back again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240007.Content: It's all my fault to seek your help...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240008.Content: The flames... This could be my end...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240010.Content: What secrets did Master Pig whisper to you just now?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240011.Content: I've let go of our blood feud, but he still holds so much hostility...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240013.Content: Stay close to me, kind monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240014.Content: It's a shame I can't help you fight, but I know my way through the mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240015.Content: Brother and I used to play around there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240016.Content: The Valiant Six had their ways of amusing us. What fun we had together.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240017.Content: If only I could bring back those days…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240019.Content: My brother's Samadhi Fire has obstructed all paths uphill...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240020.Content: To quench it, Mother's Plantain Fan is a must... But she'd never...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240022.Content: Down this cliff, there is a secret passage to her palace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240024.Content: But she'd never give you the fan to be used against her precious son...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240026.Content: Quite nearby, there is a deity we can turn to - one said to be Mother's old friend.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240027.Content: If we could persuade him to come along, maybe he could talk Mother into giving us the fan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240028.Content: I'll go find him. Be careful out here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240029.Content: I'll get through this hole, and you can pass by that crack ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060002.Content: No. This one is much weaker.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060003.Content: Not no. Master. Monkey. Same thing!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060004.Content: You fool! Master. Monkey. They have nothing in common!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060005.Content: Never mind. Monkey, Master. Both - trouble!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060006.Content: Halt! Intruders...to the Princess' palace face death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105060007.Content: Wanted monkey, wanted staff. Wanted, dead, or alive!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070001.Content: Enough about your brother! If you care for him so much, why not go back to him and give me some peace?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070002.Content: If you won't act, Mother, then I implore you... to lend me your Plantain Fan to save Father.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070003.Content: Save him? Or this mountain from its doom? Both are beyond this fan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070010.Content: Mother, please. I am begging you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070011.Content: Father's life hangs on a thread. A thread which brother could cut short any moment!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070012.Content: Since when did you start caring for that old bull?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070013.Content: Do not think you can hide your secret wish from me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070014.Content: You wish you could rule this mountain with your brother,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070017.Content: If that were my wish, why would I bring this Master here to help?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070019.Content: You just want to trade my fan for a smile on your brother's face.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070020.Content: I... I owe my life to Father,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070021.Content: and to your kindness for taking me in.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070022.Content: Brother was good to me. But I would never betray my parents for him...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070023.Content: Say no more of the fan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070024.Content: We raised the boy. Guess this is what we deserve.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070026.Content: Why are you here at this very moment?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070028.Content: I'm not a part of your family.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070029.Content: And I'm aware I have no voice in this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070030.Content: But Ping told me the Destined One had arrived.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070031.Content: The Destined One who doesn't even know what he's destined for?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070032.Content: Those old bastards must've pulled a muscle coming up with the name.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070033.Content: You and I both know who he truly is.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070035.Content: Your children, your husband, and even this very palace,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070037.Content: What do I have to fear from a mere pawn?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070039.Content: He can't even rival the power of my fan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070040.Content: Once the truth is revealed, suddenly he is here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070041.Content: Do you not find it odd, such a twist of fate?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070045.Content: I heard the Destined One had obtained all the other relics.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070049.Content: Were those relics really bestowed for your good?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070050.Content: Perhaps, amidst these schemes and plots,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070051.Content: we've unwittingly become stepping stones for his rebirth.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070054.Content: you are all I care for.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070057.Content: I vow to treasure you dearly,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070058.Content: just like when we're up there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070060.Content: That one day you'd be the only one I can rely on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070063.Content: and tell me what to do.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070065.Content: Don't you see? He is taking advantage of you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070067.Content: I called for your help, not your treachery.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070071.Content: When I first crossed paths with her,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070072.Content: your bull of a father was no more than livestock,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070073.Content: munching on a patch of grass.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070074.Content: Have you no shame? Mother, don't be fooled!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070077.Content: Rakshasi, have we not been this close...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070078.Content: since our time in Tushita Palace?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070079.Content: Well yes..I do miss the old days, too...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070080.Content: We were so happy back then...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070082.Content: No tricks here—it's just my hoof.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070083.Content: You deserve to know before we kiss!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070086.Content: You dare to take her form and beguile me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070087.Content: My old friend, wasn't it fun?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070088.Content: Have we not been this close, since our carnage in the fox den?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070091.Content: were wasted on your foul ears!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070093.Content: Your revenants are everywhere. I thought you'd have better lies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070095.Content: Well then boy, let us teach this brazen adulterer a lesson!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070100.Content: Vile beast! Your savagery knows no cure.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070101.Content: But you will behave once my Sourceless Water from Tushita drops.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070110.Content: "From yin and yang, arises two sides."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070112.Content: "From land and sky, emerges a divide."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070114.Content: Now... you shall be feasted upon... by my Yin-Yang Fish!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070133.Content: is but a ripple caused by a drop from above.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070135.Content: Bad news after a good nap.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070136.Content: He's gone too far from a furnace servant.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070138.Content: Decent, until ruined by Brother Wukong...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070139.Content: Then destiny carried him further to fall for the wrong woman.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070141.Content: check if any way leads up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105070143.Content: The owner might be gone, but her treasure might still be there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080004.Content: Mother left her fan before she went away. She must have felt torn between her son and husband.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080005.Content: But this iron ball... It just won't stop.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080007.Content: Help me drive it away, and I'll let the fan do its work!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080009.Content: How can you be sure it's even real?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080010.Content: Rest assured. Mother taught me this spell.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080011.Content: Only the real fan will answer it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080012.Content: The Bull sounds weak, probably on his last legs.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080013.Content: Guess l have to trust you once. I'll get down there and stop the ball and let you do your work.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080014.Content: Don't worry. His thick skin will protect him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105080015.Content: Come on, let's save Father first!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090001.Content: Father, I've brought him here - it's the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090002.Content: Brother is not around. You can hand it over to him now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090003.Content: Brother will surely give up on his plan once it's returned.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090004.Content: And then, we will be a family again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090006.Content: You dare to push your luck...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090007.Content: but always have a way out...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090009.Content: You came back at the wrong time...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090010.Content: Are you not thinking straight, Father?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090011.Content: I brought the Destined One here to save you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090015.Content: How can you say that to me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090016.Content: I went through flames to find the Destined One for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090017.Content: For you Father! Don't you see?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090018.Content: I should have plucked my eyes out too,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090019.Content: to save me from your pretense...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090023.Content: You could have enjoyed a good show...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090024.Content: But you simply lack the taste.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090025.Content: I should've just killed you all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090026.Content: My guise was perfect. None could see a single flaw in it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090027.Content: How did you find out then?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090029.Content: she has never needed to fake her respect for me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090031.Content: That little fox. I will find out if it's true after I hunt her down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090033.Content: I should burn you two together and mix your ashes to honor your friendship.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090042.Content: you leave behind a ruined family...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090043.Content: My son is defeated, but not vanquished...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090044.Content: I am afraid he'll rise again soon.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090045.Content: Since it came into my possession, I've kept it in my stomach,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090055.Content: let alone give it back to him...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090056.Content: Destined, deprived, it's all the same
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090058.Content: You are your choices, your causes and effects, not what you're called.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090059.Content: Thanks to this false death talisman.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090060.Content: Poor Keeper, seems his legacy was his only offer after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090061.Content: No wonder not a single raindrop was fanned!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090062.Content: It was your trick the whole time!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090063.Content: My bad, old bull. I was a bit delayed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105090064.Content: You little rascal. I'll teach you a lesson on your parents' behalf!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100001.Content: My King, I'm sorry for my lateness.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100006.Content: ...to show mercy and spare my son.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100007.Content: He's the last of the Yaksha's bloodline in the West,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100008.Content: with an origin most tragic and twisted
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100009.Content: Now he poses a threat no more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100011.Content: I, Rakshasi, and the Bull King shall retreat ourselves to secluded meditation.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100012.Content: Along with our children, we will never leave the mountain again...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100015.Content: If it pleases you, my Plantain Fan...
StringKVMapDesc.SoundTrackDesc.5003.Name: Flames Have Paved My Way
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100019.Content: Vain was my flame, for a revenge destined astray!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100020.Content: Their delight lies in our submission,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100025.Content: Still holding on, despite it all?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100026.Content: Spit it out now! His relic!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010001.Content: Oh, lad, it can't be you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010002.Content: I thought you were one of them. What happened to me...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010003.Content: The vanguard of the Bull King is relieved you're unharmed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010005.Content: I knew of you long ago.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010006.Content: The thing you seek, the king must know about it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010007.Content: Out of nowhere, the whole mountain was infested with those stinking corpses.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010008.Content: Some coffin carts blocked all the passes up, burning everything in their path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010009.Content: You seem clever. How about you find a way to destroy them, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010010.Content: They're called "Five Element Carts", an evil and powerful invention of the king's son.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010011.Content: I'm afraid they are not only guarding the passes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010012.Content: Trust me, there's more to it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010013.Content: Got to hold my ground at the entrance for a while. Can't imagine the chaos without me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010014.Content: I tolerate no evil under my nose...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010016.Content: Bring me more revenants so I can chop them up!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010018.Content: The Red Boy's carts are nothing more than a distraction.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010021.Content: Make haste and head up the mountain. We must figure out what he's planning.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010022.Content: They are called 'Five Element Carts' for a reason. What's your tally?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010023.Content: The entrance is secured for now. You can go first, and I'll catch up with you later!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010024.Content: You can't do it without me - the carts might scare the weak, but not me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010025.Content: The king once told me that each of the five carts has its own unique nature.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010027.Content: You see how I swung my axe?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010028.Content: Someone fed that unruly boy a load of nonsense, and now he's running amok.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010029.Content: Why doesn't the king take action?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010030.Content: With his might, he could take down ten Red Boys!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010031.Content: You brat, fighting for your own pleasure!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010032.Content: You should have spared me a cart before my axe gets rusty!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010033.Content: I can see the king from here, stripped of his mount and weapon.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010034.Content: I wonder what's behind all this... What else is hidden in this mountain?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010036.Content: We should find the king's mount first.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010037.Content: The Bishui Beast is treasured by the king as his own kin. How could it simply vanish?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010050.Content: My king... He treated me well...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010051.Content: To die for him, I would not regret it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010053.Content: Failing his mission is what I regret...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010054.Content: My king must've done something reckless for that darn boy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010055.Content: The truth, I wager, lies beyond that door.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010056.Content: That accursed cart was no match for me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010057.Content: I... I went easy on it, that's all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010058.Content: Quite a good lad you are. But remember…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020002.Content: In death, I desire but a complete and final cessation.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020003.Content: My life for the cart's demise. I deem it worthy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020004.Content: If you can't free me from his evil, you should walk away.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020005.Content: "From death roots life, and from life, death."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020006.Content: I should have discerned his malice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020007.Content: Since I have bid farewell with kind words, you should depart now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020008.Content: My body has been exploited. I beg you to leave my soul in peace. Go!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020009.Content: Take the whip now, and my soul shall scatter. I implore you to stop.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020010.Content: Life has too much agony. I should let go...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020011.Content: I cannot rest in peace before my body is freed from darkness.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020012.Content: My journey of life, a fleeting dream...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020013.Content: I can rest in peace now...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020014.Content: Never thought I'd die before I'd finished my task...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020015.Content: Come forth now as my soul's about to vanish...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020016.Content: It has lingered for you for too long.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215010001.Content: Did you see that fur-face, wicked lass? He's even uglier than me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215010002.Content: Are you still in the haze or what, you wicked lad?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215010003.Content: Our lady asked us to guard this place, not to check another face! Kill whoever breaks in was the order!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020002.Content: Our master bade this child be born, but he never knew my struggles.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020003.Content: How can we but follow the master's word?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020004.Content: Rakshasi, you know it was he who made you drink from the River of Childbearing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020005.Content: Shut it. You shall never speak of it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020006.Content: The king knows why I had to drink it...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020007.Content: But I haven't glimpsed him...ever since then. He made it another reason for his absence.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020008.Content: Rakshasi, your husband shirks a dishonor this way.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020009.Content: He granted you this cave, with his mount Bishui Beast as its sentinel. He's compromised enough for the sake of our master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020010.Content: You will seal your lips on this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020011.Content: Our family would be doomed if anyone knew the truth behind this child.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020012.Content: Fear not. Master bids me aid you in secret.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020013.Content: You and the bull, you will rear this child to manhood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.215020014.Content: And when the boy comes of age... well, on that day...he will be living proof...of the dark deeds of Mount Lingshan.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010003.Content: All I ever wanted was a life in my mountain, free from you, and your so-called merits.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010004.Content: Those high above don't trust me. I understand that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010005.Content: And they send you and those knuckleheads...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010006.Content: to threaten me to obey and serve once more. Hmm, I understand that too.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010007.Content: But what I don't understand is...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010010.Content: Mark this: He's not just any monkey. He's a monkey of merit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010011.Content: A monkey was made Buddha once.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010012.Content: None other than me can challenge him to a duel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010013.Content: Look, monkey, I don't make a habit of fighting someone I've bested before...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010014.Content: Here's my offer. If you lose, I'll take you to the Celestial Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010015.Content: They will stay and level your mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010016.Content: But if I lose, I shall certainly take revenge,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010017.Content: and they will level your mountain nonetheless!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010018.Content: How tragic would that be, huh? You were one of the Court; we don't need to resort to violence.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010019.Content: How about you bend the knees, admit the wrongs, and we can put this behind us?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010020.Content: All these years, except for that pig, you're the one who talks the tallest tales. Good, I am entertained!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010022.Content: wouldn't it be fun if I pluck your extra eye out for my snack, and allow you to keep the other two?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010023.Content: Because I'd hate to let you miss how I'll slaughter each mongrel of the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010024.Content: Those below, those above, and that black mutt of yours.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100010025.Content: Come at me, all of you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020031.Content: Brat, you call that a duel?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020032.Content: The glare up here is dazzling. Fight me in the woods if you have the guts.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030040.Content: And so ends the last tale of Sun Wukong,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030041.Content: a hero who treasured his freedom above all else.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030042.Content: Buddhahood he attained, yes; but cumbersome he found the Celestial Rules.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030043.Content: For he yearned to come back and to revel in the simple joys with us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030044.Content: Little did he know, his choice to forgo the life above only fueled their mistrust.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030045.Content: This stone has stood for countless days on the mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030046.Content: Since my youth, they said that his remains lie within it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030047.Content: Unbegotten, undying, such is the nature of a stone monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030048.Content: Though his body was broken, his spirit endures.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030049.Content: Into six relics he turned, and separately they escaped, choosing to stay hidden.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030050.Content: Those are the Six Senses of the Great Sage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030051.Content: Yet no one has ever seen them. Not in centuries.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030052.Content: I'm old now. Venture through all the lands, I cannot.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030053.Content: Yet among you, there might be one who is destined,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030054.Content: one that shall recover all his scattered relics.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100030055.Content: And upon the return of the relics to Mount Huaguo, he may yet rise again...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000001.Content: We're getting home, son, not getting all worked up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000003.Content: That old monkey's going to be at the mountaintop no matter what. We don't have to rush.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000004.Content: We've gathered the five relics, just as he said. All we need now is the sixth one he has!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000005.Content: Why dawdle here? Move along, quick!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000008.Content: I knew there was something that old fool hadn't told us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000009.Content: Otherwise, no one up above would bother to ruin this place yet again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000010.Content: They're coming for you, no doubt.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000011.Content: I can't bear it. I simply can't!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000012.Content: These iron-face mongrels... I despise them the most!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000013.Content: Bad luck. It's a dead end!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000015.Content: I let you be, and now you have the gall to show up!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000016.Content: If you come at me now, this day will be your last!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000019.Content: I was wringing my brain how to fetch you, but this savvy one's already on it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000020.Content: It must have been hidden here amongst the mist until it senses the relics on you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000021.Content: Thanks to them, it recalled its master and saved your skin.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000022.Content: Now that it answers to your call, why not make a good use of it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000023.Content: Your mortal body is too heavy for me in my wind form.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000024.Content: All these henchmen of the Court. What draws them to this mountain, let's find out.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000028.Content: That monkey was full of surprises, just like me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000029.Content: He had his way to linger on, and his belongings, too.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000030.Content: They're set on killing those mongrels of the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000031.Content: But we've got to snatch them first, or these scum will take them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000032.Content: I'll go find the other ones. Keep up with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000033.Content: You're always in a pickle, aren't you? Let me fix you up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990506.Content: You're always in a pickle, aren't you? Let me fix you up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000034.Content: Step away! This time, the glory's mine!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000036.Content: With you monkeys around, I'm always toiling away for nothing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000037.Content: Kid, when you step up one day, try not to forget your Uncle Bajie.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000038.Content: All I got from Wukong were the nasty jobs. You should do better than that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000039.Content: We're done here. Time to move on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000040.Content: Don't just stand there, kid, go pluck the antennae!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000042.Content: With these silly strands, you're all the more like Wukong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000043.Content: Just don't prance around with your might as he did!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000044.Content: That monkey's got a stash of treasures. I'll scout around some more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000045.Content: They tell of his crown, his armor, and his boots. They thought those were all he had.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000046.Content: But there is yet another set of arm guards added by the yaoguai kings after his ascension.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000049.Content: It's in me! It's in me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000052.Content: Help me out here! This is a tough swallow!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000053.Content: Watch it, kid, will you? Mind my innards while you're fighting in there!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000054.Content: Kid, are you still in one piece there?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000056.Content: I owe you once more for saving my rump.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000057.Content: My belly's not too vile, is it? I'm not a meat-eater after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000058.Content: I hope it didn't repulse you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000059.Content: Well, you've fetched it. It wasn't all that bad, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000060.Content: Now that Wukong's armor set is complete, we should go to Water Curtain Cave. Come with me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000062.Content: "In my realm, all monkeys are of similar face and shape."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000063.Content: "Your face speaks of a different breed. And an ugly one! You must be a yaoguai from another land."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000064.Content: I've never ventured here since that journey. Nothing's changed after so many years.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000065.Content: He said this and told me to kneel. Right here on this seat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000067.Content: I knew it. Wukong is tightfisted, even Guanyin agrees so.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000068.Content: He kept it here so it could be passed down to another one of his kind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000069.Content: Now it's time for you to try it, kid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000075.Content: Once you have this, there's no turning back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000076.Content: Now... you look exactly like Wukong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000077.Content: You're all set, kid. You look like a fierce warrior!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020004.Content: Hey, old monkey. I hope this isn't a one-way trip, is it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020005.Content: Isn't all life a one-way trip? Once you embark on the journey, there's no turning back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020008.Content: Since his early days, he'd had an eye for the finer things,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020009.Content: and a will to wrest them from others.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020010.Content: Laying his eyes on, then craving to seize, their riches.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020011.Content: No better than the black bear and Jinchi, I say.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020012.Content: He can't have an eye for the finer things, while the Buddha oversees the three realms?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020013.Content: Well, I hardly think that's fair.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020014.Content: How insatiable! Not content with his kingdom and title below,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020015.Content: he asked for a position in the Celestial Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020016.Content: But soon after his wish was granted, his joy turned to rage, all because he wasn't invited to a feast.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020017.Content: He nearly ruined the entire Celestial Palace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020019.Content: As untamed and ungrateful as that yellow rat. Beasts are beasts, don't you think?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020020.Content: He was young. He didn't know any better.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020021.Content: Hadn't learned from the Buddha or our Master yet.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020022.Content: Aren't you being a bit harsh dredging up the scandals from his youth?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020023.Content: Like his adulthood was any better!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020024.Content: Since his release, he had claimed to have learned manners and discipline;
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020025.Content: yet his wee prank in Chechi gave him away.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020026.Content: Posing as an idol, he degraded the gods.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020027.Content: Clear was his defiance of the doctrines he had learned.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020028.Content: Well, he was just being naughty.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020029.Content: Aren't all great achievers somewhat self-obsessed? Myself included!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020030.Content: Nose in the air, feeling above others.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020031.Content: I say he was no less insolent than that Yellowbrow brat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020032.Content: Wait, isn't it that... the lady of some sort?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020033.Content: It was her tricks that made Master drive Wukong away.
