StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020034.Content: On White Tiger Ridge, he forsook his love.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020035.Content: Three times he broke her into pieces, convincing himself his heart would ache no more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020036.Content: Yet, as you must know, he had never let go of her.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020037.Content: Otherwise, he wouldn't have been so eager to get away from the Buddhahood he attained.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020038.Content: Those who talk much of love will one day bite their tongues.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020039.Content: On this matter, he was akin to you, and your many darlings.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020040.Content: No matter where you are, you'd always fall captive to the web of mortal desire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020041.Content: Why bring me into this? True, I don't have the wits to break the web.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020042.Content: But he had torn his way out since that day.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020043.Content: Take a look, Bajie. Can you see? Many of your good friends are here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020044.Content: We're just fair-weather friends, that's all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020045.Content: But they are still friends, aren't they?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020046.Content: So you say, so it must be.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020047.Content: These old buddies... I think none of them ended up well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020048.Content: Indeed. For ages, countless gifted souls have walked this earth.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020049.Content: Yet of them, how few have forged everlasting greatness!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020054.Content: Fortune is simply humility in the mighty.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020057.Content: Gifted they may be, yet strive they not;
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020058.Content: content with little and lost in lust.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020059.Content: Seek the ease yet crave the renown.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020060.Content: They yearn for freedom yet aspire to Buddhahood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020062.Content: Yet, nobody can, and nobody should.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020063.Content: Such was the folly of the Bull King and Wukong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020064.Content: Destiny's favor calls for the resolution to sever all desires.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020065.Content: You should mark well these words.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020066.Content: Hold on. This can't be Wukong's memory. You're fooling us, aren't you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020067.Content: Five of the six relics call for one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020069.Content: Eye, Ear, Nose, Tongue, Body, and Mind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020074.Content: I see now, it was you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020075.Content: I knew it from the beginning! You were the Mind of Wukong all along!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020076.Content: That's why you led us here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020078.Content: Don't make me laugh! Him? He is Wukong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020080.Content: Cut to the chase, will you? We didn't come this far for your riddles!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020081.Content: After Wukong died, five of his six senses endured and were taken by the yaoguai kings.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020083.Content: Mind is the first of the six. It's the essence unique to every life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020084.Content: Therefore, it's destined to fade away at life's end.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020086.Content: You mean Wukong's gone for good, never to return?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020087.Content: You old bastard! You've been lying to us all this time!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020088.Content: That Wukong you knew will never return.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020090.Content: The universe will always bear him a successor,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020091.Content: one who shall carry on his name and nature.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020092.Content: This chosen successor is the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020094.Content: Yet perils and mighty foes you've braved to recover his relics.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020095.Content: Your will now stands resolute, worthy of his power.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020096.Content: You mean this boy is to take Wukong's name?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020099.Content: Bajie, deep down, you know he wasn't all that perfect.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106020100.Content: Now that he is dead, this one, perhaps, shall bear the name in his stead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030001.Content: Here, we can venture forth with you no further. This task is yours alone.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030002.Content: Sun Wukong left behind a broken shell, stripped of all his Six Senses.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030003.Content: Though ages have passed, it maintains a connection, attuned to the echos of his former self.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030004.Content: If you truly are the one destined, you must cast aside his soulless shell and merge the six into one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030005.Content: Then, you shall be the one to begin the journey anew.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030007.Content: He's just a kid who knows nothing. I'll go with him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030008.Content: This place is shaped by Wukong's lingering obsession.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030009.Content: It allows only his relic-bearer to face the final ordeal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030010.Content: We can escort him no more. See it for yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030011.Content: Hear me, son. You can always run!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106030012.Content: Remember, you don't have to bear Wukong's name!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040001.Content: You must have heard tales about him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040002.Content: Some say he helped Tang Monk fetch the Scriptures,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040003.Content: Some say it was not him who was granted Buddhahood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040004.Content: The real him was already dead on the journey to the West.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040005.Content: Some say that the journey never happened.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040006.Content: He is nothing but a monkey who lives in some storyteller's tall tale.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040007.Content: But now, you will hear a tale which no one has ever known.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107010001.Content: Shame, I must greet you in this bitter cold without a hearty drink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107010002.Content: It's no easy feat getting here—I know you didn't come to keep me company.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107010003.Content: In your heart, there must be something you can't get over or someone you can't let go of.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107010005.Content: I can't kill that monkey. No one can, except himself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107010006.Content: But at last, I see this is the only way.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107020001.Content: Bearing his Mind is an ordeal. Trust me, I know it more than you do.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107020002.Content: Now, it's time to rest your weary self.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000172.Content: Now, it's time to rest your weary self.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030001.Content: Go back with me to the sky. Let us get drunk before we continue this fight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030002.Content: None has what it takes to push me into this but this monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310030001.Content: In the very end, all dim alike.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310030002.Content: All's in vain save your own effort...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310030008.Content: What does a guai like me have to lose?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310110001.Content: Buddha's mercy is still beyond you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310110002.Content: You only look like him, that's all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280001.Content: Do not think by passing me...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280002.Content: you'd see the truth of your destiny...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280003.Content: Courage alone will not guide you far, imposter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280004.Content: Gentle, yet it engulfs all. The power of water. Can you feel its touch?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280005.Content: "A ripple awakens not without a stir." Reflect upon it. That is my counsel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310280006.Content: "Bane and bliss, summoned by deeds." Do you still not see it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310310001.Content: You have no right to take it from me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310310002.Content: My old friend, can you see these flames?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310310003.Content: You're driven by greed, not destiny.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370001.Content: It's harder than you think to be like him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370003.Content: Who do you think you are to lay claim to my belongings?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370004.Content: That's all you're capable of? Show your hand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370005.Content: Burn, rob, and kill. Such are the deeds of you monkeys.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370006.Content: But you still think you are better than us...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370008.Content: Stay, and perhaps I can even grant you a title.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370009.Content: You posed a challenge, yet know not how to veil your retreat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370010.Content: I was ascended to deity by Guanyin. Who are you to stand against me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230001.Content: That was quick. You can't be him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230002.Content: Kasaya of Eversparks? Bet it looks better in ashes!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230004.Content: I won't settle until I have that kasaya! Get it now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230005.Content: Bullying an old man! Curse you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320150004.Content: I'll save the kingdom... Even in death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320150005.Content: Not now! I can't die now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320150006.Content: Why is it... that I can't find my peace...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320060001.Content: Dishes made of flesh, best served fresh. My abstinence ends now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320060002.Content: Your flesh shall be a treat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320060009.Content: Blood in vein, spilled in pain; bleed till drain, tears in vain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320060010.Content: Blood I gain, from your bane; relish your brain, drive you insane.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110001.Content: I am beyond your mercy, Master...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110002.Content: Master, your foul disciple has bested the monkey once again. Open your eyes and behold!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110008.Content: Who in all realms can withstand its power?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110009.Content: None can stand against this wind of mine!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110010.Content: The wind shall roar; the sand shall whip!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110011.Content: I am a renegade, whom they will never forgive. So be it... Come!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110012.Content: Your tricks will not save you. Face me true!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110013.Content: The Wind Tamer... How is it yours to use?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110014.Content: My wind may be tameable. My trident is not!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320220001.Content: They all kneel in the end.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320220002.Content: Monkey brain can be a proper treat. What's left is the king's to 'ave!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320220012.Content: Quit with yer rubbish tricks. Get out 'ere!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320220013.Content: Fancy runnin', do ye? Yer destiny's right 'ere!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240001.Content: Aye, aye! Our future rests on you, my boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240003.Content: You vexing filth! Prepare to be stoned!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240004.Content: How dare you to defy your betters?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240005.Content: Harming my son, eh? I'll make you pay!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240006.Content: Think you can cross me like that cat does?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240007.Content: The filth down here doesn't suit a king.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240008.Content: My place is way up high!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240011.Content: Son, let me help! Your pa will stone his ugly head open!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240012.Content: A proper king, bullied like this...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240015.Content: You foul rabble, no way you'll touch me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240018.Content: Only the lesser will bully an unarmed king!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240019.Content: I'm on the high ground. Ye know what that means?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240020.Content: Son, your pa's old bones can help you no further!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320150001.Content: Always be on alert, always be vigilant.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320190001.Content: You're no match. Bit of a bore, really.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320190002.Content: I'm not satisfied. Give it another bash!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320150003.Content: Time to go back to sleep.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320050003.Content: Where's my son... I can't find him...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320050007.Content: With all my skills, I failed...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320050008.Content: I should serve you up too...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.325030001.Content: Why bother, ye daft one? Ye haven't got a chance against me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010001.Content: Why don't you come closer? Scared?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010015.Content: You don't know when to quit, do you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010018.Content: You thought you can defeat me, didn't you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010020.Content: To save him, you'd have to impress me first!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010021.Content: Guanyin failed to imprison me, and you're just a nobody.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010027.Content: I thought you were better than this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010030.Content: You had some guts. Wonder how they'll taste after a good fry.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344010031.Content: That's it? Could have saved me all the acting...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050017.Content: Tell me then, is my kind destined for extermination?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050018.Content: A monkey born from unfeeling stone,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050022.Content: I never sought to fight you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050023.Content: Yet you are ignorant of their manipulation.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050024.Content: Beyond Flaming Mountains lies Mount Lingshan. Do not even think you can cross it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050025.Content: "The Buddhas say my flesh is not life's core, so whence springs existence, I implore?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050026.Content: "What ordained their dwelling in my mother's womb, if blood and flesh don't compose my life's bloom?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050038.Content: everything that stands in my way,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050040.Content: "The Sacred Child" means more than you think!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050041.Content: I'll conquer what defied Sun Wukong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050042.Content: I'll kill those whom Sun Wukong feared to slay!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070009.Content: You think you know your spells...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070016.Content: is a world devoid of yaoguais like you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070017.Content: This is the consequence of your foul deceit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070018.Content: Who would deny me in my domain?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070019.Content: Such is the nature of you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070020.Content: Your bedrock is gone. Do you dare to face me alone?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070021.Content: Immortality has not changed him one bit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070022.Content: You seem to have a death wish. Then I shall oblige!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070023.Content: This time, I should make you one of my revenants. What say you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070027.Content: Now, I shall aid you again - on your way to death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070030.Content: if your insolence persists in my bowl!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070031.Content: Flaming Mountains are beyond your saving.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344070032.Content: Your defiance to order ends here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.343110008.Content: You've dug your own grave with gullibility. Now it's time to rest in it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.343110009.Content: Why ward yourself, young master? I wish you no harm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.343110011.Content: Petty spells hold no sway. Abandon your Buddha, and I'll show you true power.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990001.Content: You hold no grudge against me. Why bother returning?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990002.Content: I shall not leave until my blood debt is paid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990005.Content: Think you're tough, huh? Go face that wicked bird up there and see how you measure up!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990006.Content: I bent my knees and gritted my teeth for vengeance, not defeat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990016.Content: Years of practice, just for this attack!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990017.Content: You think you can dodge it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990018.Content: Spare me! Show mercy! I have a blood feud yet to settle!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990019.Content: My love, my dear... I've failed you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990020.Content: My revenge… I can no longer…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990022.Content: You weakling, a mere waste of my booze.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.342010001.Content: That was quick! You are way too puny!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.342010002.Content: Go back to where you belong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.343120002.Content: Good finds its return, ill finds its bane.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990001.Content: This is hardly a match. I'll go take a walk.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990002.Content: Why am I here if it's such an easy fight?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990003.Content: He who seeks his way should stand up for his own fights. Do it yourself, boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990004.Content: A wise pig knows when to retreat. I'll go now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990005.Content: This fight tires me. I think I'll go have a quick nap.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990006.Content: You feed on air, I feed on food. I'll go get some before I can fight again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990009.Content: I'd better go back to my hearth!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990011.Content: Time for me to take cover!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990012.Content: Get here and take my place! Beat down this scourge!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990014.Content: Better duck and cover now, heh-heh!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990015.Content: Time to turtle up! Can't risk it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990016.Content: Go on, kid. I need a breather!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990017.Content: Ease up and get back! Let me heal you first.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990018.Content: They should've treated their guests. Now we're on our own in this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990019.Content: Come here, I'll give you another hand.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990020.Content: Where's your roar now, you foul guai?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990021.Content: Give me more. I'm not done bashing yet!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990022.Content: That's a big help from me, boy. Where's your thanks?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990023.Content: Even my rump is frozen solid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990027.Content: That shock hit hard. My limbs are jelly!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990028.Content: Good thing that I have healthy bowel movements.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990029.Content: Caught in ice? You should've been more careful.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990031.Content: Roll it, flip it, put it out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990033.Content: The fire's caught you. Those hairs are crisping!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990034.Content: The bolt got your bones all soft!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990036.Content: Your staff work is going for the kill!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990037.Content: Well done! You've beat the sense out of them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990038.Content: A weapon of might, that's my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990039.Content: I can level a hill with this rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990040.Content: Watch and learn, kid. I've got the tricks!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990042.Content: A fierce hit, but where were you aiming at?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990043.Content: That's a goody for sure. Are we keeping it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990044.Content: Such a great vessel is best kept with me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990045.Content: Surprised you have it, boy! Wukong had put in so much toil for this one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990046.Content: There are thirty-six Tian-Gang forms and seventy-two Di-Sha ones. What's your count?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990047.Content: Think you can impress me? I have thirty-six forms myself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990048.Content: Clever transformation. Will it win us the fight?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990049.Content: Back to your true form, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990050.Content: That form didn't hold up, hmm?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990051.Content: Focus and disperse, illusions traverse. A neat trick!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990052.Content: He's got no clue where you are, kid
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990053.Content: Hard as a rock, that's what you are!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990057.Content: You've not been smelted for that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990058.Content: Wukong was much harder than that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990059.Content: Make more monkeys and it might just be nap time for me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990060.Content: Look how you outnumber them, son. I like it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990061.Content: You'll need to pluck more hairs!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990062.Content: Aw, I thought they could buy me enough time for a nap!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990064.Content: Well done. And here goes my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990065.Content: This gaudy ring of fire again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990066.Content: You plan to just sit in there?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990067.Content: I can crack the sky with this rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990068.Content: Tines and notches. The last things you see before you die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990069.Content: You can push your luck against my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990073.Content: You cross me and my rake will cross you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990076.Content: Are you game for more rounds, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990077.Content: Take a good look at how I fight, you brat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990078.Content: I've got no more time for games. Die already!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990080.Content: Just had some bad food is all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990081.Content: Time to fill up that belly again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990083.Content: Don't try to hide, I'll find you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990086.Content: I've got this rake and I've got me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990087.Content: That's one more treat from my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990088.Content: That furnace servant has made quite the strides!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990089.Content: I can see he doesn't treat me as an old friend!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990090.Content: Huh... If only you were Wukong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990091.Content: Why do I have to take the fall for that monkey? I'd better go now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990092.Content: You keep fighting, kid. I've got to grab some food.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990093.Content: Fine... Fine! Maybe I'll spare you just for today.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990094.Content: Now, wait till I let your old master know about this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990095.Content: Ugh! Where did you learn these foul summons? I'll go ask your old master about this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990096.Content: I'll go ask your dear Rakshasi to use her Plantain Fan on you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990097.Content: You just wouldn't give me a fair fight. Well, time for me to walk!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990098.Content: It's below me to fight this pretentious loser. I'll just let the monkey take the credit!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990100.Content: Shame for an Admiral to retreat before you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990101.Content: Put an end to this madness already!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990102.Content: This one's no match for either of us, boy. Go take him on yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990103.Content: My love, if you offer yourself, I will still let you hold my hoof.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990104.Content: Insolent furnace servant! I'm an Admiral of the Court!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990105.Content: Look at all these balls. It's a game he made for us!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990106.Content: You should've learned something more substantial from your old master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990108.Content: I don't have to teach you this lesson personally. I'll have my monkey boy do it for me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990109.Content: That's how your son welcomes your old friends? Then so long, old bull!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990110.Content: Such grudgery and hate! I'll go ask Guanyin to take you back for more meditation!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990111.Content: Why do I have to take the fall for that monkey? We'll carry on with this tomorrow!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990112.Content: I am not the pig to wipe out an entire kind. Time for me to go!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990113.Content: Well, families can be complicated. I'd better leave it to you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990114.Content: The old bull will never forgive me if I'm the one to kill his son. I'd better go!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990115.Content: When a fight drags on, things get real uncertain. Speed it up, kid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990116.Content: He who stirs the pot, settles it. It's not my place to mingle here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990117.Content: I don't have all day for a fight, and neither do you. I need a rest.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990118.Content: You know you need a hand. Don't act like you can do it alone!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990119.Content: Are you trying to frighten anyone with that new form?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990120.Content: Let go of your hate and thorns! They'll make for a tasty snack.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990121.Content: Lure him to me, kid, and it'll be the end of him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990122.Content: Give the relic here, ugly brat, before you die on my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990123.Content: You foul yaoguai! All these doings will bear you fouler fruits!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990124.Content: Were you shitting yourself or what? Can't you just dodge it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990125.Content: You fool! That's not how you dodge it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990127.Content: See that hole on your belly? It's bigger than my head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990128.Content: Don't let his lotus throne get you, kid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990129.Content: Don't panic. Try to get closer!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990130.Content: That's odd. See if you can get inside!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990133.Content: Genius. What goes in, comes right back out.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990134.Content: You just leveled the mountain with your father on it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990135.Content: Great. No more mountains. Only flames left.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990136.Content: They come, we run; they back off, we hunt them down. We will come out unscathed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990138.Content: I've never seen something like this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990143.Content: Can't believe there's a fruit I've not tasted.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990170.Content: Are you a hag or a hothead?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990171.Content: Untie me before you fight him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990172.Content: Or I'll be fine with some food, leastways.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990173.Content: So I can watch you fight with a full belly.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990174.Content: I'll be fine. Go after her.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990177.Content: Should've taken my bride while I had the chance...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990178.Content: I wish I hadn't wagered on you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990179.Content: Forgive me, my dear. I was wrong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990180.Content: She still has a thing for bondage. Watch those strands!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990181.Content: I've had my share with that tripping.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990182.Content: You seem soft. You have a thing for she-spiders too?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990184.Content: Are your legs too heavy for you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990186.Content: Love is all about illusions. Don't fall for that trap!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990187.Content: Wake up, kid! She's playing with your mind!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990188.Content: Good moves. But mine are better, heh-heh-heh.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990189.Content: Phew! I thought that was Wukong for a second.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990190.Content: You're on the edge now. Alas, my hands are tied.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990191.Content: Better watch it. You don't want to die here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990194.Content: Never miss a punch if you have the chance!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990195.Content: I know what she's up to. I've seen it. Run for your life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990196.Content: We've got an angry spider here! That's your bad, monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990197.Content: Once bitten by sugary lies, all sweet words turn sour in her ears.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990198.Content: See? Now you know what she'd have done to me if I hadn't run away.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990199.Content: Her power has surely grown after so many years.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990200.Content: Don't look into those eyes, or you'll lose your mind!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990201.Content: Watch for her eyes, and don't be watched!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990202.Content: That is intentional, isn't it? You little rascal!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990203.Content: And I thought only Wukong had the nerve to bully me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990204.Content: I'm barehanded, you hag! Untie me, so I can plant my rake into your head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990205.Content: Are your many eyes seeing clearly, my dear? The monkey is right there. I am your husband!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020011.Content: No ill will I bear. I'm merely my brother's eyes and ears. I feign my loyalty to guard this path on the bear's order!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020012.Content: "Your destiny's bleak and stark. In its grip, we share the mark."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020013.Content: The Guanyin Temple now lies in cinders, yet the Elder's soul endures.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020014.Content: "The root of greed ever fosters the stem of suffering."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020015.Content: Better to forget the things you truly seek.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020016.Content: The three bells... Have you seen them all?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201020017.Content: Do you, too, desire that which they ceaselessly hold dear?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010191.Content: It was one merry night, and now she wants to take my life?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010192.Content: Following me like a shadow... Can't you do anything without me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010196.Content: Filthy monkey! Aren't you dead already?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010197.Content: You're the one who ruined it all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010198.Content: This time, I'm staying here. You won't make me leave again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010336.Content: What did you do to her?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010339.Content: Her time was... already running short.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010340.Content: I won't let him have his way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010342.Content: I see now. Mother has been deceived!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010343.Content: He is not our uncle. A vile and rotten deceiver, nothing more!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010344.Content: You girls are far too young to comprehend my design.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010314.Content: Come down, Grandmaster. I need you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010316.Content: I'm so sorry, Mother. I should have known better than to make of him a gift to you…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010318.Content: You lived a grand life up above. But a deceitful one marred your immortal destiny!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010319.Content: And I helped him... Why did I bring the cursed ones into our home?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010330.Content: She told me that in this life, she wished to lay eyes on me just once more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010331.Content: But what difference would that make?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010332.Content: Forget this one here, little sister.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010333.Content: Yeah, forget me. That'll be for the best...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010045.Content: I journeyed from Mount Li to delve into the mysteries of this valley.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010046.Content: I didn't mean to hold this back from you. It was because I had to.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010047.Content: I stayed my hand for my ties to his mother. That's why I called upon you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010048.Content: But how did you get this? I thought it was with the Hundred-Eyed Guai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010049.Content: This...may well be the design of destiny itself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280010050.Content: I shall help you and restore its power. Consider this as my token of gratitude.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.280030010.Content: How could I forget about his crowing…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340060004.Content: Take this! And this! And die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340060023.Content: Wrong, that! It's good! It's so good!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340060030.Content: My eyes! My eyes! I'm blind!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340060031.Content: That was me! Not the monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050001.Content: Blind as bats, scared as mice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050002.Content: Blindman seeks monkey, laughs come aplenty.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050005.Content: Think you can see through the mist?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050019.Content: No more fire! It's no good!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050021.Content: It's a curse to have you as an ally!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050023.Content: I knew he'd die before me. That fool!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050024.Content: It's you and me then. That's how I like it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340050025.Content: I can't believe I miss that blind fool.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190001.Content: A gust to feed the fire!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190002.Content: More. More! The fire is mine!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190003.Content: Sear the fur for a better bite!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190008.Content: Can't you see straight? Aim at the monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190009.Content: Look again, it's me! You have a problem with me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010003.Content: You flew into the fire yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190010.Content: Watch it, you. Out of my way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190011.Content: Holds me back even in death!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010005.Content: To think he'd die before burning his target!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190013.Content: That thick head of yours was no match for that staff, eh?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010006.Content: And you think yourself a hero?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010007.Content: We had you when she had you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190014.Content: Eat the body, and hang the head.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190015.Content: A monkey head for my collection.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190016.Content: Add to the blaze and swell with the breeze!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010010.Content: Burn him! He can't stand the fire!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190018.Content: And blow his ashes away. Less trouble then!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010011.Content: My fire finds you, with or without the wind!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010014.Content: I need a breather. You deal with him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190019.Content: You sick sluggard! I might die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010015.Content: Can't roll no more. Spent… I'm spent.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190020.Content: Don't stop now! It's on our heads if he goes free!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010016.Content: Thought I'd be tireless without a body.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010017.Content: First, the wind-blower, then me, the heavy-lifter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190023.Content: Try your head against my wind!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190024.Content: Here! Fill your belly with all this air!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190027.Content: Filled with feast, my wind's released!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190028.Content: Now give me a piece of you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190029.Content: You'll be slammed under my head, skinny boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190030.Content: Keep it going, and spin him around!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010018.Content: Don't tell me what to do! Move along!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190031.Content: I'm here. I'm there! Try to hit me mid-air!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010019.Content: Enough of your teasing! We can't allow him to escape!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190032.Content: Good for you. Flame on! Burn him and the merit is all yours!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010020.Content: Pah! When did I ever get that? It's yours every time!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190033.Content: You've burned me, you blind oaf!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190034.Content: The monkey won't kill me, but your fire surely will!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010022.Content: My fire just finds whoever is in its way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010024.Content: Ouch, me head! Go easy on me, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010025.Content: It's kill or be killed then!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190035.Content: Easy! You don't want to see "your" head in the air!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190037.Content: A tough skull! There's no winning this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190039.Content: What were you using against me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190041.Content: Blasted monkey! I felt that one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340010026.Content: I'm just a head, but I can die too...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190042.Content: And that huge head still holds me back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190043.Content: What old times? You're in my way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190045.Content: You and that fox can burn to ashes together!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190046.Content: You've got something strong in there?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190047.Content: Hey, one life each, let's keep it fair!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190048.Content: Great. Great! More smash and thrash!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340190049.Content: Burned to ash or ground to dust, you'll die all the same. And it'll be all on you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050001.Content: You brazen ingrates! This is utter treason to your own order!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050002.Content: Everything you have now, you owe it to me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050003.Content: I see no rival when I look at those feeble girls, but you...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050004.Content: You are seeking your doom just like those girls. A doom that I'm more than pleased to give you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050005.Content: Are your minds as muddled as your mother's?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050006.Content: How can she find peace knowing you girls have turned against me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050007.Content: That monkey must've swayed your wits with lies! Come, let's finish him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050008.Content: I lost my temple as well as her. What remains to fear when I've nothing left to lose?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050009.Content: When the sky falls, none shall stay hale and whole.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050010.Content: Blame me not, my dear. They forced my hand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050011.Content: I see how you girls wish to join her in the grave. I'll grant it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050012.Content: Sweat and blood, I gave, for a nod from up above. They are fruitless, all my deeds, be they foul or not.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050013.Content: If you deny the path of ascension, I might as well walk it alone!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050014.Content: I admire how much you girls love your mother. Now, join her in death!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050015.Content: And you! My plan is undone because of you... Pay it with your life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050016.Content: The Celestial Court has sealed this place for years. Yet you girls never understand what I strive to achieve!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050017.Content: You are the one who ruined my grand design!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050021.Content: Destiny twists and turns. Why must I bear the toll?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050022.Content: You seek your doom? I'll speed you on your way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050026.Content: "The rebels with might find no rightful demise!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050027.Content: Step closer, there's another strike to bear!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050029.Content: Die in the light and the sight of my eyes!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050030.Content: Today I will break my destiny, and yours too!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050031.Content: "Indifferent is the world, to which all creation are petty souls."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050032.Content: "Indifferent are the wise, to whom all people are petty souls!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050033.Content: They think I'm a petty one? They should see how I bite the hand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050035.Content: From the fog a light so bright, dimming sun and moon in sky!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050037.Content: Even Sun Wukong himself stands no chance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050038.Content: I can trap him as I trapped you, and seize his life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050040.Content: I never show mercy to those with power!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050041.Content: Your life ends now, feral monk!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050043.Content: Take this as a gift from one humble Daoist!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050044.Content: "Grace before greed is what the world does need."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050046.Content: You'll never make it without that rooster and his mother!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050048.Content: As I recall, the needle was drained of power. Where did you find a new one?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050049.Content: What a sick fusion of creatures! Is that what you count on to best me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050050.Content: It was you who killed that unsightly disciple? A fitting end for him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050051.Content: Rest assured, I had a place prepared for you in the Valley of Blooms.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050052.Content: The supremacy of Kunlun stands behind me. I can kill every Destined One I find!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990210.Content: Who'd live in this forsaken place? None but spineless guais, fooling about.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990211.Content: We came here on your word, but see? Even the pests here plague our path!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990212.Content: I'm spent, not a wink of sleep last night.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990213.Content: I'll take a nap, you clear them out.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990214.Content: Tough to beat, eh? Was hoping for a decent rest.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990215.Content: Fine, no more resting before I get some quiet.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990217.Content: What rotten luck! We're always a step behind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990218.Content: Eyes open now. Is there anyone still breathing?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990220.Content: With the years upon me, only the loudest colors can catch my eye.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990221.Content: Why did I bother telling you? You have no sense of taste, after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990223.Content: What petty guai dares to startle me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990224.Content: Where'd you go, monkey? Need your help here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990225.Content: Look at this splendor. I'd drop any title up above in a heartbeat just to stay here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990226.Content: Why rush on the road and waste all the good time? I say we drop it here and go back to my village.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990227.Content: These guais are a handful! Go fend them off.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990232.Content: Heard someone telling a story in there, I think.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990233.Content: Come here, kid. Never say no to a story.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990234.Content: Can't make out the words from behind these walls. Let's get inside.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990236.Content: You restless monkey! I was talking here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990237.Content: Let me catch up, will you, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990238.Content: Now here's a yaoguai who doesn't know any better!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990239.Content: Nothing angers me more than being cut off mid-sentence!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990240.Content: Where're your manners? Can't you see I am busy?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990242.Content: We can't afford any further delay.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990243.Content: Are we going on or is this it for the journey?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990245.Content: This is a fine bit. Better entrust it to me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990246.Content: Fortune is upon us, kid. Real fortune.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990247.Content: What muckheap is this? Smells foul as death!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990248.Content: Tsk, even the utter trash finds a picker.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990249.Content: What's that thing, kid? Let me take a look.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990250.Content: What's the rush? All hotheads wind up dead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990251.Content: We'll make this journey one step at a time, kid. Have some patience.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990252.Content: You're just like Wukong, ever eager for the win.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990253.Content: I'll take it out for you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990254.Content: Don't rush in. Something's not right.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990255.Content: Open that chest, quick. There must be treasures within.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990256.Content: What could this be? Something I won't miss for sure.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990257.Content: There's a nice shrine here, kid. We should take a look.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990258.Content: Looks like there's a dwelling ahead. Care to take a quick peek?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990259.Content: A fruit under a barren tree?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990280.Content: Darn it! Did you see all of that? You think I'm a bad joke, don't you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990281.Content: I told you to run. But you just wouldn't listen!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990282.Content: You're as stubborn as that stupid monkey himself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990283.Content: Treating me like a big fool, you and him both!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990284.Content: How cruel! Do our memories mean nothing to you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990285.Content: Back! Stay back! I can't hold it anymore!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990286.Content: You were mocking me? You asked for it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990287.Content: Have at it… Ow! Not like that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990288.Content: Sturdy kick! Wait! Lost my grip!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990289.Content: You're good! I see you've picked up some of my moves.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990290.Content: No more holding back when our fists fly. Keep at it, boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990291.Content: Sharpen your skills before you try to save me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990292.Content: Useless. You can't even measure up to one strand of his hair.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990293.Content: I took your word and dropped everything. And to what end?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990294.Content: I had made my mind to stay. But you forced me to!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990295.Content: Alive or dead, I'm never leaving this place again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990296.Content: It hurts, it hurts! My head hurts!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990297.Content: Smash! Crash! I'll rake the sky into pieces if need be!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990298.Content: If there's no joy for me, then there's no joy for anyone!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990299.Content: Sun Wukong! Their blood is on your hands, all lost because of you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990301.Content: I'll poke a hole in your head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990302.Content: Leave no den sound and no lair steady. Spare no lives when my rake is ready!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990303.Content: Look here, darling. Watch how an admiral wraps up a fight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990305.Content: Curse you and your stone head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990306.Content: What's this, kid? You're pulling a shapeshifting trick on me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990307.Content: Enough with the tricks! My rake will show you who you truly are.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990308.Content: Think this is beneath you? Everyone gets sullied in a scuffle!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990309.Content: The Purifying Spring is emptied, her tears must be too.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990310.Content: Darling, the wait's been hard on you…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990311.Content: Years up there. I know too well how much suffering that entails.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040001.Content: "Entangled in the web of all deceptions of the heart." Who knows which thread in the net of my thoughts marks me true?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040002.Content: In a place for chanting and peace, you reek of blood. Sit, and seek solace in the scriptures with me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040003.Content: We both bear misdeeds, things we had to do. Life demands of us acts we'd rather not.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040004.Content: I've seen and severed the illusions of life. Now, I devote my existence to the scriptures for redemption.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040005.Content: "The eyes are lured by sight, ears by sound, nose by odor, and tongue by taste."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040006.Content: "Every sense is ensnared by contact, yet the mind, based on the perception of all, differs from all."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040007.Content: "All the six of them, tied to its kind, amidst the mortal world, are unswayed by each other."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040008.Content: A thought springs, a world blooms; a thought ceases, all bonds break.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040009.Content: What is right and what is wrong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040010.Content: To kill is foul. But for a noble cause, can it be justified?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040011.Content: It is as easy to recite as it is difficult to embody.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040012.Content: Let not the years lead you to lament as they have led me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040013.Content: A g-ghost? Weren't you dead already?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040014.Content: For years, I've prayed you'd find peace. Still, you come to take my life in penance against yours.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040015.Content: You wouldn't understand my agony when I took your life...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040016.Content: The Buddha sees no such vengeance. I shall usher you to the beyond once more!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040017.Content: The nature of yaoguais... is beyond remedy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040019.Content: Nothing, not even the scriptures, can free me from this chain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040020.Content: Kind sir, pause your steps and heed my story.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040021.Content: I was a fox guai who practiced to become one of the humans.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040022.Content: One day, I was foraging for food and found myself caught in a hunter's trap.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040023.Content: A young scholar saved me and kept me in his home to let me heal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040024.Content: I couldn't move, yet my heart swelled with gratitude.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040025.Content: I thought I could aid him in his career in return for saving my life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040026.Content: Little did I foresee that, following a dream, he would take my life. My soul lingered, yet he left without a trace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040027.Content: I sought tirelessly, only to find he had become a monk in the New Thunderclap Temple.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040028.Content: Feeble in power and lacking in training, I am barred by the temple's aura.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040029.Content: I beg you, sir, to take my fur and wear my form. Confront him and calm my sorrowful heart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040030.Content: He's hiding in the side hall of the temple. Kind sir, will you lead me to him?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040031.Content: They say mortals and yaoguais walk different paths.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040032.Content: But it's after seeing him again that I understood...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203040033.Content: Those who fear yaoguais are fouler than what they fear.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020018.Content: What should I do? I'm caught in a tight spot.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020019.Content: Come closer, and fear not. Noble blood doesn't prey on travelers like you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020020.Content: You don't look like a yaoguai from these parts. Have you come to earn the Black Wind King's favor?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020021.Content: Hear me. That bear is but a hollow shell. He can grant you nothing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020022.Content: Don't waste your time on him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020023.Content: He lies about cheating death and even the treasures. His followers are, all of them, deceived.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020024.Content: Black Wind Guai is a sly one. He preaches virtue with a heart full of greed. I wouldn't entrust him with my plea.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020025.Content: I do not know why you are here, but you should be vigilant.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020026.Content: Now, I'm pressed for time. Fare thee well, then.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020027.Content: This is a mistake. A mistake! With my respect, I request an audience with your King!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020028.Content: Please, this is not necessary! Could you please untie me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020029.Content: Good sirs, I just want a word with your king!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020031.Content: Go. Leave! I don't need your help!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020032.Content: Fate binds us, sir. From the Black Wind Mountain to here, we meet again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020033.Content: Those rats... They tied me up on sight for no reason.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020034.Content: Joking they'd prepare me for their king's table!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020035.Content: This place crawls with yaoguais eager for a bite.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020036.Content: But don't worry. If they bite into me, they'll bite more than they can chew.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020037.Content: This place is a jumble of rats and cats—all at each other's throats.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020038.Content: And the Yellow Wind Sage keeps silent. How odd!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020039.Content: Who would swear fealty to such a king?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020040.Content: Best make haste and go. Never linger in a peril such as this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020041.Content: Just leave. These rats are no match for me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020042.Content: I can make my own way out.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020043.Content: You are a skinny one, but these rats aren't picky eaters.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020045.Content: I won't die here with my task undone.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020046.Content: There are too many eyes around here. We'll meet again if fate wills it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020048.Content: Yellow Wind Ridge offered me nothing. Yellowbrow the Buddha was my next plea.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020049.Content: Only after meeting His Grace in The New West did I see - I wasted my life for others and missed much joy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020051.Content: My king is suffering, yes. But does one not weave the threads of one's destiny?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020053.Content: His Grace speaks true. Indulge, and you shall be carefree.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020054.Content: This joy... It's new to me, like never before.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020055.Content: My king once sought wisdom in such a dharma place. His son, too, was a disciple of a Bodhisattva.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020056.Content: Now I too walk on this path. I hope I'm following in my king's steps.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020057.Content: Say, my friend, why don't you stay here and tread this path with me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020058.Content: Grim and dire is this land!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020059.Content: I came here from the New West for the wisdom of the Hundred-Eyed One.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020060.Content: But he shut his doors and made me prisoner in this lair.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020061.Content: Tales speak of these insatiable spider guais. They could use a strong male like me to consume and practice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020062.Content: Much I owe you today, my friend!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020063.Content: Without your help along the way, I would see no more of the Flaming Mountains.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020064.Content: Ever heard tell of a Destined One, my friend?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020065.Content: They say he marches and fights on a quest to bring back the Great Sage!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020066.Content: The Great Sage and my king once swore brotherhood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020067.Content: After the Sage fell, the king dismissed every one of us. He became someone not himself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020068.Content: If the Destined One is really the one who can bring back the Sage, he can count on my humble support!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020069.Content: My plea for aid was met only with silence along this path. But in turn, I've seen through it all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020070.Content: My mind is made, friend. I shall rely on none but myself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020071.Content: If none shall aid, I will act on my own!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205020072.Content: Should our paths cross at the Flaming Mountains, we'll toast to our reunion.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.104010035.Content: Leaving so soon? Why the shyness?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090001.Content: "Long bound by worldly cage, now free in nature's sage."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090002.Content: Have you seen those nameless souls adrift on your path?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090003.Content: Their wills float aloft, never to fade.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090004.Content: Shame, your gourd serves little purpose, and mine answers solely to me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090005.Content: I know a way to guide the souls, mend their paths, and set them free. It will aid you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090006.Content: Now, this is better. This gourd, though humble, may save the lost, banish their obsessions, and guide them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090007.Content: For one as destined as you, there can be no turning back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090008.Content: We are like tumbleweeds, drifting through life, with a destiny beyond our grasp.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090009.Content: Fair sights fade. But with ink, I bid them stay.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090010.Content: The road has claimed you. Now you must see it through.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090011.Content: Your heart will guide you further. We shall meet again.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090020.Content: Their minds yearn to ascend, yet fame still holds sway.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090021.Content: Their glory fades through time, in tombs of somber gray.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090022.Content: "Hurled by gales, to and fro, changed from our former glow."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090023.Content: The signs told me you would come here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090024.Content: Such is destiny. What's done is one step before what's to come.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090025.Content: It houses a treasure that none other can see — a scale shed by the Old Loong King of Jing River upon his beheading.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090026.Content: Have you seen it in this ridge, young friend?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090027.Content: When the Loong King defied the Court, the Jade Emperor was set to punish his entire house.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090028.Content: The four sons of the Loong King, deities of the four waters, fled.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090029.Content: Deities? Not even they have control over their destinies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090030.Content: Once caught in the threads of karma, all are mere offerings on the platter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090031.Content: Four loongs for the four waters under the sky. Their destiny is sealed, as yours and mine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090040.Content: "Knowing the joy within the play, why chase the notes astray?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090041.Content: Love and passion are as fleeting as the clouds. In the end, they leave nothing but cobwebs and dust.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090042.Content: A broken mirror cannot be made whole again, my friend.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090043.Content: Tell Master Pig, if you will, that attachments are not to be dwelt upon.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090044.Content: Immortal once, from above. For love, she strayed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090045.Content: In her webbed prison, through mortal years, she stayed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090050.Content: "What comfort does this heart implore? A humble drink, its solace I adore."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090051.Content: A fine brew deserves a fitting gourd.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090053.Content: The Bull King accepted his destiny, but there are others who refuse to do the same.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090054.Content: Family strife confounds even the wisest. Why should we meddle?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090055.Content: With a full gourd's draft by my side, let cares drift away into the tide.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090056.Content: "In years to come, who will know of our rise or fall?"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090057.Content: "Alas, in life, never enough drinks to enthrall."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090058.Content: Why carry a tattered gourd? Find yourself a decent one, and we may share a drink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.102060012.Content: This body of yours is perfect for the art of Rock Solid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010066.Content: I wanted my death, not yours.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010067.Content: Why did we have to cross our paths here?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203010045.Content: Well, who'd it be now? A deity, or a yaoguai?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030001.Content: For all his foresight, Yuan the Signteller could never have known that...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030002.Content: I've hidden upon his garb as a pattern.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030003.Content: Our sire gave his life to pave the way for the journey, and not a day passes that we do not yearn to avenge him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030004.Content: Yet every day we find ourselves adrift, without a home to call our own.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030005.Content: I'll kill you to unbind our destinies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030006.Content: Our sire's head was hung when he defied the Celestial Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030007.Content: We dreaded the Jade Emperor's wrath and pleaded with Master Yuan to help us abscond from our waters.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030008.Content: But he warned us: we might hide for a time, but not forever.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030009.Content: In the end, someone will come to claim our lives.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030010.Content: He had more to say: Sires to sons, we are destined to die for the righteous cause.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030011.Content: I trust him, yet I won't obey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030012.Content: May your path not, once more, be a mere thread in their grand design.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030013.Content: All three of your brothers have been claimed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030014.Content: If not now, when will you reunite?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.204030015.Content: Destiny repeats itself, always. Why not cast the die once more?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020060.Content: The Celestial Court welcomed you, foul monkey, yet you remain untamed!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020062.Content: Dear brother, your edge needs honing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020063.Content: Good, I was in need of a backscratcher!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020066.Content: With such Buddhahood, why bother returning to this mountain?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020067.Content: Have you any idea how many would give their everything for immortality?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.100020069.Content: For that word, all realms and beings have ruined themselves.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107040002.Content: In his steps, you've trod; from his eyes, you've seen.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107040003.Content: The circle has led you back. Have you gleaned any truths?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107040004.Content: Long has an old friend waited for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107040005.Content: Destiny ripens. This last mural holds the key.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107040006.Content: Go forth. No one sees this myth more clearly than him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050001.Content: Say, what's to come of destiny, if he steps out of that mural?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050002.Content: I make a living by reading what was written; the signs alone tell what's to come.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050003.Content: What's to come is what's not yet written.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050004.Content: No one can read what's not written.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050006.Content: What's done shapes what's to come. None escape.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050007.Content: It's all written for me—if only I uncover all that occurred.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107050008.Content: So there really is something even you cannot read.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240021.Content: Insolent rabble! Kneel before the king at once!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240022.Content: Leave my son alone. I'll take you head-on!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240023.Content: Our great cause won't be undone by your wicked hands!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240024.Content: I'll stone you to death, lowly rabble!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240025.Content: Bear the wrath of a king!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240028.Content: Wicked monkey! Have you not heard of the Reverence Edict here for mice?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240029.Content: The mice are supreme above all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240030.Content: My eldest is locked up and my youngest left me. You're my only hope, son!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240031.Content: How mighty we were, standing with Master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240032.Content: But now, we can't even best this vile monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240033.Content: O my Master, quit your meditation, I pray!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320240034.Content: You helped us subdue that beetle. Now, aid us in crushing this filthy monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010001.Content: You've seen fit to ruin my flawless form.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010003.Content: I'm not the old me anymore. You will not see me lose!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010004.Content: My brother doesn't always know the best choice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010005.Content: I chose to walk this path only to carry out his bidding.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010007.Content: Why don't you too try crawling into a sack?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010008.Content: I had to put myself in there to figure out all the wrapped ruses of that Many-legs!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010009.Content: My brother misjudged. You are not the one he's waiting for.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010010.Content: I'll mourn for you when I return to Mount Mei for sure.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010011.Content: A swift blade speaks the loudest!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350010012.Content: My edge thirsts for a spill!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010225.Content: I... I saw how this would end for you long ago.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010226.Content: Keep fighting for others, and in time, you shall fall by their hands.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010227.Content: I, Yellowbrow, fight solely for myself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010230.Content: If only... I could wield that monkey's relic just once more...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240032.Content: Will you not join me and save my father?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240033.Content: I didn't take you for a dawdler, kind monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240034.Content: For you, kind monkey, there's still a choice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240035.Content: But for me, I don't have one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.340240036.Content: Please keep up, kind monkey! We mustn't delay!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330010001.Content: You shall meet your end here and now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202010069.Content: The end... This is the end...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030004.Content: I've been thinking of you every day since.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030005.Content: Keep those eyes wide open. Watch me rip it off and break free!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960003.Content: Keep those eyes wide open. Watch me rip it off and break free!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030007.Content: My brothers tested you at my behest, all for this day.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030008.Content: And only now do I understand that fight.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030010.Content: No band can keep him caged.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030011.Content: A mortal death for an unbound mind and will.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.107030013.Content: I'm now at peace. Your journey, though, has just begun.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050043.Content: I'll soar fearlessly, no matter the strife,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344050044.Content: Cross my path, face the cost of your life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010232.Content: Well, well! Refreshing winds and an old friend. I couldn't be happier.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010233.Content: Join me. Snow is the best soil for poetry.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010234.Content: So, you've left the shelter of Mount Huaguo to wander in this frozen realm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010235.Content: Why choose lingering here over retribution?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010236.Content: Talk some sense into your frowning folk, my friend. The Buddha's soil is no place for bloodshed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010237.Content: Should he choose to ignore your wisdom, let it be.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010238.Content: Homeland ties have a way of binding you two together. Go easy on him, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010239.Content: Easy does it, hmm? I'd prefer my tea stay in the bowl.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010240.Content: Keep on with your dance. I shall read the signs and see where fortune falls.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010241.Content: Why flash your weapons amid these fine sights? That spoils the splendor.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010242.Content: Well, so much for a quiet cup of tea today.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010243.Content: You had him once. What happened this time?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010244.Content: Just try again. Death won't take you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030050.Content: Your faith has led you here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030051.Content: Rest easy. You won't find those noisy chantings and pained screamings here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030054.Content: It's better than you think. Sun Wukong used it to trick that disciple of mine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030056.Content: Now you've found this place, I'll teach you a trick neither of them knows.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030058.Content: Spell Binder. It hurts no foe but binds yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030059.Content: You'll come to understand its use.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030060.Content: An old friend of Sun Wukong came to me, wanting some peace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030061.Content: I led him to the Great Pagoda. Have you paid him a visit?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030062.Content: They say you are the Destined One.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203030063.Content: But if destiny is set, what difference do our actions make?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990023.Content: Today, I'll bring justice for my wife!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990024.Content: Monkey! Join me, we'll bring this vile bird down together!
