StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990025.Content: Stand firmer this time. I'll see this to the end.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990027.Content: I will avenge my wife's death with blood!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990030.Content: Here and now, one of us must die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.349990033.Content: Your murder will be paid in blood!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040014.Content: Hereafter, you may craft more yourself at the Shrines.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110015.Content: Let us join forces and clash once more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110016.Content: Such ferocity was unforeseen... My apologies.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110017.Content: The armor of the beetle is tougher than steel,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110018.Content: Aim for the claws and strike hard.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110019.Content: Watch the sand! The beetle's coming.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110021.Content: Hiding like a coward again? I will make you come out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110022.Content: As long as the drum beats, that one will not get away.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110029.Content: One must rely on none but themselves...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110030.Content: Clearly, this calls for a smarter approach.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110031.Content: Better to live in shame than to die with pride intact.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000001.Content: Why must you remain a yaoguai, brother?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000002.Content: Now show me all the monkey tricks you've got.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000005.Content: Don't make this too easy for me... Where's the thrill in that?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000006.Content: Not pleased by Buddhahood, are you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000008.Content: Those who defy the Celestial Court... shall meet their end!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000011.Content: To be honest, I just can't bear your hypocrisy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000012.Content: Yaoguai or not, you are what I say you are!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000013.Content: Denying your guilt now only delays my triumph!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000014.Content: I'll uproot you in the Court's name!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000016.Content: Yield now, it's not too late.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000017.Content: Your escape was a crime in itself,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000022.Content: Your bones will be a treat for my hound.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000025.Content: The celestial might is with me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000027.Content: Sun Wukong! If discipline won't contain you, then an execution surely will.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000028.Content: Dao of purity, unleash your might!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000100.Content: The way was hard, yet you made it here. I am very touched.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000102.Content: Beaten time and again, yet you still return.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000103.Content: If you cannot defeat both of us, then your destiny is still beyond your grasp!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000104.Content: Watch closer, and... don't fail just yet.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000105.Content: Move the mountains. Bury the sun!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000106.Content: "To learn from the past, a firm will you need."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000107.Content: I thought... that you'd be... a worthy rival.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000108.Content: Be warned, I strike without mercy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000109.Content: This... is nowhere... near his powers.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000112.Content: Fail to strike true, and it'll be futile.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000117.Content: To cross life and death, as you have... I admire that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000118.Content: Survive if you're true, or fall soon if you're not.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000119.Content: Years I've waited. Now, let's have it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000120.Content: Your best tricks, use them! Don't hold back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000124.Content: The world is cruel, and destiny unfair.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000125.Content: Somehow, seeing you stirs memories I thought were long lost.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000127.Content: Your inherited gift alone does not shield you from harm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000128.Content: Walking his path is no easy feat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000130.Content: How sluggish. That destiny would prove too burdensome for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000131.Content: No more spells. Step forward, or you shall never outdo him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000132.Content: You made it this far - now show me what you're truly made of!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000138.Content: When you know, it's too late!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000139.Content: Go, test to see if he's the one!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000143.Content: The world knows every stir of your mind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000144.Content: Through the air like a falling star!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000145.Content: From the sky, my sword sweeps the land!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000146.Content: "Craft cloaked in crude, bright truths in shade."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000147.Content: I shake the stars in the sky.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000148.Content: The clouds drift on, barriers abound.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000149.Content: Those in celestial ranks, many of them are below me, and few are like me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000150.Content: Back when he was around, he was the one rival I relished.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000151.Content: "What came before, think of as last life's end;"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000152.Content: Young monkey, now show me how far you can go.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000153.Content: In my training days, my master told me,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000154.Content: And now, I see it clearly: The prison confining us... is of our own devise.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000155.Content: Thunder be my skin, and lightning my heart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000156.Content: Better to start over if you can't evade this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000157.Content: Even stars shift in my wrath.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000158.Content: My sword spans the nine skies, swifter than shooting stars.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000159.Content: I'll train you in his stead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000161.Content: You do have some of his spark, young monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000162.Content: That's it. I won't hold back from now. Let's fight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000164.Content: When he was dragged to the execution yard,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000165.Content: Yet he gave his life to put you in this place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000166.Content: Let me see where your path diverges from his!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000167.Content: Your destiny brought you here, but forget not...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000168.Content: He scorned destiny most of all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000169.Content: The Great Sage? Just a yaoguai titling himself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000170.Content: None ever dared to turn the world upside down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000171.Content: Bearing his Mind is an ordeal. Trust me, I know it more than you do.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000173.Content: You are not him, after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090012.Content: "Dim-lit village, far from sight. Smoke drifts gently, day and night."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090013.Content: "Hounds woof in narrow streets, cocks crow on leafy seats."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.201090014.Content: "Court unstained, no filth around. In idle rooms calm is found."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130001.Content: Shoo, shoo! Sour monkey flesh is not fit for your belly!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130002.Content: Hey, hey! What are you waiting for?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130003.Content: Come, come! Help a big brother and give them a drubbing!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130010.Content: These snake guais are nothing to fear.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130011.Content: Snake gall steeped in drink, though, makes a fine tonic to flush malady.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130012.Content: Here, here, young friend! Be my guest inside!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130020.Content: Well, well, I'd stake you're one more monkey from Mount Huaguo. I've met many of you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130021.Content: By rank of birth, you all ought to call me forefather.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130022.Content: But I'm just an old monkey banished to the mortal world.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130023.Content: I brought treasure troves down to this realm, though. Have a look if something catches your fancy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130030.Content: My, my! I've turned to drink since my descent.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130031.Content: I thought I'd never see those friends again. But here I am, back to the Painted Realm!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130032.Content: Now I'll drink with my friends in this hideaway. Who needs to fight for a journey?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130040.Content: Dew drops, honey brew, sheep curd, palm tipple. I drink all there is!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130041.Content: Cheers, cheers! Fancy doing anything today?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130042.Content: Where there's drink, all is bliss. Without it, the highest court is a cage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130043.Content: You need a fine gourd to drink from. I'll fetch you a fitting one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130044.Content: Now you can finally drink deep and full!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130045.Content: Fight, fight, but not without a gourd that suits just right!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130046.Content: Good, good. This truly is the finest mortal brew.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130047.Content: Age enriches the brew, and the two both cloud our mind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130048.Content: I revel in drunken grace, but keep it from the sober's face.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130049.Content: Such fine brew would fit your gourd well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130050.Content: If only I could drink this with my old friends...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130051.Content: You have a sharp sight, young friend.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130052.Content: Trade as you will, joy is what counts.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130053.Content: Think of it as me earning a drink or two.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130054.Content: Remember, young friend: a sip makes one tipsy, many sips make you hammered.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130055.Content: There's no going back to the Court now. Only drink can drown my sorrows.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130056.Content: Drink, drink. It can lead to success or failure. Do drink wisely.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.213130057.Content: Next time, down a few mouthfuls in one go. It's delightful!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010001.Content: Across streams, over hills, and through the black wind, your blood has spilled.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010002.Content: Wolves howl, snakes wind, flames lick, and the smoke blinds.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010003.Content: Stumble on the lesser, lame; crash before their betters, shame.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010004.Content: With such clumsiness, what destiny do you claim?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010005.Content: As the small fish catches its prey, the bigger lurks behind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010006.Content: Who is the bigger fish? I can't see it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010007.Content: As for the prey and the small fish...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010011.Content: A fine guardian for Guanyin he could have been, yet he came back here to daydream immortality.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010012.Content: Sadly he had the greed, but lacked the pluck.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010013.Content: He could fool his followers, but not himself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010014.Content: His destiny was sealed the moment he donned that band.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010020.Content: A mere human blessed with a lifespan nearing three centuries, yet he was never sated. He just had to seize that one kasaya.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010021.Content: Centuries of devotion, undone by a moment's greed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010022.Content: In the end, a lost soul became him. How pathetic.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010030.Content: Which deities do most abound upon the earth? The Keepers, surely.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010031.Content: Though humble in rank, nothing in the mortal world escapes their eyes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010032.Content: You'd be wise not to spurn their kind, for who knows what powers stand behind them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010040.Content: In his last life, the monk was Jinchanzi, the second disciple to Buddha in the West.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010041.Content: Yet, his arrogance led him to disregard the dharma teachings, and as a result, the Buddha cast him down to the mortal realm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199010042.Content: He was destined to face eighty-one trials throughout his journey. The fire for that kasaya was merely the eleventh.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020001.Content: With the wind and sand you've endured here, did you reach the forgotten kingdom at the end of the land?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020002.Content: Did you find the clash of stones and the fall of Tiger's Acolyte?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020003.Content: If you shut your ears and heed only your inner murmur,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020004.Content: Rats and cats. Neither grasped their destiny, and yet neither admitted it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020005.Content: Listen closely, young one, their complaints ride upon the wind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020010.Content: "No wind wrought such destruction ere, the Samadhi Wind brought only malice here."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020011.Content: Vajras and Arhats, before the Yellow Wind shivered.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020012.Content: Mounts of Bodhisattvas, a lion cyan and an elephant white, in fear quivered.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020013.Content: A wicked yaoguai of fierce might, followed a discerning master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020014.Content: It was his blessing, but also became his curse.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020020.Content: They say yaoguais prey on men, yet men prey on men too, only more ruthlessly.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020021.Content: A fair trade in that tiny well. How does it differ from the trades out in the world.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020033.Content: His Golden Loong Staff meant nothing once mortal compassions took root. Bodhisattvas too could fall in this way.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020040.Content: On a white deer, or a green bull, the Celestial Courtiers mount.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020041.Content: On a cyan lion, or a white elephant, the Bodhissatvas ride.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020042.Content: This great beetle too could be someone's mount.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020050.Content: They could have put their belief in anything, yet they chose a yaoguai.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020051.Content: Those who deny the rules must suffer the wrath.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030001.Content: That stone monkey merely named himself a sage. Yet this altar boy dared to found his own faith and proclaim himself Buddha.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030002.Content: Your faith is firm and will unwavering. You resisted his lures.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030003.Content: All those who were high and mighty found their minds lost and their faith stained…
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030004.Content: But was it truly because of their devotion to Yellowbrow?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030005.Content: As you braved ice and snow, did the stench of shattered ego reach your nose?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030010.Content: For half a verse of the ultimate truth, Snow Mountain Ascetic gave his life, so attained Buddhahood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030011.Content: Such is the sole way to rise above all and build a faith.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030012.Content: If those with talents should proudly scorn the rules and do as they please...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030013.Content: How then may all the realms enjoy peace and prosperity?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030020.Content: An edict for rats turned a son against his sire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030021.Content: Vowing to draw the line with yaoguais, he left his home in fury, never to return.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030022.Content: Now an old grudge lands him caged, and he recalls his home at last.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030023.Content: But with loved ones lost, where can one find home again?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030030.Content: Not a soul can fathom his mind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030040.Content: The journey entailed an arduous road. The monk had his disciples...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030041.Content: And the Eighteen Dharma Guardians, the Twelve Zodiac Deities,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030042.Content: Each boasts unique powers. Should your paths cross, strike up a connection.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030050.Content: Xuanwu of the north, the Vanquisher of Yaoguais.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030051.Content: The Jade Emperor once ordered him to purge the world of evil. The Turtle and the Snake were his generals back then.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030052.Content: Alas, the Snake General can no longer join the ranks, and Xuanwu is no more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040001.Content: You have grown in strength, but not in wisdom.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040002.Content: You've not only hurt Bajie and his darling but also laid waste to the seal of the high ones. A grave misdeed!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040003.Content: Mortal or Immortal, all seek to break from the past and start anew.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040004.Content: Yet destiny, like a lover's tongue, speaks one way and means another.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040005.Content: Though you may savor it yourself, you can never tell if you truly want it or not.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040010.Content: Long ago, the many-legged one was subdued by Bodhisattva Pilanpo and locked on Purple Cloud Mountain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040011.Content: Only by a plea from the Celestial Court was he spared.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040012.Content: The Immortals dispatch minions to enact their will, while they remain serene, as if playing a game of chess.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040013.Content: Pity those pawns! They know full well what they are...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040014.Content: Yet they cling to false hopes and even take pride in it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040020.Content: Even the Sacred Gourmand remains mundane if he clings to the ties of love.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040021.Content: He was an Admiral of the Court, a pig in the mountains...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040022.Content: And Bajie in the journey. Yet his nature remains unchanged.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040023.Content: So be it. A guileless fool may know less sorrow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040030.Content: This one must be a High Immortal from the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040031.Content: Amid the trials of the seven spiders and the many-eyed one, it was Bodhisattva Pilanpo who lent a hand.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040032.Content: No aid from the Court was given.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040033.Content: But Wukong is ever heedless of rules. He might have sought higher places for help.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040040.Content: This rooster is Pilanpo's son. The Dawnstar he was called.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040041.Content: Through him is forged the Weaver's Needle, the one that subdued the Many-Eyed Master.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040042.Content: More than that; he once crowed a giant she-scorpion to death. Indeed, he is a bane to all insects.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040050.Content: The posts of the Court have stood unchanged.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040051.Content: But the same seat might not always be held by the same Immortal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199040052.Content: So too the seven spider guais. They boast an endless procession of generations.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050001.Content: Yakshas are the mightiest of the Eight Legions, after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050002.Content: Be your body hard as metal, meeting death in scores is inevitable.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050003.Content: Yet, why did you endure the fish and those carts just as poorly?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050004.Content: You rush like wind with a clouded mind. It's your desires that shape what you see.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050005.Content: Had your mind been less unsettled, would you still have fallen for that child's play?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050006.Content: Haste oft blinds, while patience illumines.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050007.Content: Next time, can you still fulfill as Wukong without Bajie?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050010.Content: Amid Wukong's rampage through the Court, he toppled Lord Lao's Pill Furnace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050011.Content: A few bricks bearing remnant flames fell here and became the Flaming Mountains.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050012.Content: Lord Lao blamed the furnace-tending boy for his negligence, and banished him to become the Keeper of this place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050020.Content: Before the journey, Wukong lived free and easy. He wandered the lands and befriended the mighty.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050021.Content: He had six sworn brothers, the Bull King among them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050022.Content: The monkey and the bull both called themselves Great Sages. They were two of a kind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050023.Content: As for their parting of ways and hard-fought strife, those are tales for another time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050030.Content: As the Bull King collapsed, he cast a glance behind, as if catching a glimpse of his deepest fear -
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050031.Content: The Red Boy coming to claim his life with the Five Elemental Carts and the Valiant Six.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050032.Content: He wished this day would never come, yet also longed for its swift arrival.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050040.Content: That was Princess Fair Fox of Mount Jilei.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050041.Content: Graced with great wealth, the princess revered the Bull King's immense power. She gladly wed him, despite the ill-suited match.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050042.Content: The two shared some joyous days together.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050043.Content: Until the monk and his disciples came, and Bajie slew the princess.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050044.Content: Stories tell that the two bore a daughter, though her fate is unknown.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050050.Content: To subdue the Bull King, the Jade Emperor issued an edict.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050051.Content: Nezha, with the Incinerating Wheels, the Guai-Slaying Sword, and the Coiling Tether...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050052.Content: And his father, with the Sealing Pagoda and the Revealing Glass. Combining their strength, they mustered a host of Immortals...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199050053.Content: who fought the Bull King and narrowly defeated him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010001.Content: You want to save him, but who'd do the same for you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010002.Content: Died and come back? Changed your mind?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010005.Content: You embrace your destiny. Why not embrace our ecstasy too?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010006.Content: Abandon your sense of justice, and you can perceive all. Just have a try, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010007.Content: Master asked to keep you. Otherwise I'd have finished you off!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010010.Content: The more you resist, the harder I'll make you kneel before the thunderclap!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010011.Content: Follow your desires. That's what makes one tremble with delight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010012.Content: As stubborn as a stone! My words are wasted on you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010013.Content: Now that my persuasion failed, you'll go back to the pagoda and be remade.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010014.Content: The clouds surge and shiver with thunder!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010018.Content: Obey our master, and stop your suffering.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.334010019.Content: Why choose destiny over your very life?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010061.Content: Oi! Come back here! I am not finished!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.205010062.Content: Hey! Where are you going? There's still important business!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000174.Content: sword and spear were dulled, cleaver and cudgel crumbled; and yet, he emerged unscathed.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040015.Content: I must retrieve a furnace forthwith. Pray forgive my departure.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040060.Content: Your grim face alone speaks for that old loong's bullying.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040061.Content: Pray, refrain from blaming him. His ill temper persists unaltered since the first day of our long acquaintance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040062.Content: Regret not, for his power endures. His desire be but one more pill, gladly bestowed by me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040063.Content: Many thanks for reuniting us here, brave one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040064.Content: This is a perfect place for my art. I have long yearned to come back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040065.Content: Henceforth, brave one, come timely to fetch medicines. This is a token of my gratitude.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040067.Content: The Five Skandhas are but abstract notions. Yet you have made them tangible.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040068.Content: Might I be permitted to make something with them?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040070.Content: Born from the Five Skandhas in balance, this grants boundless betterment upon consumption.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040072.Content: Not a medicine that can change your destiny.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040073.Content: The world is a furnace and we are its yields.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040074.Content: Making pills is an art of patience; haste avails nothing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040075.Content: Patience, as the heat has yet to suffice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040076.Content: Not quite the hour yet, brave one. Come again another time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040077.Content: This is what my ceaseless toil finally yields.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040078.Content: It retains the energy of both this world and beyond.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040079.Content: My pills are reliable, but be wiser than relying solely on them.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040080.Content: While valued by the body, my pills help not in ascension.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040081.Content: "Your Qi clarified anew, and entrails restored true."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040082.Content: Pills, when spent, can be remade; mortals cannot.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040083.Content: You'd better follow a prescription, brave one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040084.Content: Big or small, scarcity makes goods precious.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040085.Content: Were it not for you, brave one, I wouldn't pursue this profitless deal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040086.Content: Each pill is a means to an end. My destiny's course, I can't amend.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040087.Content: Many are bent on seeking shortcuts, hence pill-making came to be.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.202040088.Content: No shame in taking the pills. More unfair are the innate skills.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010245.Content: One monkey dead, and another shows up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010246.Content: The face of the Destined One? It will fit me just as well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010250.Content: Visit each temple you encounter and worship every Buddha you see.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010251.Content: Or the true face of Buddha will always remain elusive to your eyes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010252.Content: Why the rush? Try looking around.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010253.Content: To see a Buddha, one must hold the Buddha in one's heart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010255.Content: I can't help you before you have that in you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050001.Content: Stop prying! This is not for your eyes!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050002.Content: Young one, you have spoiled my joy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050010.Content: I might as well die! No chance at immortality, and forced to suffer your torment!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050011.Content: This old loong can hardly move a muscle as he is.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050012.Content: Only one of Xu Dog's resurrection pills can save me now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050020.Content: Why are you still here? This old loong's living on borrowed time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050022.Content: I was cast down to the mortal realm, my powers much diminished.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050023.Content: I ask for nothing more than to live out my days peacefully.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050024.Content: Xu Dog loves his medicinal arts.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050025.Content: Given his nature, he's surely tending the furnace flames somewhere.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050030.Content: I knew you could do it! The young may yet be taught.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050031.Content: With this pill, I'll gain the strength to unseal that precious place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050032.Content: The Painted Realm. A peaceful haven I built with my fellow deities.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050033.Content: Now the monkey is in place, we should gather once more!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050040.Content: Now, all the Zodiac Deities may come and go freely.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050041.Content: Don't make light of our kind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050042.Content: Without our assistance on such an arduous journey...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050043.Content: it may be too hard for you to complete.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050044.Content: It's rare for strangers to gain entry here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050045.Content: Seeing our paths crossed, I brought you in.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050046.Content: With no one else around, only your visits can dispel the dullness.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050047.Content: In this world, only the green ones never let me down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050048.Content: I've spent my whole life in service. Now, I deserve to find some peace.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050049.Content: Rest assured, this old loong knows his trade.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050050.Content: From seed to sprout, to fruit, to harvest, patience is the path to follow.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050051.Content: As they say, fine soil yields fine sprouts, and fine sprouts bear fine fruits.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050052.Content: Take it for yourself? You might as well ask for my life!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050053.Content: Let me have it, will you? I will take the very best care of it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050054.Content: Good! Thanks to you, this old loong finds joy. A reward is in order!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050055.Content: Bring a few more next time, young monkey, for yet another treat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050056.Content: Sowing seeds soothes sorrows. Why not stay and join me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050057.Content: Every plant in the world is now rooted in my heart. My existence is fulfilled.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050059.Content: What do you think of my work?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050060.Content: A monkey reaps what he sows.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050062.Content: I've only laid eyes on such a thing but once in the Court. How come you bear it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050063.Content: If you leave it with me, I would be most eager to delve into its study.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050064.Content: Who's there to lend me comfort as I live out my years?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050066.Content: Do visit from time to time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203050067.Content: Perhaps it's for the best. Go ahead! I can't spend all day chatting when there's work to be done.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203060001.Content: Turtle, enough with the tears. The Snake General has passed on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203060002.Content: The once mighty Generals, now tortured and shattered.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203060003.Content: His teardrop holds great power. Take it as his thanks to you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203060004.Content: I'd trade it for nothing! If only I could soak it in my drink...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203060005.Content: Hey, how about letting me keep your gourd safe?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020001.Content: Food has come to me. Can't let you flee!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020002.Content: How can you make your name if you seek the grave?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020005.Content: Where did you learn that move?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020006.Content: That's my father's art, yet he never taught me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020010.Content: I will dig in your mash!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020014.Content: I'll rip you... head to tail!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020016.Content: I'll eat you... by the slices!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020017.Content: Never kneel... even in the end.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020018.Content: I have yet to avenge my father...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020019.Content: I need a new acolyte. You'll do!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.321020020.Content: A warm-up before I kill that rat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010001.Content: Why do you have to turn a deaf ear to my warnings?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010002.Content: One I slew, now another comes. How can this be?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010005.Content: While I stand, none shall pass!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010006.Content: Strike again, and your bones will shatter!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010007.Content: Too much pain to hold that staff, monkey monk?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010008.Content: Not bad, you have some skill.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010009.Content: If fear grips you, then flee!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010010.Content: You monk, where did you learn that art?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010011.Content: This is my secret spell. Who taught you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010012.Content: You have to pass me to reach the king!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320010013.Content: The king must be hungry. You'll make a fine meal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140001.Content: Picking on the aged, you are just like Sun Wukong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140002.Content: Can't an old loong have a moment's peace?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140007.Content: Lightnings shall glow upon my stretch!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140008.Content: I may be old, but I still have the strength!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140009.Content: My sinews are taut, and my spirit remains keen!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140010.Content: Why do I tire so? Let me catch my breath.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140011.Content: This ill-mannered monkey shows no regard for age and wisdom!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140013.Content: Don't mistake immortals for mere yaoguais.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140014.Content: To the deepest trench I dive!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140016.Content: In my prime, a blow like this would have surely been your end...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140017.Content: These old bones can't take such a shock!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140020.Content: Though I'm old, I'm still a loong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140021.Content: Where are your manners, young one?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140022.Content: Age has not dampened my warrior's spirit!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330140023.Content: Alas, you are young, far too young.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120001.Content: All plots spent, naught but void.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120003.Content: Fake plays real, real proves fake.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120004.Content: In triumph lies peril, in peril triumph.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120005.Content: Think you can steal my show?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120006.Content: Watch it, or you'll fall flat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120008.Content: Get down here, and act with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120013.Content: Now's my turn to lead the stage!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330120014.Content: You were flailing like a jester.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170001.Content: If you have new moves, bring them on.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170002.Content: Still youthful, but set in your ways. Why bother trying again?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170003.Content: Playing monkey tricks, are we? Just as I thought.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170004.Content: Why try those amateur tricks again?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170005.Content: You've earned the surprise if you can't see it coming.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170006.Content: Dare to face my chakram with your staff?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170008.Content: You rogue. Dare you to do it again?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170009.Content: You count on your staff. I count on my wits!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170010.Content: So you can lift yourself. Where you land is what counts.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170011.Content: If it's the hard way, then I'll opt for the smart way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170012.Content: You try to win with the numbers? Hardly a fair fight.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170013.Content: Kindness is useless if you don't have wisdom.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170014.Content: And bravery without a plan? That's sheer folly.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170016.Content: You'll have to keep me guessing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170018.Content: In that case, let's stoke the fire.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170019.Content: Adapt to change or face your downfall.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320170020.Content: Brother told me to watch Yellowbrow, but testing you was clearly a better choice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344020001.Content: Go ahead, get your fur burnt down the road. Just you wait!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344020026.Content: I ain't a match for him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344020030.Content: You cross my lass, you die!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344020031.Content: Good that he died fast before that beast heard.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344030001.Content: You're a cruel one! Fine, go feed yourself to that old bull's purply pup.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344030015.Content: Quit lazing about! Get to it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344030027.Content: Monkey in haste, sure to go waste.
StringKVMapDesc.SoundTrackDesc.5009.Name: Monkey in Haste, Sure to Go Waste
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.344030028.Content: Not a patch on my wicked lad, even!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000001.Content: The front gate is sealed. Why not yield and join my disciples?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000002.Content: Disciples, the pilgrim himself has come for my teachings!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000003.Content: I revealed my power to entice you here. Shall we make a wager?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000004.Content: I know you possess some skill. Defeat me, and you shall go free.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000005.Content: Here, they all call me Master. Unbidden, they flock to me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000006.Content: Insolent! You have defied the Buddha and sullied this blessed ground.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000007.Content: How dare you trespass upon this revered place with no remorse?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000008.Content: You may have crushed the Gold Cymbals, but can you withstand my Spikeshaft Cudgel?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000009.Content: Deciples! This unruly monkey... what penalty should he face?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000010.Content: Watch closely, disciples, as I enlighten this witless, headstrong monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000011.Content: Far have you traveled to be here. Do you seek for your demise or my teachings?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000012.Content: I can cease your struggle with but one hand upon my cudgel!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000013.Content: I shall meet you in combat, devoid of any relics, to see who prevails!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000014.Content: You are at the end of your wits, with no one to turn to. Why persist with this farce?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000015.Content: Abstain not from evil, lest virtues fail to take root.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000016.Content: "Purifying the heart-this is the teaching of the Buddhas"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000017.Content: "By my merits and the blessings of all Buddhas..."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000018.Content: "The dharma cycle shall endure, and all shall find ecstasy."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000019.Content: "In realms above and below, I alone stand supreme!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000020.Content: "For the sufferings of the Three Realms, I must provide solace!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000022.Content: "Disavow the Four Graces and suffer the Three Paths."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000023.Content: "Shatter the barrier of karma, and together we shall attain the ultimate Bodhi!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000029.Content: They fill the world all over!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000030.Content: Enlightened, I shall guide the world and redeem those gone astray.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000031.Content: None in the Three Realms escapes death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000032.Content: Those above relish their joy, yet they too shall perish in time!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000034.Content: My sack awaits misguided souls like you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000036.Content: You are too steeped in misdeeds to be my disciple!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000037.Content: Lofty goals, meager skills. A source of woe merits only death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000050.Content: I remember what the Buddha said at the Ullambana.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000051.Content: "All beings suffer as they heed not the precepts and indulge."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000053.Content: Thou shalt kill, lest feuds instill.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000054.Content: Thou shalt snatch, a fair play in a fair match.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000055.Content: Thou shalt lust, before all loves turn into dust.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000056.Content: Thou shalt boast, for prestige and legacy it doth host.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000057.Content: Thou shalt drink, and drenched unease shall sink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000058.Content: Thou shalt revel, prime year shan't be spent to settle.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000059.Content: Thou shalt dream, to reach in bleak void the sole gleam.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000060.Content: Thou shalt indulge, or life is but a scourge!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000070.Content: Blame not the pilgrim, Gourmand, for earlier we were lost in reminiscence.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000071.Content: Haste makes waste. Let him relish the reunion at ease.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000072.Content: That is untrue. The credit for his strength lies with that sack of mine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000073.Content: You have entered my sack, and now you must rest your weary limbs in it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000074.Content: His entrance in the sack has made him my disciple. I can teach you too.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000075.Content: Even with the title of Sacred Gourmand, you yet cling to the hunger for triumph.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000076.Content: All dharma is emptiness, but karma alone is not.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000077.Content: All is made from the mind. With the mind, all dharma arises and ceases.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000078.Content: Do you recall what I taught, macaque? Vanquish the reflection from the past, and you shall reach nirvana.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000079.Content: What a special treatment for your homeland bond!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000080.Content: It is only natural. Practitioners may err from time to time.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000081.Content: That is not true, Gourmand. How can one prevail without greed?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000082.Content: The moves are mere forms. His superiority lies in a mind free of fetters and fears.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000083.Content: Your mercy tempers your rage, yet without rage, there can be no mercy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000084.Content: No profanity, no slander. Heed the precepts, Gourmand.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000086.Content: Advancing day by day to sever the vexations. That is the sole way to practice!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000087.Content: All dharmas are equal, with no hierarchy, they say. How false!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000088.Content: Fret not, my disciple. Before enlightenment and greatness, you must endure hardship and burden.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000089.Content: Nothing lasts forever, my disciple. Never be indolent!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000100.Content: All conditioned things are impermanent and lead astray.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000101.Content: Be a butcher, then be a Buddha!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000102.Content: To retaliate in kind, you must be of that kind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000103.Content: Now, you have introduced your karma in this cycle.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000105.Content: Such enlightenment surely would grant you Buddhahood!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000106.Content: Three thousand heed my words; countless more revere my name.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000107.Content: They are all yours to have your fill of carnage.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000108.Content: In the Six Paths, all souls harbor the urge to kill!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000109.Content: Even the sky and earth take lives!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000110.Content: "The minds of the Buddhas are empty." Yours is now likewise.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000111.Content: Let go of the arms, they say.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000112.Content: But can you let go of your devotion to the idol dwelling in your very mind?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000113.Content: Misdeeds heap upon your head as you find no escape in your suffering.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000114.Content: An ultimate nirvana I shall grant you gladly.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000001.Content: The Destined One. What a glorious name they bestowed on you for this killing spree!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000002.Content: Having traversed the carnage, do you not feel refreshed?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000003.Content: It is a gift from your master here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000004.Content: Craving slaughter without end will be your undoing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000005.Content: Only through loss can you truly evolve.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000008.Content: No one dies before a strike in the heart. No bloom wilts before its root breaks apart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000009.Content: Even those on high must cower beneath me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000010.Content: You seek the land of bliss?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000011.Content: There is only abyss, and your abyss is me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000012.Content: Who granted your destiny? Sun Wukong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000014.Content: You are allowed here only because I saw some promise within you. Otherwise...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000015.Content: Flesh and bones are but a decaying form. Focusing on them proves you a fool.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000016.Content: Those who follow me pursue life, only you hasten toward death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000017.Content: To walk the path of Buddha, go within, not without.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000018.Content: Ah, to perceive me through sight and sound together. How wise!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000019.Content: To struggle, exult, relinquish, and revel...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000020.Content: Such is the core of existence!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000021.Content: In pain we find revel; in revel, pain!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000022.Content: Without both, there is no redemption!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000026.Content: Why bother going to Mount Lingshan, when the one true Buddha is right in front of you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000027.Content: I am the Savior Buddha of the New West. Kneel before my Thunderclap!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000028.Content: Your spell is below my wisdom!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000029.Content: All forms are illusions, do you not see?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000030.Content: Defense of your own ego is the root of torment!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000031.Content: A circle of meditation? I can make it better!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000032.Content: I will gladly take them as my new disciples.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000033.Content: What generous gifts before the lesson even begins!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000034.Content: "Focus on the truth, not the outer guise."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000035.Content: Nothing escapes my perception and knowledge!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000036.Content: Your mind ever traverses before your husk disperses.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000037.Content: Not again will I abide by the scriptures.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000038.Content: Mount Lingshan? I'm creating a new land of bliss!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000039.Content: Those mighty and high from across the land, they all bow and hail me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000040.Content: Who are you to defy me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000041.Content: Thou shalt revere, or thou wilt never see sheer.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000042.Content: Behold my Mahavira Hall! How can Mount Lingshan match its magnificence?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000043.Content: What is best about my Seedsack is how it utterly remakes all who enter!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000044.Content: Your faith was in your destiny, not yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000045.Content: A fight on a wagered chance is a lost one.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000038.Content: Precepts invented wrongdoing. See wrong no more and reach nirvana!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000039.Content: Kneel before me and be enlightened! This is your last chance!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.339000041.Content: Take down your master. This is the way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000047.Content: Do you truly think you can outdo us?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.338000048.Content: Overstepping the masters. I excel you in this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070001.Content: Edge sharpened, arm restless. I was looking for someone to test it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070002.Content: Mark me, this blade is cast from the best metal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070003.Content: Don't blame me if you hurt yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070010.Content: This scrap is unfit for my skill!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070020.Content: The Zodiac Deities never hold back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070021.Content: You're far below him. Train well before returning here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070030.Content: Spare me your prattle, it bores me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070031.Content: Since you're here, the scrap you're hauling can stay no more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070032.Content: He was clad in splendor, yet you are plain as dirt.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070033.Content: It's wise to wear more curios to guard yourself. I'll lend a hand.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070034.Content: Back so soon? Give it here, I'll get to pounding.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070035.Content: What rags and tatters. No wonder you're at my door.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070036.Content: What's fair to the eye may prove foul to handle.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070037.Content: Armor and arms? Just ask, and they're yours.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070038.Content: The best gear for the best patron. It suits you well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070039.Content: You need good wears, as the Buddhas need their gilds.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070040.Content: A fine garment obscures the heart lying beneath.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070041.Content: You have the look, but can you prove your mettle?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070042.Content: This can give you some edge.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070043.Content: Hmm... It might befit you well.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070044.Content: Helm and armor in place, a surer pose in any case.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070045.Content: This prime gear has no faults I can find.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070046.Content: You've scaled new heights. Now, put it to the test.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070047.Content: Care to see how you hold with this artifact?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070048.Content: A handy weapon is better than mere muscle and zeal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070049.Content: Why not try your hand with such a weapon?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070050.Content: A deadly edge stirs a deadly urge.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070052.Content: Sure, those Will you have can surely kit you out properly.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070053.Content: Bring it here, forging drains Will the most.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070054.Content: Keep me busy or my furnace goes cold.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070055.Content: Goods in hand, time to forge some gear.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070056.Content: You'd risk your fur with those bits of scrap?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070057.Content: I can't help you when you're dead out there.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070058.Content: All you lean on is a thick skull.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070059.Content: "Master of arms stays firm." Go, and rest assured.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070060.Content: If you need sharper blades, seek me here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.203070061.Content: Now you seem a proper sort. Be on your way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280001.Content: What yaoguai are you to come and play me for a fool?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280002.Content: What was doomed couldn't be saved.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280003.Content: I'll rid you of all pain!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280004.Content: Go back from whence you came!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280009.Content: You're beguiled, much like I was in my younger days.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280010.Content: Once a monk, there's no turning back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280011.Content: Meet me again in your next life...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330280012.Content: To truly love is to let go.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020001.Content: The good who don't fight evil are evil!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020002.Content: When the evil reigns, I'll cast it down!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020003.Content: I hate those who set themselves above others!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020004.Content: Rely on your height? That's no might!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020006.Content: I aid the miserable, not the wretched!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020009.Content: I'll get rid of all evil!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020011.Content: Strike the strong, help the weak!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020012.Content: In your next life, pick on the weak no more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.330020013.Content: To stop the killing, we must kill...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310210001.Content: You want to be a monk? Best get used to hitting the ground!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310210002.Content: You're stubborn! Let me remedy that for you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310210007.Content: You drop no blood in death. That's odd...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310210008.Content: I'll go tell the master. Some fresh meat!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000315.Content: yet you spurned each one. Such ingratitude!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000316.Content: Better to live as a dog than to die a proud monkey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000317.Content: and your defiance only compounds it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000326.Content: Think you're free to rule? Hopeless fool!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000301.Content: But I waited, and here you are.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003123.Content: Will you fall for it again?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003126.Content: Is our fight here and now all part of his plan?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003127.Content: Mind your every move in this life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003129.Content: True glory lies in breaking free from the shackles.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003146.Content: "Fair fused with foul, small count as grand!"
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003147.Content: My blade bolts the air and rouses the thunder!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003148.Content: Seeing you here brings such delight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380003153.Content: "A gate without hinges can't be forced, and a cord without seams can't be undone."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199020006.Content: I fear, the more you yearn for flawless endings, the further you'll stray from the path.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990312.Content: Nonsense. That might fool the boy, but not me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990313.Content: Vile thing! Your speech spews poison! What would your master say?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990314.Content: Once I get out, I'll let him know of this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990315.Content: We need your strength now, boy. He's a real brute!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990316.Content: Go keep him busy! I've been at it too long and need a rest.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990317.Content: What took you so long? Do I have nine lives to spare?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990318.Content: Hurry up and finish him so we can get out of here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990319.Content: A pluck of many?! So every monkey knows it?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990320.Content: Teach what? The art of talking shit?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990321.Content: Boy, you've got no less fur than him. Don't let him outdo you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990322.Content: Bah! I will not be judged by some little altar boy!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990323.Content: What a noisy one you are! Come in here and meet my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990324.Content: Oh no, the more we fight, the madder he gets!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990325.Content: Watch yourself boy, he's getting worked up!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990326.Content: You shouldn't have cornered him but bared your fangs earlier and finish him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990327.Content: Idiot! Trying to get yourself killed?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990329.Content: That old monkey must've been blind to pick a fool like you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990330.Content: Our Destined One is going to miss his destiny!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990331.Content: Hitting him in the face? Even a fool knows to dodge that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990332.Content: He's scared of your staff. You've beaten the fear into him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990333.Content: That's a wily one. He knows how to sidestep your staff!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990335.Content: Poor luck. He saw through you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990336.Content: His skill outstrips yours... You have to admit that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990337.Content: Open your eyes. He was tricking you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990339.Content: Boy, this isn't exactly the time for lousy jokes like that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990340.Content: Useless. You should have honed your moves more.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990342.Content: Quick and neat! That's the way to take him on!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990343.Content: Useless clot. You're better off dead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990344.Content: I don't need your help to get Wukong back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110117.Content: yet its front claws do shrink from pain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110125.Content: But without the vessel, no one would fear you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110126.Content: all must serve as Dharma sends.
StringKVMapDesc.SoundTrackDesc.3008.Name: In Revel, We Find Pain
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030003.Content: You? Come then, try and defeat me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030008.Content: I'd rather die! There's no way out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030009.Content: Alone in this endless dark. Come end my life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030010.Content: There's no leaving this cave. Please, end me now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030011.Content: No more delays. Come close and finish me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354030014.Content: Alas... To live, what a burden.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350050103.Content: Now, you shall pay their debts!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990001.Content: Monkey! Such power must be new to you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990002.Content: You should first spar with them awhile.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990003.Content: Be not dismayed; with loss comes win.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990004.Content: Let not a lost fight quell your spirit!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990005.Content: Strike harder! He’s only feigning death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990006.Content: How long until you are worthy to face me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990008.Content: As I've helped you, I shall see it through!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990011.Content: Die if you cannot endure it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990012.Content: Your poor moves are your downfall.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990018.Content: Blunt it is. Our battles... always wear down my edge.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990019.Content: This one should suit you well!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990020.Content: You won't be worthy if the fire takes you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990021.Content: Only by enduring flames can you earn his title!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990023.Content: Now you resemble your former self perfectly!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990024.Content: Then if you can, avenge him here and now!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.319990025.Content: You're born from rock just like him, yet far more frail.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990346.Content: "For Buddhas," that boy said... Ah! There must be four Buddhas to worship!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990347.Content: Loony monk. Can't reason with him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990348.Content: Just go through the motions, boy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990349.Content: Who knows if it's true or not? That little monk was speaking riddles.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990350.Content: Back when we journeyed to the New West,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990351.Content: Our master took it for Mount Lingshan. He visited and kneeled to every figure until Yellowbrow captured him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990354.Content: That little monk's up to his tricks once more. Worship my hoof! Let's go back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199030043.Content: the Five Directional Guides, and the Four Temporal Overseers.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106000080.Content: Come with me! Let's find out what that old monkey is up to.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020151.Content: Now that it's dead, you might as well take a good look around.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020152.Content: A great pill the Black Wind Guai had gifted the wolf.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020153.Content: Finding it would be a deserving reward for that fight.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.314020154.Content: Ahead is a treacherous path, young monkey. Don't forget the spell you just learned!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310030017.Content: Such a fitting end for me to fall on his blade.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370016.Content: Why so eager to die when you could walk away?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370017.Content: You challenge me without even letting me have dinner first.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230007.Content: My boy! You too have returned?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310230008.Content: Tell me, good boy; did Tang Monk and his disciples burn?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110032.Content: A skinny wretch like you has come far enough!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.320110033.Content: How dare you come back! Why do you have to come back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354020001.Content: Have you heard the buzz? There's a wedding happening today.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354020002.Content: Our master's waiting for her groom to arrive.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354020003.Content: Groom? It's more like he is but her remedy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.354020004.Content: Just wait till he shows. We snag him, and imagine the reward we'll get!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000176.Content: Well then, we should fight with wild abandon!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000177.Content: Equal to the Heaven, that is not a title for all to bear!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000178.Content: Though alike in form, you can never truly be him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000181.Content: You will not prance before me, puny fire-player!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000182.Content: So much for the bear's gift of immortality.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000183.Content: Yin Tiger? Kneel before the Sacred Divinity!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000184.Content: A most fitting time. My spear is in need of sharpening.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000185.Content: No foreign trickery shall run amok in this land!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000186.Content: Yellowbrow's discernment in choosing disciples... lacks a lower bound.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000187.Content: Returned to your true form, have you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000188.Content: He sprang out of a rock. Care to try the same?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000189.Content: A sly rat brings shame to all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000190.Content: An alliance with yaoguai forfeits human trust!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000192.Content: You were vanquished when we had our first fight!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000193.Content: So, the four sons of that Loong King succumbed to destiny after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000194.Content: You murdered your own kin? That is fouler than that monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000195.Content: You should thank me for sparing some of those from Mount Huaguo.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000196.Content: You can save neither him nor the Bull King.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000197.Content: Do you want to feed the horses for the Court, like Wukong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000198.Content: Where are your skills? Do not sicken me with such foulness!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.380000199.Content: Vile yaoguai. You've sullied the snow of Mount Mei!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.370010001.Content: Behold what the Great Sage can do!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.370010003.Content: From this day, my name shall be Sun Wukong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990355.Content: Blast it! We're meant to be doing some worshipping. Did you see any Buddha?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990356.Content: I've seen many pot-bellied Bodhisattvas, but none quite like this curious pot-bellied boy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990357.Content: The place is teeming with yaoguais.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990358.Content: I doubt if you'll even survive to find Yellowbrow, given your meager might.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990359.Content: No more dawdling, boy. Bringing Wukong back is what matters most.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990360.Content: Fur-faced idiot. Why loiter there? Are we leaving or not?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990361.Content: It is a temple, no doubt. It won't hurt to peek inside.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990362.Content: The frost is biting hard. Even my rump is frozen solid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990363.Content: Ah, a handy cave to shelter us from the wind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990364.Content: If I fall sick from cold, boy, the blame falls square on you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990365.Content: By my keen eye, ford the stream, and we'll surely find something interesting.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990366.Content: An enclosure lies there. You go take a good hard look for me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990367.Content: I need a rest. That pavilion looks like a good place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990368.Content: You cheeky blighter. Why come here where the path runs out?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990370.Content: What a prank. Scores of hailed figures and none of them bears my honest face!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990371.Content: You're not even close to Buddhahood yet!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990372.Content: This must be the Snake General, now nothing but bare bones!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990373.Content: That Yellowbrow is surely cruel, I'll give him that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990374.Content: A mute half-wit like you will be like a lamb to the slaughter if you face him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990375.Content: It may not rival the Skyward River, but Turtle General's help was necessary.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990376.Content: Ah, when me and Wukong braved across that river, we were surely a sight to behold!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990378.Content: Where the path narrows, danger lurks!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990380.Content: My hide may be thick, but it's no match for this bitter cold.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990381.Content: So much for the journey, I guess!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990382.Content: I see a wanderer. A monk must lend aid where need arises.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990383.Content: The New West is rife with liars. Steer well clear, he's surely up to no good.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990384.Content: Nothing but white all around... Not a whiff of treasure!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990385.Content: Aye, a sly one he is, not to be trusted.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990387.Content: If I find it first, won't that be a treat?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990388.Content: One more familiar face! Are all my old friends in Yellowbrow's clutches now?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990390.Content: Why are these Immortals in the New West instead of up above where they belong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990392.Content: Hey, off you go and tell him, Admiral Bajie is here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990393.Content: It's been a lifetime, old bones! Your temper's grown fiercer!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990394.Content: You old codger! At least you should show some respect for the Sacred Gourmand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990395.Content: We're all friends here, what's with the thunder?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990397.Content: This old loong's a nasty piece of work, boy. Turns on you quick as spit.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990398.Content: Now that's no proper spell, not by any stretch.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990399.Content: I've never seen such wicked move in all my years as the Admiral!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990400.Content: He's a high and mighty Immortal after all, boy. Dodge his move, will you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990401.Content: You old beast! How can you be so cruel at your age?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990402.Content: Well, old bones. Looks like it's down to me to see you off to the boneyard now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990403.Content: Go easy on him, boy. He's one of our own, after all.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990406.Content: You're even darker than me now! But my look is still better than yours!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990407.Content: Back home, but dragging your feet now, are you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990408.Content: I don't have all the time in the world!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990409.Content: Admiral Bajie stands here! Who dares approach?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990410.Content: On and on it goes. What on earth are you so afraid of?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990411.Content: Looks like they just don't fancy us going into this place.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990412.Content: These are not yaoguais, kid. They're henchmen of the Court.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990413.Content: That means they're even more worthless!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990414.Content: No matter your number, stand in my way, and you'll be put under!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990415.Content: Who did Wukong offend to draw all this?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990416.Content: My grand marine could crush these paltry troops with ease!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990417.Content: How did they do it, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990418.Content: Idiot! If that's your best, perhaps Wukong should stay laid to rest!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990419.Content: That staff is rightfully yours. Go on, give it a grasp!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990420.Content: Wukong's staff is too mighty for me to hold. Do it, it's the only thing you need!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990421.Content: Let's go. That old monkey will be waiting on the peak of the hill if we have the five relics.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990422.Content: You're always in such a rush, and now you've gotten cold feet?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990423.Content: The peak lies just ahead. Let's be on our way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990424.Content: These nitwits don't know their place. Let's remind them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990425.Content: I won't back down, not even if the Jade Emperor himself showed up today!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990426.Content: Have your commander step forward if he dares to duel with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990427.Content: Ignore these worthless idiots. Eyes front and up the mountain, kid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990428.Content: The Court's dogs or the Buddhas' puppets. I'll slay whoever stands in my way to find Wukong!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990429.Content: Think about what you can do, kid. Those weaklings won't stand a chance.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990431.Content: Ask around up there. No one dares to meddle with me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990432.Content: Curse it. You're in my way!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990433.Content: Move it or lose it, all of you!
