StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990434.Content: Where's your head at, kid? Drift off now and all is lost.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990435.Content: How could you come so close only to fall short at the last steps?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990437.Content: He said we'd find him here, but I don't see a trace of him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990438.Content: There's nothing but a rock here. What's this supposed to mean?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990439.Content: If you ask me, this rock must be the stone egg that holds Wukong.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990440.Content: I gave it a knock, but nothing happened. Maybe you should have a closer look.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990441.Content: Perhaps it answers to you alone, like the Somersault Cloud?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990443.Content: Here at last but still you wait. Do you think this rock will be the end of you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990445.Content: Boy, this is not the right time to rest in peace!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990446.Content: Shall I heal your ails? I have a healing touch, you know.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990447.Content: What medicine do you have? Take them fast!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990448.Content: Flee.. now! or you'll be dead!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990449.Content: Try to survive, kid, so we can plan our next move!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990450.Content: Good. You've learned much by my side!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990451.Content: Such strength! I'll lend my rake to that!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990452.Content: You dare boast and prance with such meager skills?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990453.Content: You've chosen to bar my way. Don't blame me if I make you pay!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990454.Content: I'm cooked! A pig well done I'll be!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990455.Content: Burning your opponent doesn't show true skill!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990456.Content: That numbs my bones. Don't let it touch you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990458.Content: Show no mercy, kid. We must bring Wukong back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990459.Content: Kill it quick, hold nothing back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990460.Content: Say, kid, who can stop us when we combine our strength?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990461.Content: Wukong had to return the vessels, but look at you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990462.Content: What worries could you have with that at hand?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990463.Content: How about letting me have these vessels once Wukong's brought back?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990464.Content: What a form! Even I don't have it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990465.Content: With a form like that, you're sure to win!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990466.Content: That's a perfect form for a prank!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990467.Content: Ah, I could almost see Wukong landing that strike!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990468.Content: Be patient. Bide your time before you strike!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990469.Content: Now! A surprise kick will end them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990470.Content: Be sure to gauge your aim before you do it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990471.Content: If you were Wukong, he'd be stuck there for as long as you like!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990472.Content: The spell is cast, strike hard and fast!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990473.Content: As hard as a rock, kid!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990474.Content: That's even harder than Wukong, I mean it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990475.Content: Solid as a rock, but your timing needs work.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990476.Content: Don't worry, kid. I'm here to watch your back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990477.Content: That move was simply a mistake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990478.Content: A minor trick. Wukong could make them by the hundreds!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990479.Content: Have them outnumbered! Cut off any escape!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990480.Content: Your lackeys are gone, but I'm still standing!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990481.Content: Useless minions. It's about time to do it myself!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990482.Content: Good! Take a breather before you land a better strike!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990483.Content: Must be nice and cozy watching me get pummeled from there!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990484.Content: His power once matched Wukong's. It's up to you now! I can't handle him alone.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990485.Content: You mongrel! I can't do it myself, but the Jade Emperor will know of this!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990486.Content: Worthless servant! I'll let you off the hook today, but don't let it go to your head!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990487.Content: He has wings as hard as steel. Land your strike only when he spreads them!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990488.Content: I'll rip those wings right off you! Just you wait!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990490.Content: That's even tougher than the skull of a monkey!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990491.Content: Where's that vessel you just got, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990492.Content: Get back and take him down! I've got an old score to settle with him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990494.Content: Be careful not to break your staff on it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990495.Content: A horn as hard as that is something I'd collect!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990496.Content: It's a lot less dangerous without the horn.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990497.Content: Hey! The horn's already grown back!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990498.Content: Keep your guard up! The thunder restores its horn.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990499.Content: Now your head's tougher than its horn!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990501.Content: Not so great and mighty now, are we?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990502.Content: A poor death, by a mere untamed animal.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990503.Content: I won't stand a chance if you fall here, kid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990504.Content: Hey kid! I just can't miss out on a share of glory.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990505.Content: Vile beast! Here comes your death!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990507.Content: What's with this coagulation of blood? Foul, it is!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990509.Content: Even I have never seen such monstrosity.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990510.Content: That's a tough one, kid. What say we pick an easy one first?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990511.Content: Did you tick off our friend in there, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990512.Content: Quick, pull out whatever you have. My life is on the line!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990513.Content: What's that sound? Can you handle it or not, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990514.Content: Has... has it gotten desperate or what?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990515.Content: Ouch! That was a serious strike, right in the gut! Awww...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990516.Content: Ungrateful wretch! I've been nothing but good to you, and this is how you repay me?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990517.Content: Ow! Watch your aim, kid, make sure you're not hitting me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990518.Content: Hey! It hurts! Hurry up and finish it off!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990519.Content: Please! Stop stabbing me... Please, no more!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990520.Content: Do something, kid, or I'll be dead sooner than you think!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990521.Content: Make it stop, will you, kid?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990522.Content: Who just fell? You or the mantis?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990523.Content: Is it down for the count? Now finish it off!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990524.Content: Why are you failing me now of all times, kid? Now I'm done for!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990525.Content: You can't be dying on me, kid... I'm counting on you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990526.Content: Young one, did you ever hear the story of Yellowbrow?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990527.Content: He used to be a measly altar boy to Maitreya in the East,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990528.Content: stole his master's vessel to gain great power in the mortal realm.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990529.Content: When we journeyed to the New West and his New Thunderclap Temple,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990530.Content: our master strolled in and knelt —right into a trap.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990531.Content: Yellowbrow tried to slaughter us all and take on the journey in our stead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990532.Content: That's never changed, even after all these years.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990533.Content: Wukong got trapped in the Gold Cymbals then, just as I did.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990534.Content: He was saved when Kang-Jin Loong broke the Cymbals with her antler.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990535.Content: To think that she has sided with Yellowbrow himself. How odd!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990536.Content: You don't think that he's gotten his hands on some mind-twisting vessels, do you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990537.Content: Speaking of which, the most powerful thing Yellowbrow has should be the Seedsack!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990538.Content: The celestial deities above, the Turtle and Snake Generals under Xuanwu...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990539.Content: And the Third Prince with his Four Captains, sent by the Bodhisattva Guoshiwang.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990540.Content: Once that wicked sack opened up, they were all devoured.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990541.Content: Just as Wukong was losing his wits, Maitreya himself appeared.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990542.Content: What were the chances? That pot-bellied monk came right as we were all out of options.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990543.Content: With his master present, Yellowbrow soon met his defeat.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990544.Content: But I don't think he ever truly gave up. He's always had it in for Wukong for wrecking his plans.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990545.Content: Wukong made it to Buddhahood, yes, but his gloomy mood never left him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990546.Content: He closed his ears to Buddha's teachings and refused any decree from the Jade Emperor. I was baffled!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990547.Content: Then one day, he dragged me along for a drink.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990548.Content: We set out from the west land and worked our way across each of the four lands.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990549.Content: From Mount Lingshan to Mount Luojia, to Mount Sumeru, my Mount Fuling, and his Mount Huaguo...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990550.Content: That drink did me in good. When I opened my eyes, the Three Realms were in total disarray.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990551.Content: They all said Wukong died, and Erlang Shen was the one who murdered him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990553.Content: Who could put an end to Wukong?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990554.Content: He must have hidden somewhere to pull a prank on me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990555.Content: Later, an old monkey showed up and told me to throw my support behind a "Destined One."
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990556.Content: He said the Destined One is supposed to be the key to bringing Wukong back.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990558.Content: You're no match for even one strand of his hair!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990559.Content: I'm wise enough not to believe that Wukong is truly dead.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990560.Content: As for what that old monkey had to say...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990561.Content: A half-truth at best... but I might as well play along.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990562.Content: Just stick by my side and do as I say.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990563.Content: I will get to the bottom of what he's cooking up, one way or another.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990564.Content: If Wukong was here now, he would have already swung his staff at me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990565.Content: That monkey and I must have been bonded by some wicked karma.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990566.Content: I must owe him a debt, otherwise he wouldn't haunt me even in death.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990567.Content: Throughout our journey, he took every chance to poke fun at me.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990568.Content: As long as I played the fool, he didn't care if I was still breathing.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990569.Content: When it comes to benevolence, he can't compare to me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990570.Content: When he couldn't defeat Red Boy, the anger nearly cost him his life.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990571.Content: It was me and my healing touch that saved him!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990572.Content: Well, you do kind of resemble him, looks-wise. But you'd better not take after his temper!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990573.Content: The Journeyer, the Destined One—those are just words they use for you. Don't let them fool you.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990575.Content: He believed Buddhahood is a future of bliss...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990576.Content: Let them prattle as they will. I'm not lustful.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990577.Content: With age comes fondness for fair sights. It's simply to soothe the eyes.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990578.Content: By light of day, this village isn't half bad to look upon.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990579.Content: You know our master was taken by its looks. That's why he insisted to seek offerings here in person.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990580.Content: I said I could do it for him, but he wouldn't lend an ear.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990581.Content: He told me later that there were girls playing balls in the village.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990582.Content: I reckon he chose to go there himself because of that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990583.Content: Off he went, and lo and behold, all those girls turned out to be yaoguais.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990584.Content: They hogtied him with a pretty bow and strung him up for fun.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990585.Content: You see? My master could also be intrigued by oddities, despite his sacred monkhood.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990586.Content: If he hadn't gone seeking alms on his own whim...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990587.Content: Wukong wouldn't have barged in, and so much would have been spared.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990588.Content: Wukong showed no mercy to those yaoguais. He burnt their house down.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990589.Content: But if they weren't bent on getting even, they'd not have gone and lost their lives...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990590.Content: It was a mistake coming with you to this ruined place again. It just rakes up bitter memories.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990591.Content: It has been ages. I wonder what became of...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990592.Content: Enough with that. What's done is done.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990593.Content: Hoy! Don't cut me off while I'm speaking!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990594.Content: Are we so rushed that you can't hear my whole story?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990595.Content: Where are your manners? I was speaking here!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990596.Content: Plug your ears to my tales and you'll be sore for it!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990597.Content: You two monkeys are identical on this. Shame on you!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990598.Content: Hey, where was I in the story just now?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990599.Content: It's not easy to pick up a dropped thread.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990600.Content: Alright, for your knowledge, I'll take my lumps.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990601.Content: Next time, stick it out to the end and save me the extra back and forth.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990602.Content: So... continuing from where we stopped!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370018.Content: That's a familiar trick. You won't burn the temple down again!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.310370019.Content: You! I asked you to guard the bells for your master. You failed!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990604.Content: You nasty monkey! I knew you weren't dead!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990605.Content: That was just like Wukong. For a second I couldn't tell you two apart.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990606.Content: You're back! You're back from the dead!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990607.Content: My empty belly must've made me see things.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199910002.Content: A monk's lust for gold should be quelled.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199910003.Content: Why does Elder Jinchi still cling to that one kasaya?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199910005.Content: how shall they show the world their ties are cut, and their lust is quelled?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199920003.Content: Each bears a distinct root from birth, superior and inferior. None should disturb what's decided.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930001.Content: You tarried in the mortal world for a good while, didn't you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930003.Content: Once again, I proved it to you, Jinchanzi.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930004.Content: You chose a means to an end, not to a proof.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930005.Content: You sow chaos in hearts just for the sake of winning. How absurd and pathetic.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930006.Content: Heh, if not for winning, why debate over means and ends?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950001.Content: You've atoned through deeds, Black Bear. Take this pair of eyes!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950002.Content: You've served the righteous cause, Yellow Rat. These ears are yours!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950003.Content: Your power has gathered anew, Yellowbrow. Keep this nose!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950004.Content: You've endured hardships, Hundred-Eyed. Go with the tongue.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950005.Content: And the bull, it is the hardest to turn against a sworn brother.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950007.Content: Hah, wretched bull, ill luck plagues your every step!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950008.Content: Never have you made a good choice.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950010.Content: We're yet to slay our way to the Court and seize that senile Emperor!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950011.Content: This one must be the chief of their troop.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950012.Content: Brother, watch my back while I go play with him.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950013.Content: Your reluctance is plain, just like my own.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950015.Content: to drink from the River of Childbearing, to bear that boy in my womb.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950016.Content: If not for that monkey, we could've lived our separate lives in peace,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950017.Content: as if none of this had happened...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950019.Content: You knew who I was from the start. Why'd you choose to be their lapdog?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950020.Content: I never wanted to sever our ties.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950021.Content: If kinship means anything to you, give me that relic,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950022.Content: and let me avenge my people!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950024.Content: Let the monkey have my fan, and there will be no trouble!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950027.Content: Your wife's fan, today I'll take it with me too!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950028.Content: Find a master and serve the right.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950029.Content: It's the only path left for the likes of us. Don't you understand, Brother?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950030.Content: Wukong! I took out the bull's concubine with a whack of my rake too!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950031.Content: Turned out she was a fox guai!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950032.Content: The way I saw it, with enough merit and a position before the Buddha,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950033.Content: they would leave me be, and all of you as well...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950034.Content: Now I see. For someone like me,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950035.Content: staying alive is enough to be a transgression.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950036.Content: Brother, take care of your wife and children.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950037.Content: And remember, steer clear of my remains...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960001.Content: What does it matter if you become a Buddha?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960002.Content: That headband has always been on your head.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960004.Content: Sun Wukong, when you defied the Celestial Court,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960005.Content: I had to seal you beneath the mountains with my dharma.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960006.Content: Yet, after enduring punishment, you embraced the dharma,
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960007.Content: uplifted good against evil, and subdued yaoguais throughout the journey.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960008.Content: For your contribution, now I bestow upon you the title of Victorious Fighting Buddha.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960009.Content: He defied the Celestial Court, and the Jade Emperor imposed three ordeals.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960010.Content: Only when the chicken finishes pecking the rice, the dog laps up the flours, and the lamp burns through the key...
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199960012.Content: Bottoms up, brothers! One final toast before we crash the Celestial Palace!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.103010038.Content: You have chosen your way. This time, there will be no easy way out!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.105100027.Content: Does your vengeance weigh more than your family?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.106040008.Content: was granted Buddhahood, and stayed on Mount Lingshan thereafter.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199910006.Content:
Chapter One: Black Cloud, Red Fire
Concluded
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199920006.Content:
Chapter Two: Yellow Sand, Desolate Dusk
Concluded
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199930007.Content:
Chapter Three: White Snow, Ice Cold
Concluded
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199940001.Content:
Chapter Four: Rosy Cheeks, Gray Hair
Concluded
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.199950038.Content:
Chapter Five: Golden Child, Crimson Blood
Concluded
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990608.Content: Are you done staring? Lend a hand!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990609.Content: Sharp mind, dull moves. What use are you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990610.Content: Snap out of it and swing that staff!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990611.Content: This place still looks the same. The past clings here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990612.Content: A tight squeeze. Good I've kept trim.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990613.Content: A wide road ahead. An ambush all but certain.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990614.Content: You sluggard! Even I'm not so idle.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990615.Content: Every idle breath stalls our quest. I'm not that patient.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990616.Content: Found treasure? Let me have a look.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990618.Content: What have you got there? Let me size it up.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990619.Content: Your eyes are sharp! I'd think you once lived here.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990620.Content: Scour all you like. It won't make a difference.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990621.Content: Take it all. We leave nothing behind.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990622.Content: Found something good? Don't forget my share.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990623.Content: Keeping the finest finds from me? That's hurtful, kid.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990624.Content: Nice find. This might come in handy.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990625.Content: You'd even keep that scrap? What a hoarder.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990626.Content: Speed it up. With all this gathering, you barely use any of it.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990627.Content: Smell that? Might make a fine medicine.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990630.Content: You haven't learned a thing, have you?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990631.Content: With that power, we may yet finish the quest.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990632.Content: Clever trick. Who showed you that?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990633.Content: Wukong knew better transforming than this.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990634.Content: More forms! Let's see what you can do.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990635.Content: Match your form to their weakness. Remember that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990636.Content: That blow would shatter a mountain!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990638.Content: Heavy swings. My lessons have stuck.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990640.Content: Patience, kid. Wait before you hit where it hurts!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990641.Content: Busy playing tricks while I take the blows?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990643.Content: Already? You're too quick with that.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990644.Content: Fear makes you hasty. I can tell.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990645.Content: Well done. Thick skull you've got.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990647.Content: Tougher than my rake, that is!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990648.Content: That few? Wukong could muster an army.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990649.Content: The number is what speaks for us.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990650.Content: We're monks, kid. More of us doesn't mean we can be cruel.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990651.Content: Marking ground? What are you planning?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990652.Content: Why bother? That won't stop them anyway.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990653.Content: Lazy bones! Cowering there while I fight?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990654.Content: Watch it, you! Mind where you're going!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990655.Content: Show some respect to your elders!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990657.Content: You've gone too far! Here's a lesson!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990660.Content: Ill-mannered brat. Not worth my anger.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990662.Content: Frozen, are you? Not so nimble now.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990664.Content: Reap what you sow. I'm not helping.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990665.Content: If you cross me, scamp, you might as well fend for yourself.
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990666.Content: I'll crack your skull wide open!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990667.Content: Filthy beast! You'll rue this day!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990668.Content: Mangy cur! Can you handle my rake?
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990672.Content: You've woken the boar within me!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990674.Content: Taste the wrath of your betters!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990675.Content: You'll know my strength soon enough!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990676.Content: Watch closely, kid! That's how it's done!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990677.Content: A thousand hits to sate my rage!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990678.Content: Bare your neck! I have scores to settle!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990679.Content: Mark me, cur! This rake's for killing!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990680.Content: Show some respect and taste this rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990681.Content: You'll find no mercy before my rake!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990682.Content: One hit to end it all!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990683.Content: Wretched thing! You cross me, and you fall!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990684.Content: Wukong's staff and my rake! We're unstoppable!
StringKVMapDesc.FUStDialogueDesc.350990685.Content: Fool! Your insolence will cost your life!

StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100001.Title: Keeper's Shrine
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100001.Content:
Come to this humble shrine, shabby but dear.
Visit often, you won't regret it here.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100002.Title: Rest at Keeper's Shrine
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100002.Content:
"To rest and breathe is to embrace the essence of the earth."
Rest at Keeper's Shrine, as your wounds and weariness are diminished.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100003.Title: Rest at Keeper's Shrine
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100003.Content:
Resting at Keeper's Shrine can draw upon energy across the cosmos.
It stirs the cosmic will and rouses yaoguais from their hideouts.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100004.Title: Travel at Keeper's Shrine
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100004.Content:
Across the land, in but an instant,
To places afar, a journey distant.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100005.Title: Stamina
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100005.Content:
Fierce moves and swift dodges—they all consume your Stamina.
Once exhausted, it hinders your prowess, leaving you drained and weary.
Be prudent in its use to unleash your full potential.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100006.Content:
The cosmos begets life, and life begets Will. 
This amorphous essence delights all and serves as a currency across realms.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100007.Title: Gather
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100007.Content:
The wild is abound with wondrous flora and herbs.
Gather them, for their future use awaits.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100008.Title: Resurrection
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100008.Content:
Offer a strand of hair to house your soul in the Keeper's Shrine.
If misfortune befalls, resurrection awaits at the nearest shrine, where the soul shall be revived.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100017.Content:
Offer a strand of hair to house your soul in the Keeper's Shrine.
If misfortune befalls, resurrection awaits at the nearest shrine, where the soul shall be revived.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100009.Title: Self-Advance at Keeper's Shrine
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100009.Content:
To alter your Abilities and Spells, special rites must be performed.
Only within the confines of Keeper's Shrine can you master these rites.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100012.Content:
Someone has documented the various beings encountered by the Destined One,
capturing their portraits, names, and intriguing anecdotes.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400001.Title: Perfect Dodge
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400001.Content:
Dodge the incoming enemy attack <{0}_KW>when it is just about to hit you</>!
A well-timed Dodge can <{0}_KW>build up more Focus</>.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400002.Content:
The <{0}_KW>Light Attack Combo</> consists of multiple, <{0}_KW>consecutive</> attacks.
Besides being an effective damage dealer, it is also a good option for <{0}_KW>building up Focus</>.
After learning certain Talents, the Light Attack Combo will not be interrupted even if you Dodge between the moves.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400003.Content:
A <{0}_KW>Heavy Attack</> is a <{0}_KW>powerful</>, single-hit move.
You can also <{0}_KW>consume Focus</> to launch an all-out strike, dealing higher Damage while staggering the target.
Higher Focus Points will significantly enhance the Heavy Attack's impact.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400004.Title: Charging
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400004.Content:
<{0}_KW>Hold Heavy Attack</> to start charging.
It consumes your Stamina to quickly <{0}_KW>build up Focus</>.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400005.Title: Build Up Focus
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400005.Content:
<{0}_KW>Hitting, Charging, and Perfect Dodging</> can all <{0}_KW>build up Focus</>.
Rumor has it that certain herbal medicines also grant Focus.
In times of peril, it can't hurt to try.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400006.Title: Varied Combo
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400006.Content:
Launching <{0}_KW>Heavy Attack</> amidst <{0}_KW>Light Attack Combo</> unleashes <{0}_KW>Varied Combo</>. 
You may follow up with a second move if the first move of Varied Combo lands on the enemy.
Varied Combos cost 1 Focus Point.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400007.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Smash Stance</>, you can <{0}_KW>charge Heavy Attacks while running</>.
This versatility makes it one of the best options when you need to stay vigilant around the enemy.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400008.Title: Smash Stance Varied Combo
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400008.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Smash Stance</>, launching Heavy Attack during Light Attack Combo consumes a Focus Point and
performs a distinctive <{0}_KW>Varied Combo</>.
If the enemy happens to attack you at this instant, this Varied Combo allows you to <{0}_KW>see through</> them and nullify it.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400009.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Pillar Stance</>, you can climb to the top of the staff by charging a Heavy Attack.
This move allows you to Dodge ground attacks and <{0}_KW>launch a large-area counter attack</>.
Great in both offense and defense.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400010.Title: Pillar Stance Varied Combo
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400010.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Pillar Stance</>, launching Heavy Attack during Light Attack Combo consumes a Focus Point and
performs a distinctive <{0}_KW>Varied Combo</>. 
This Varied Combo has the capability to strike all nearby enemies at once, proving particularly
useful when you find yourself encircled by foes.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400011.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Thrust Stance</>, you must stay in the same spot while charging Heavy Attacks.
It launches a <{0}_KW>thrusting attack from a longer distance</>, and can effectively counter attacks that come directly at you.
A safe yet effective move.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400012.Title: Thrust Stance Varied Combo
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400012.Content:
In <{0}_KW>Thrust Stance</>, launching Heavy Attack during Light Attack Combo consumes a Focus Point
and performs a distinctive <{0}_KW>Varied Combo</>. 
This Varied Combo allows you to <{0}_KW>withdraw from the combat</>, seeking offense from defense.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400013.Title: Four Banes
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400013.Content:
In this world, Four Banes hold sway: <{0}_KW>Thunder</>, <{0}_KW>Scorch</>, <{0}_KW>Frost</> and <{0}_KW>Poison</>.
When their gauges max out, corresponding damage will be taken.
Fortify your resistance against the Four Banes to bolster your resilience.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400014.Title: Frost
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400014.Content:
Frost will cause the Frost gauge to build up.
When maxed out, you will be in a Chilled state, rigid, and suffer frostbite. If shattered by an enemy,
you'll take extra damage. <{0}_KW>Rolling (Dodging)</> or struggling can help you <{0}_KW>break free faster</>.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400015.Title: Poison
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400015.Content:
Being exposed to Poison will cause the Poison gauge to build up.
When the gauge is maxed out, you will be in a Poison state, causing internal distress and <{0}_KW>continuous Health loss</>.
Using specific antidote pills can detoxify you and save your life.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400016.Title: Falling
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400016.Content:
You will take damage if you fall from a great height.
 <{0}_KW>Dodge while landing</> to <{0}_KW>reduce the damage taken</>.
Be aware that a severe fall will still take your life regardless.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400017.Content:
In spells there are wonders and magic so grand,
Foes vanquished and lives saved in the palm of your hand.
When challenges arise, let thy mind expand,
For mere brute force may not always withstand.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400018.Title: Shield Break
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400018.Content:
Enemies with <{0}_KW>shields</> can use them to <{0}_KW>block regular attacks</>.
Shattering the enemy's shield will make them vulnerable and staggered temporarily.
Certain Spells may also do wonders.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400019.Title: Immobilize
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400019.Content:
Immobilizes the enemy, creating an opportune moment for an attack.
When the enemy unleashes a powerful move that is difficult to dodge, it can also cleverly thwart the imminent danger.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400020.Title: Cloud Step
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400020.Content:
Master the art of timing to release your Unveiling Strike,
for its potency can falter if unleashed carelessly.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400021.Title: Rock Solid
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400021.Content: Beware the fierce assaults of larger adversaries, as they pose a threat to shatter your Rock Solid.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400022.Title: Ring of Fire
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400022.Content:
Once Ring of Fire is cast, the ring will remain active until the Spell dissipates.
Even if you step out it momentarily, it will still grant benefits upon your return.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400023.Title: A Pluck of Many
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400023.Content:
When you summon Duplicates, caution is advised;
They possess a delicate vitality and may be subdued by fierce opposition.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400024.Title: Thunder
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400024.Content:
Being struck by Thunder attacks will cause the Thunder gauge to build up.
When the gauge is maxed out, you will be in a Shocked state, with weakened bones and
numbed muscles, <{0}_KW>increasing the damage received</>.
Consume shock-appeasing medicines to relieve its effects.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301301.Title: Yaoguai Chief: Macaque Chief
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301302.Title: Yaoguai Chief: Macaque Chief
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301301.Content:
"In yin and yang, it deftly strides,
Escaping death, life's path abides."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301302.Content:
"They roamed the mountain by day, and lived in the cave by night, all in one accord.
They mingled not with bird or beast, but enjoyed their freedom in perfect bliss."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50502001.Title: Yaoguai Chief: Centipede Guai
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50502001.Content:
Twisted in form, it charges like a gale,
With feet unfurled, it strikes a deadly trail.
Beware its breath, the venomous embrace,
In narrow bounds, seek a wider space.
StringKVMapDesc.CardDesc.402001.UnitPoetry:
Twisted in form, it charges like a gale,
With feet unfurled, it strikes a deadly trail.
Beware its breath, the venomous embrace,
In narrow bounds, seek a wider space.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50502002.Title: Yaoguai Chief: Centipede Guai
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50502002.Content:
The swarms summoned by the Centipede Guai are slow. 
Sprinting around the edge of the vault may free you from their pursuit.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50202201.Title: Yaoguai King: Tiger Vanguard
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50202202.Title: Yaoguai King: Tiger Vanguard
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50202201.Content:
"Bloodied tiger, limbs twisted, yet strong,
Furious brows, sharp fangs, gaze fierce and long.
Golden eyes blazing, roars thunder's might,
A fearsome beast, a terrifying sight."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50202202.Content:
"The tiger tumbled to the cliff's base. Wukong smashed his staff upon it with all his might, but it rebounded,
stinging his hands. Bajie struck next, but his rake met the same resistance. Only then did they realize Tiger
Vanguard's ruse: their blows had struck a stone slab disguised as a tiger."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50499901.Title: Yaoguai King: The Scorpionlord
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50499901.Content:
With a leap swift as a shadow, the guai executed her Deathsting, a move unseen until it grazed
the Great Sage's scalp. 'A bitter sting!' he cried out. The unbearable pain forced Wukong to flee the battle.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50470601.Title: Yaoguai King: The Duskveil
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50470602.Title: Yaoguai King: The Duskveil
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50470601.Content:
"Head adorned in golden embrace,
Clutching jade that sunshine trace. 
Stars and clouds his robe does hold,
With bejeweled belt in shining mold."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50470602.Content:
"As the rooster crowed, the guai instantly revealed her true form. 
And with a second crow, and she crumbled, lifeless on the slope."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50201201.Title: Yaoguai King: Stone Vanguard
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50201201.Content:
Stone forms the mountain's bones, firm and true,
Earth's essence, prized for all it can imbue.
 Its back bears towering rocks, reaching the sky,
Lofty in stature and majestic in height.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50220501.Title: Yaoguai King: Shigandang
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50220501.Content:
An evil was here, once free to roam,
He murdered the monks, sowed harm and woe,
His sins so dark, no redemption found,
Six Buddha heads and his fate was bound,
In serene seals, he's forever held, 
Banished from light, in the shadows quelled.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302501.Title: Yaoguai King: Black Loong
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302501.Content:
Resonant waves profound, pulsing through the ground.
Evade their might unbound, and victory is surely found.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100013.Content:
The journey westward stretches far,
O'er towering peaks and waters dire.
Keep the Trail Talisman near,
For it brings you back from mire.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100014.Title: Experience
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100014.Content:
Cultivation is a prolonged journey.
Accumulate Experience to increase your Level, thereby igniting your innate spiritual sparks and
unlocking more Abilities and Spells.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100015.Title: Reignite the Sparks
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.4.Name: Reignite the Sparks
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100015.Content:
At the Keeper's Shrine, you can retrain your Talents.
All Sparks can be returned, so worry not and enjoy peace of mind.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100016.Title: Keeper's Store
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.11.Name: Store
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.3014.Name: Store
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.1007.Name: Store
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.2011.Name: Store
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100016.Content:
Different places have their own local specialities and materials. 
Why not take the opportunity to trade and make the most of your visit?
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100017.Title: Resurrect
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100018.Content:
Newly deceased souls have not yet been taken by the soul-reapers.
If guided by a Soul Banner, these souls can be summoned back to their former place, allowing them to be resurrected.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100019.Title: Drinks
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100019.Content:
Take a sip from your gourd to soothe your physical wounds.
At the Keeper's Shrine, the Keeper will refill your gourd, preparing you for the journey ahead.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100020.Title: Soak
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.10.Name: Brew
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.3003.Name: Brew
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100020.Content:
At the Keeper's Shrine, you can place the rare treasures you find into your gourd.
When you drink from the gourd later, they will add up to the effects.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100021.Content:
Different gourds hold varying amounts of wine.
Some gourds are mystical treasures themselves, offering unique benefits.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100022.Title: Armor Upgrade
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.8.Name: Upgrade Armor
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.2002.Name: Upgrade Armor
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100022.Content:
At the workbench of Yin Tiger, one may cast precious materials, tempering and crafting armor
to enhance its tier and quality.
Once the armor ascends in tier, it becomes more sturdy and enduring, and may even take on
a more splendid and wondrous form.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100023.Title: Abilities and Spells
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100023.Content:
Abilities strengthen your build, and Spells better your tactics. 
The journey requires its traveler to be prepared with both.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100024.Title: Make Medicines
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.14.Name: Make Medicines
StringKVMapDesc.InteractionFuncDesc.1002.Name: Make Medicines
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100024.Content:
The herbs and fungi you gathered along the mountain paths are all essential medicine ingredients.
Certain medicines necessitate a formula to be made, a secret that may reveal itself through your exploration.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100025.Title: Meditate
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100025.Content:
In this picturesque place, meditation spots stop monks and daoists.
With eyes closed and legs crossed, they sit in stillness, hoping for a spark of enlightenment.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100026.Title: Cultivation
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100026.Content:
Deliver the seeds left by yaoguais to Chen Loong, requesting he plants them in the soil of the Painted Realm. 
In due course, you will be able to harvest the corresponding ingredients.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100027.Title: Six Relics
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100027.Content:
"The Sage Stone Monkey, master of transformations, heeds the seasons' call, grasps the earth's law,
and shifts the stars' own course."
Having obtained the Great Sage's Relics, why not awaken his talents?
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100028.Title: Will-o'-the-Wisp
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100028.Content:
Decayed husks, flickering flames.
After living beings perish, their lingering wills roam the wilderness, occasionally coalescing into forms.
With the guidance of a wise master, you can learn the art of absorption and harness them for your own use.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100029.Content:
After being blessed, the gourds can be used to absorb the spirits of defeated yaoguais.
Incorporating them allows you to unleash Spirit Skills, harnessing their signature moves.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100030.Title: Qi
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100030.Content:
Both Transformations and Vessels require Qi to activate.
The fiercer you fight against your enemy, the faster Qi will recover.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.100031.Content:
A scroll gifted by Chen Loong that leads to a secluded and tranquil retreat.
Hidden in mountain villages, resting high among pines, this is the abode of the Immortals. Feel free to visit often.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400025.Title: Life-Saving Strand
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400025.Content:
When encountering formidable adversaries that bar your path, and when failure casts its shadow over your quest, this spell may be your key to triumph. 
In moments dire, it shall emerge unbidden.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400026.Title: Spell Binder
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400026.Content:
Even with wondrous Spells learnt, the Destined One may yet confront formidable foes impervious to such magic.
In such instances, <{0}_KW>binding Spells voluntarily</> and returning to the simplicity of staff combat could be a wise choice.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400027.Title: Four Banes Resistance
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400027.Content:
Resistance to Shock, Burn, Chill, and Poison can enhance your ability to withstand
<{0}_KW>Thunder</>, <{0}_KW>Scorch</>, <{0}_KW>Frost</>, and <{0}_KW>Poison Damage</>,
reducing the damage taken when in these states.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400028.Title: Scorch
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.400028.Content:
Suffering from Scorch builds up on the Scorch gauge. When the gauge is maxed out, you will be in a Burnt state, leading to continuous health loss.
Roll (dodge) on the ground multiple times to extinguish the fire, or roll into water or snow for an immediate effect.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102501.Title: Yaoguai King: Lingxuzi
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102501.Content:
"Wukong lifted the daoist to have a closer look, only to find it was a gray wolf.
Beside it, there was a plate with an inscription that read 'Crafted by Lingxuzi.'"
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102801.Title: Yaoguai King: Whiteclad Noble
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102801.Content:
"The Whiteclad Noble was struck dead with a single blow and dragged over for inspection,
revealing its true form—a patterned white snake."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50103701.Title: Yaoguai King: Black Wind King
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50103701.Content:
"Unable to see the guai clearly at night, Wukong swung his staff ferociously at the vague figure.
The black figure then transformed into the black wind and returned to his cave, tightly shutting
the stone door behind him."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50103101.Title: Yaoguai King: Black Bear Guai
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50103101.Content:
"Black-sashed spear in hand, leather boots in stride,
Eyes aglow like gold, the Black Wind King's pride."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50390101.Title: Yaoguai King: Red Loong
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50390101.Content: "The fourth one, Red Loong, guards the Yellow River."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102301.Title: Yaoguai King: Elder Jinchi
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50102301.Content:
Alas, this old monk, so unwise,
His years brought neither truth nor prize.
Guangzhi and Guangmou led him wrong,
'Twas his greed sung his eulogy song.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50201101.Title: Yaoguai King: Yellow Wind King
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50201101.Content:
"This one was an ascended rat that dwelled at the foot of Mount Lingshan. Pleasant was his life until
his nature made him steal oil from the Buddha's lamp. 
Seeing the light dimming, he feared his capture by Vajras, hence he escaped and settled down here as a guai."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50600101.Title: Yaoguai King: Fuban
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50600101.Content:
"In the West lies the Kingdom of Sahālī, 'the End of the Sky'. Everyday in the hour of sunset, the king
would order the drums beaten and horn sounded. For the sun, the true fire of the sky, boils the
water to hiss and roar. Without cancelling it, such noise harms babies in their cradles."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302301.Title: Yaoguai King: Kang-Jin Loong
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302301.Content:
"The Great Sage, swiftly turning his staff into a steel drill, bored a hole atop the sharp horn of Kang-Jin Loong,
Shrinking his body as small as a mustard seed, he crouched within that drilled eye, shouting,
'Pull out the horn! Pull out the horn!'"
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301901.Title: Yaoguai King: Captain Wise Voice
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301901.Content:
"I am a disciple of Bodhisattva Guoshiwang of Sizhou, commander of the Four Divine Captains,
and was ordered to capture you!"
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302901.Title: Yaoguai King: Cyan Loong
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50302901.Content: "The third Loong Prince, the cyan one, charges over the Yangtze River."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50340101.Title: Yaoguai King: Kang-Jin Star
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50340101.Content:
"Kang-Jin Loong pierced her horn through the Gold Cymbals, rescuing me from within.
But when I shattered the Gold Cymbals, the guai was startled awake."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50380001.Title: Yaoguai King: Yellowbrow
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50380002.Title: Yaoguai King: Yellowbrow
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50380001.Content:
"This place is known as the New West, a magnificent abode granted to honor my profound practice. 
I am Yellowbrow Buddha, yet the people here respectfully address me as Master Yellowbrow or His Grace."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50380002.Content:
"With tousled hair and a thin golden hoop; eyes bright, framed by two upright yellow brows.
Nostrils wide open for all to see, and a square mouth brimming with sharp teeth."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50301601.Content: "The first Loong Prince, the yellow one, charges over the River Huai."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50500301.Content:
"As the whirlwind passed, there appeared a guai in mid-air, truly a grotesque sight:
A dark face with short hair, a long snout, and large ears; clad in garb of neither cyan nor blue crude fabric,
fastened with a floral cloth belt."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50500801.Content:
"Behold the seven, with chests agape, flaunting their snow-white bellies, from their navel pores they weave their magic.
Threads like silk ropes wildly spring forth, erecting a canopy in the sky, covering the pilgrim beneath."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50500501.Content:
"From the fog a light so bright.
From the fog, under his ribs mists spray wide;
A light so bright, as fire blazing from his hundred eyes.
Like a gold bell the ward he creates, escape as you will, only its bound awaits."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50440701.Content:
"I was a furnace-tending Daoist of Tushita Palace.
For my negligence, Lord Lao demoted me here to become the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50440101.Content:
"He is the son of the Bull King and Rakshasi.
Three-hundred-year's practice on the Flaming Mountains granted him the skill of 'Samadhi Fire'. 
Capable as he is, he's sent by the Bull King to guard Mount Hao. "Red Boy" is his name, and 'The Sacred Child' his title."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50411001.Content:
"He removed his armor and donned a luxurious crow-cyan coat, then stepped out the gate and
mounted the Bishui Beast. After instructing his minions to guard the pass, he ventured through
the mists and fogs, and headed northwest."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50471201.Content: "This monkey has forged my decree, deceiving my esteemed courtiers. Send an Inspector immediately to track him down! "
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50740101.Content:
"This stone monkey, born from cosmic essence three hundred years ago, was initially overlooked. 
Now, he has become an undefeatable immortal, beyond even the book of life and death."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50700101.Content:
"With a golden crown upon my head, clad in gold-made armor, in hand, the powerful Jingubang
I wielded, on feet, the Cloudtreaders.
Under my command, forty-seven thousand yaoguais strong, all hailed me as the Great Sage,
a figure of peerless renown."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50800001.Content:
"With a visage fair and noble stance, ears that drape and eyes that dance.
 A flying Feng adorns his crown, clad in pale yellow gown.
Golden boots with loong-patterned socks, a jade belt with glistening rocks.
At his waist, a slingshot like the crescent moon, in hand, a tri-point double-edged spear's boon."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.50800002.Content:
"He subdued the six guais, uniting them as sworn brothers. Together with hundreds of grassroots deities,
his power on Mount Mei is a force to be reckoned with. 
Yet he only answers mobilization, not summons. Your Highness may issue a military dispatch, enlisting his aid,
and thus the monkey can surely be captured."
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300001.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300002.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300003.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300004.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300005.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300006.Title: Obsession
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300001.Content:
Obsession, a remnant of worldly ties, transforms the unfinished aspirations into spaces both tangible
and ethereal, real and illusory. 
Through certain objects, one can navigate these spaces, engaging with the past and future, and
perhaps gaining even more.
StringKVMapDesc.LoadingTipsDesc.300002.Content:
Obsession, a remnant of worldly ties, transforms the unfinished aspirations into spaces both tangible
and ethereal, real and illusory. 
Through certain objects, one can navigate these spaces, engaging with the past and future, and
perhaps gaining even more.

and ethereal, real and illusory. 
Through certain objects, one can navigate these spaces, engaging with the past and future, and
perhaps gaining even more.

Through certain objects, one can navigate these spaces, engaging with the past and future, and
